First Date: Late To Date is a romantic-comedy interactive cinematic (FMV) game in which the audience determines the progress of the movie with the options that appear every minute.
Erdem must make Derya forgive him in this late first meeting, or their relationship will end before it ever started.
Erdem will be dragged along different paths with the decisions he will make, and he will be able to experience many situations that may arise from the relationship between men and women. Every decision he takes will lead him to different paths and different endings.

name: Five Sonic Rings Bundle
summary: Five Sonic Rings Bundle is a bundle consisting of five Sonic the Hedgehog games published by Sega for Steam. It was sold through the Sega.com digital store around Christmas 2013.

name: FIFA 23: Legacy Edition
summary: FIFA 23 Legacy Edition features the latest kits, clubs, and squads from some of the top leagues of the world. It will also feature the addition of top women’s club teams and some of the world’s most famous stadiums, including brand new ones.

name: Fire Man: Incoming Storm
summary: Spin-off flash game that serves as a follow-up to IRA's fanmade Fire Man comics series, and as such features a playable Fire Man. Split into multiple parts that function like separate flash games.

name: Five in One
summary:
A game released for the Mega Duck/Cougar Boy in 1993.

It contains:

Store Tris 1
Store Tris 2
Taiwan Mahjong
Japan Mahjong
Hong Kong Mahjung

name: Finding Nemo
summary: Game Boy Advance port of Finding Nemo

name: Fire All Humans
summary: Fire all the humans in splatastic fun and solve the puzzles. With hilarious explosions, addictive physics based shooting of your humans to reach the end goals!

name: Fire Station Renovation
summary: Fire Station Renovation is a renovator simulator for abandoned and forgotten fire stations. Buy old hovels, repaint, redecorate, clean and even build rodent traps and bring the firehouse back to life!

name: Fightro
summary:
Fightro is 2D Arcade Fighting Game,

If you are an oldschool fighting game lover, this game is for you!

Our character is a blonde professional fighter, his opponent is not weak, but he has to turn his opponent down!

Can you beat the AI with its awesome fighting mechanics?
Defeat your enemy by making combos.
Making the right move at the right time is very important, Sometimes defense is the best solution!

name: Final Vanguard
summary: Pilot a last push to reclaim your star system and save everything. Final Vanguard combines shoot 'em up mechanics with RPG and Rougelite elements plus a touch of strategy to offer a unique in-depth 3rd person shooting experience.

name: Final Fright
summary: Halloween gets deadly in this action-packed love letter to retro side-scrolling beat ‘em ups. Bring the smackdown as a squad in co-op mode (up to 4 players) and jam out to a spooky, fist-pumping soundtrack inspired by the finest arcade beat ‘em ups of the ‘90s.

name: Fire & Maneuver: American Civil War
summary: Preserve the Union or break way as the Confederacy in the first expansion to The Armchair Historian's Fire & Maneuver. Recreate The War Between the States or pit America against Europe in radical matchups!

name: Fighter X Fighter
summary: Punch and kick! Live in fighting! Choose skills and strengthen talents to conquer various levels and enemies.

name: Finding America: The Heartland
summary: Welcome to America's Heartland! From the monumental Mount Rushmore of South Dakota to the humble farmhouses of Kansas, we're confident this lovely slice of American pie will have something just for you. Now let's go see the many beautiful things the Heartland has to offer!

name: Fitriz
summary: Food puzzle game. Complete lines of food blocks and collect 175+ food items in 30 levels with the help of a raccoon.

name: Five Nights With James
summary: Five Nights With James is a Five Nights At Freddy's Fan game which contains funny memes and funny lore.

name: Fire Hose
summary: An action game for Playdate. Put out fires!

name: Fists For Fighting Fx3
summary: Put gloves on and use your fists to achieve your goal. In Fx3 take the role of different fighters, each fighting for different reasons and giving everything of whether to beat all their opponents.

name: Fist of the North Star: Lost Paradise - Premium Edition
summary:
This edition includes the following:
- Game: Fist of the North Star: Lost Paradise
- Special DLC

name: Fields
summary:
Fields is a logic puzzle game. Your challenge is to fill a grid with fields of flowers. But each field has a specific size and there is only one solution to each puzzle.
The puzzles start off very simply but the further you get the more challenging they become.

name: Five Card Quest
summary: Five Card Quest is a tactical role playing game designed to offer lots of challenge and replay value, while also being easy to control with one thumb. There are five cards in your hand, and every card you play is a different move for your team of heroes to carry out.

name: Five A Side Football 2023
summary: Five a Side Football is back for 2023! Manage five a side versions of your favourite modern teams, and now you can take charge of early-90s clubs as well! Chase the league trophy with a title contender, turn a mid-table side into a championship challenger, or guide a struggling outfit to avoid relegation; the choice is yours. Whoever you choose, in whatever era, make sure you end each season in your target position or you’ll face the sack!

name: Fig.
summary: You do not know anything, yet you have to move forward. Wander through the corridors of a mysterious factory and recover your abilities. Fight patroling drones and break through to demanding boss battles. Seek a way out and find the meaning of the gam…

name: Fish Pond Park
summary:
Nurture an idyllic slice of tourist's heaven into the top nature spot of the nation, furnishing it with a variety of services like inns, tours, and more!
Mix and match areas of your wooded wonderland to concoct exciting outdoor attractions that appeal to sightseers' sweet spots. Which combinations make what? Energize that outdoorsman's spirit and experiment for yourself!
Any pond or river also doubles as an aquatic habitat for fry--which you can raise for later fishing excursions in the all-new fishing mode! Do you have what it takes to land the big one? Come on down to Fish Pond Park and find out!

name: Fire Emblem: Heaven's Bloom
summary:
The story begins in the Kingdom of Adestria. Hundreds of years ago, Humans competed for survival with magically gifted beings known as 'Fae'. Over time, a breed of 'Half-Bloods' emerged, descended from parents of each race. The Half-Bloods chose to ally themselves with the weaker Humans, and the Fae were destroyed. The Half-Bloods then turned on the humans, using the powers of their Fae blood to subjugate and enslave their magically-inert cousins.

A little over a hundred years have passed since the subjugation. Our main characters are two Half-Bloods: Lord Cassius Malberry and his sister, Fordra. Hoping to find the cure for a horrible disease, they hunt for an ancient Fae tome...

name: Finis
summary: FINIS is a puzzle game that explores 21 different universes. Each universe offers a different experience, terror, calm, destruction, war, progress... You can choose between 8 completely different paths and each path will take you to a unique ending.

name: Fill & Cross: Pirate Riddles 3
summary: To sail or not to sail? What kind of question is that?! While others mull it over, you can be the first to find the treasure!

name: Fire Emblem: Awakening - Project Thabes
summary: A mod for Fire Emblem: Awakening which alters a range of things, adding new supports, weapons, classes, and playable characters, in addition to fixing story inconsistencies and rebalancing some of the game's systems and characters.

name: Fishing Game
summary: Fishing game is an itty bitty game inspired by the fishing minigame in Stardew Valley. Filled with a bunch of goofy writing and a handful of spicy gimmicks. Collect over twenty unique fish and add them to your compendium as you navigate through a world of quirky characters and strange locations!

name: Fire Emblem: Terror of the Forest
summary:
A long time ago, war broke between humans and monsters (Wait, isn’t it that game’s into ?). After years of struggle, humans emerged victorious, and sealed the monsters away with the help of powerful artifacts.
Now, a thousand years later, humans have completely forgotten about this war and these artifacts. In this hack, you play as Sylvester, a debuting brigand who will see himself becoming a hero when the monsters banished a millenium ago suddenly resurface. Together with his loyal right-hand man, the leader of what remains of a mercenary group after a mutiny, a teenage amazon seeking strength and validation and more than sixty other weirdos, of course.

name: Fire Emblem: Code of the Black Knights
summary:
Code of the Black Knights is a romhack that takes place on the continent of Lumae, a mass of land that was pulled from the oceans by Naga, the God of Creation, 213 years before the game takes place. Due to this unusual origin, Lumae lacks any natural coasts, so sea travel was impossible, isolating the continent from the rest of the world until recently.
Within the continent, there are four runes which have bizarre, mystical powers. Four nations took them, and became more powerful than the rest of the nations in the Continent.
Enter our protagonists: Schwarze and Noir, who, after an attack on a central fort, seek to investigate why Zoyla, an allied nation would send mercenaries against them. Unbeknownst to them, their good intentions might detonate a world war. Some truths were not meant to be discovered…

name: Finding Ice
summary: In this one-of-a-kind story game, the player must explore vast worlds through a third-person Arctic Wolf, complete puzzles, collect items and re-connect with nature.

name: Finding Mosey
summary: Find your cat Mosey, choosing your degree of destruction and dedication. Fight, sneak, or talk your way into new areas and upgrade your character along the way as the search gets messy. Loot ridiculous items and discover hidden stories that help you explore this open world.

name: Find Your Wings
summary: A bite-sized tower defense roguelike!

name: Fighters of Fate
summary: Test your CCG and trading card games skills, you’ll be able to collect cards and test your power in the live PVP arena! Be more powerful, test different deck options, and enjoy the thrill of the anime fighting games while putting the best of the trading card games strategies.

name: Find the Alien
summary:
Looking for imposter games? Crazy about 3D invasion games? Find the Alien is a fun casual game where your mission is to stop the alien invasion. Find outlanders among us and kill the aliens in this imposter game.

This alien game has an easy gameplay. The imposters are the aliens hiding among us. They look like normal people. Your goal is to kill all the aliens in the imposter game. Complete the set of levels in all suburbs. Unlock a new blaster and kill more outlanders among us.

name: Five Night's at Freddy's: The Silver Eyes Fangame
summary: Five Night's at Freddy's: The Silver Eyes Fangame is a short point-&-click exploration game based on the Silver Eyes novel. Please enjoy this little tour through the atmospheric world of Charlotte's childhood. And keep an eye out! There may be a secret hidden somewhere...

name: Fisher Frog
summary: Cast out your line and catch some fish by moving your lure left and right! Upgrade your rod and boat, casting deeper into the sea and hiring crew members as you go. Discover new fish, gain levels and talents, and delve as deep as you can to uncover what the ocean floor hides. Unlock other characters, fishing rods, spears, lures, and even pets.

name: Fire Emblem: Blessed Heart
summary: FE: Blessed Heart is a a full campaign total conversion hack with 24 original chapters, 32 playable characters and branching promotion paths with both new and rebalanced classes. The map design is focused on engaging pacing and side objectives, and the hack features: QoL features such as viewable growths, promotion information, expanded equipment options, including weapons, tomes and hold items and, finally, a few dozen new music tracks and accessible gameplay with an optional casual mode.

name: Fire Emblem: The Four Kings
summary: The story centers on three brothers: Walter, Lionel, and Terril. They are the royals of the country of Askia in the land of Ibril. Terril is the current king, and he sends his brothers out on a diplomatic meeting with the king of the western nation of Behanzin. But the brothers constantly argue, and when things get rough, their relationship becomes strained even further…

name: Fire Emblem: Four Kings - Deposition
summary: This is Four Kings: Deposition, a short prequel to Four Kings! This story is centered around Daltry, one of the main antagonists of Four Kings, and shows how he began and how he became the man he is in the main story. Of the three main antagonists of Four Kings, I felt that Daltry was the weakest one, since he didn’t receive a lot of screentime or backstory, and his few appearances were kinda generic, so I wanted to remedy that with a new story all about him.

name: Fire Emblem: The Dragon Herald
summary: In the continent of Orsia, there exist three nations following a long war: Folga, a northern nation with a focus on magical research, Raudel, an empire that has recently acquired new territory along the Folga/Raudel border, and Verius, a theocracy that generally maintains neutrality in continental conflicts. Verius also serves as the central hub of the dragon faith, the only widespread religion in Orsia. The story follows You, a figure in the dragon faith tasked with delivering the word of the dragons to an annual international summit meant to prevent further war from breaking out.

name: Fire Emblem: Justice & Pride
summary:
The continent of Irona. Many years ago, the land was ruled by the forces of darkness. Monsters and dragons alike terrorized the small human populace in Irona. However, one day, a great sage appeared, commanding light and nature, and with the combined might of the sage and her allies, the monsters were sealed using the power of a mysterious tower known as the Spire of Darkness. Following the conflict, the warriors of legend went their own separate ways and founded their own lands, but they all swore fealty to the brother of the great sage, who was crowned Emperor of Irona.

500 years have passed since the time of the Hero of Light. Irona’s Emperor Perseus, a descendant of the first emperor, Hawke, has been acting suspiciously. He and a mysterious mage named Caelia have been reawakening the monsters using the Spire of Darkness. In Norbury, a land on the western end of the continent founded by the master archer Quentin, Duke Robert dies of unknown causes. Tragedy would also strike the duchy of Abrein, a southwestern duchy founded by Bishop Leticia. The son of Duke Simon and descendant of Leticia, Prince Travis, is killed by a surprise ambush by powerful monsters on a scouting mission. This tragic chain of events throws the whole continent into turmoil, pitting the western duchies against the loyalist eastern lands.

11 years after the Great Tragedy, Travis’s younger sister, Princess Aderyn, chooses to fight back. Together with her allies, she strives to save Abrein and to free the rest of the continent from the iron fist of Perseus’s reign.

name: Fire Emblem: Dark Lord and The Maiden of Light
summary: The continent of Brauma, named after the dragon goddess, is met with instability. The empire of Deimos, lead by its regent Raum, has launched a campaign of unification. Having defeated its neighbors to the east, Raum turns his eyes southward towards Enterre. Our story begins here, as a young lord from the dukedom Vanheim pays visit to the Duke of Enterre.

name: Finger on the Roof! Go! Rooftop Runner!
Find Me in the Maze
summary: Revived by a witch, a warrior relive his journey trying to pass the maze and see what happened to him and his friends in the past.

name: Fiestas del Pueblo
summary: Fiestas del Pueblo is a visual novel made up of four different stories. The stories are all set in a same place in the same period of time. The rest of connections are ambiguous.

name: Final Fantasy ++
summary: Final Fantasy ++ (or Final Fantasy Double-Plus, or Final Fantasy Plus Plus) is a “re-imagining” of the very first Final Fantasy game.

name: Final Mission
summary: The Japanese version of S.C.A.T.: Special Cybernetic Attack Team, Final Mission, was released a year before the American version and there are a few differences between the two. The game's opening story sequence is completely different, showing the obliteration of various cities before the alien invasion begins. Instead of a selectable male or female main character, both players control palette-swapped male soldiers, one of whom is Russian, which was inconceivable for the western market. The game's difficulty was made easier for the American version as well. Instead of six lives, the player begins with only three lives and any upgrade they possess is lost whenever their character is hit. The player's satellites also function differently. Instead of orbiting automatically, they're aligned by the player while moving the character left or right. Their firepower was also weaker. The map shown before each stage in the American version was not featured in the original Japanese version.

name: Fire Emblem: Bases and Bandits
summary:
This hack is designed around the restrictions of extremely weak player units. Each of the 8 playable units in this hack has 1 base HP and 0 base everything else. To compensate for this, additional restrictions are in place. Everything is locked at 100% hit, and growths are fixed. Weapons have had to be slightly altered to fit in with this style.

FE4’s ring system is present in this hack, but the rings present all have explicit downsides, giving them more strategic use. P-Down, D-Up may help you take a hit despite your abysmal stats, but your damage output takes a heavy blow. Ring bonuses also stack.

Thanks to the hack’s short nature, you can use weaker versions of Filia’s Might and Nini’s Grace wherever they may help you, without fear of needing them later.

These two mechanics alone lead to very CQ-esque statstacking.

This hack consists of 5 relatively short maps, each with a unique look and song. Enjoy the game’s gradual shift from puzzle to traditional FE as your options expand.

name: Fist of the North Star
summary: The famous Anime series is now the latest arcade game from Sega! Players can choose their favorite characters from the series including Kenshiro, Raoh, Toki, Shin, Rei, Juda, Thouther, Mr. Heart and Mamiya! Fist of the North Star is a 1 or 2 player game with continuous buy-in. A Boost Gauge for offensive attacks, an Aura Gauge for defensive maneuvers, and a North Star Gauge (your 7 stars of life force) have been included to enhance game play. Don't lose your stars or the Star of Death will shine, making you dangerously vulnerable to enemy attacks!

name: First Dwarf
summary: If there’s one thing dwarves are better at than grooming their beards, it's engineering. Jump into your mech, build a base and explore the crumbled fantasy world in this immersive action RPG.

name: Final Fantasy IV: Unprecedented Crisis
summary:
This is a complete hack of Final Fantasy 4 (2 US) for SNES which shows off many of the features of the hacking utility, FF4kster. There are a few assembly hacks which cannot be achieved within the editor alone, but they are few in number and mostly for cosmetic purposes.

It may seem at first that the changes are limited to gameplay and the plot is unchanged, but don’t worry, there is a point in the plot after which it branches from the original and begins an entirely new chain of events.

name: Final Fantasy IV: Ultima
summary:
Final Fantasy IV - Ultima is a ‘deluxe’ version of Final Fantasy II for the SNES. This hack adds a bunch of additions to the base game while keeping the majority of the main story intact and the feel of FF2US the same.

List of features, additions and changes:
- Party Swapping among 11 different members at Endgame!!
- Dark Knight Cecil now available at endgame!!
- A Full-Featured Bestiary!! A Brand New Title Screen!
- A VERY Challenging BOSS RUSH Mode unlocked at endgame!!
- New Game+ mode with higher MAX level/stats!!
- 58 New Weapons! Including Magically Imbued Weapons!
- 62 New Spells/Summons! Also revamped existing spells!
- 38 New Bosses! Brand New Boss at Endgame with Randomized AI!
- New Achievements Feature at: https://retroachievements.org/game/1072
- New Status ‘Aura/Color’ for buffs/ailments during battle!!
- Damage Limit increased to 14999! Can turn Encounters On/Off!
- New Areas! New Side Quests! New and Upgradable Commands!!
- New Optional Patches for Alternate Sprites and Palette!
- New Enemy Graphics! New Events! New Endgame Scenarios!
- New Equipment/Spell Menus with DETAILED info!!
- New attack/swing/spell animations!
- New weapon graphics!! New sound effects! New items!!
- New maps, new areas and new edits to overworld maps!
- New events! New enemies!! Sprint with the Y button!!
- New commands for characters. New Armors and Gears!
- Revamped shops/equipment and balanced their progression.
- Dark Knight Cecil now dual-wields and is 2-handed!!
- Edge is now buffed offensively! Can steal Rare items!
- Rydia has new summons!
- Cecil has been buffed as a tank.
- Rosa can use more combative gears and new spells.
- Kain has various new spells and commands.
- Yang, Edward, Palom, Porom and others have also been buffed!
- Lots of secrets that can lead to early acquirement of better equipment!
- Few minor tweaks to the base game such as save points, etc.

name: Final Recurrence
summary: With so many missing persons cases revolving the Shepherd's Hill forest, why is yours any different?

name: Fishori
summary: Explore and discover a peaceful idle fishing game set on a marooned island in the middle of nowhere. Recruit a team of shipwrecked heroes, plunge into the deep seas, and fish your way from rags to riches.

name: Fix My Cat Doc
summary: Fix My Cat Doc game is a simulator in which you are acting as a veterinarian. Your mission is to save as many animals as possible from torment and pain.

name: Fix My Legs Doc
summary: Who will take care of our health if not us? Fix My Legs Doc, is a simulation game in which you have the chance to be a Doctor, where your mission is to help different patients to heal their legs to feel good.

name: Firewall Ultra
summary: Enlist as an elite contractor and squad up for PVP and PVE multiplayer missions in Firewall Ultra, a tactical first-person shooter in development by First Contact Entertainment for PS VR2.

name: Fireworks
summary:
Use the arrow keys to move left and right.

Tap Z or Space to flap.

Fly as long as you can.

name: Field of Glory II: Medieval - Sublime Porte
summary: At the end of the thirteenth century, with the Seljuk Sultanate of Rum in terminal decline, Anatolia was divided into several small independent Turkish principalities, called beyliks.

name: Fingercrafts
summary: Bite, bleed and lick. The skin of the fingers around the nail have comforted and calmed.

name: Find the light
summary: is a 1st person adventure game. In the game, you played as a claustrophobic patient. The dark and narrow places is your biggest enemy. You must help avoid the darkness, find the light source, solve layers of mysteries, and finally escape from the danger.

name: Field of Arms: Tactics
summary: Field of Arms: Tactics is a strategy game with a unique board game aesthetic, set in the 18th century, recreating battles that occurred during this period of time. Players will have to think strategically in order to defeat the enemy, defend or attack forts during tense battles and sieges.

name: Firebird: Legend of the Crystal Goddesses
summary: Firebird: Legend of the Crystal Goddesses is a love letter to classic RPGs of the SNES era, inspired by 8-bit and 16-bit classics of the 90's, with some self-aware meta humor for fans of the genre. Come experience a unique fantasy adventure!

name: Fitness Center Renovator
summary: Shape your future with Fitness Center Renovator! Build not only your clients’ muscles but also your unique brand. Create and expand a global fitness center franchise. Renovate old premises, customize them and sell with the profit!

name: Firesoul
summary: Answer the prayers of lost souls, exorcise dark spirits and solve puzzles to uncover the mystery of a forgotten island.

name: Fit Puzzle Blocks
summary: Solve a lot of puzzles in Fit Block Puzzle. Try to fit all the different shaped blocks on the grid.

name: Fire Emblem Engage
summary:
Become the Divine Dragon and save the continent of Elyos!

Summon valiant heroes like Marth & Celica alongside a new cast of characters and engage in turn-based, tactical combat against a great evil in this new Fire Emblem story.

name: Fitness Boxing Fist of the North Star
summary:
For resolving lack of daily exercise and strengthening your physical strength!

You can enjoy authentic exercise in the world of "Fist of the North Star" without changing the functions of "Fitness Boxing"!

name: Fire Emblem Engage: Divine Edition
summary:
Fire Emblem Engage: Divine Edition includes:
- The Fire Emblem Engage Game
- Steelbook
- Art Cards
- Poster
- Art Book
- Divine Edition Game Casing

name: Five Golden Nights at Freddy's
summary:
The Freddy Fazbear franchise has a new owner. The owner wanted to re-create the good old days when there was only Springtrap and Freddy.

He placed a huge map on the wall that detects everything that's going on in the building. Instead of cameras, because they cost to much power, or something.

name: Five Golden Nights at Freddy's 2
summary:
The Fazbear franchise given new life!
Come be a part of the all new Golden Freddy's Pizzeria.
All your old friends are back, remade and ready for fun, for all ages!

name: Five Golden Nights at Freddy's 3: Storage
summary: FNaF fangame developed by KUNOLEO. Third and final installment in the series released 7 years after FGNaF 2.

name: Firewall: Man vs. Machine
summary:
MiraCom's super computer has forcibly taken control of the multinational corporation from its human directors. Unless mankind surrenders the computer will destroy Paris.

In FIREWALL: Man vs. Machines you play as the Blue Arrow, fighter pilot and computer scientist. As part of the assault force you will pilot your cybership through eleven levels of realistic 3D, from the real world to cyberspace. Follow clues from your allies and unravel twisted puzzles to reach your goal. The only way to escape from MiraCom’s strange cyber world is to fight past the Firewall protecting the evil computer and destroy it.

Prepare your assault; the fate of world depends on your skill and intelligence alone.

name: Fishbone
summary: Big fish eat small fish! In Fishbone you play as a fish called Bubbles and go for Highscores in a total of 4 levels by eating as many smaller fish as you can, while avoiding the ones bigger than you, bombs and other harmful things.

name: Final Doom
summary:
The version of Final Doom found in the DLC section of the Doom Unity remasters.

Far from earth, the UAC recommenced their experiments on on of the moons of Jupiter. A spaceship, mistaken for a supply vexxel on radar, hovered above the base. Hideous demons poured out, blanketing the base with death. All your comrades were quickly slaughtered or zombified. This time, it's not about survival. It's about revenge.

name: Filing Cistem
summary: Filing Cistem is a game about putting things into boxes (or, more accurately, tubes). You work in a government office, where your job is to sort paperwork into "male" and "female" - all day, every day. Now get to work.

name: Fisher's Qualm
summary: ASMR based casual island fishing game!

name: Fight Over Dat Ancient
summary: An opensource card game with magical heroes, each with unique skills and powerful abilities.

name: Final Fantasy Redux
summary: This patch is a re-balance of the original Final Fantasy III for the Famicom. It is compatible with the original JAP version as well as the English translations. The purpose of this patch is to revamp the game in a way that makes the majority of more more equally viable. Ninjas and Sages are no longer the only two viable end game Jobs now that other Jobs provide their own advantages. Each Job now reflects its respective DS counterpart in regards to abilities, stats, and equipment.

name: Final Knight
summary: Retro console-style beat 'em up action RPG, Giant weapons, massive monsters, Lightning Ring, 9 fantasy classes, and Sword of Legend.

name: Finger Soccer
summary: "Finger Soccer" is a casual competitive game. The game uses catapults to carry out intense football matches.

name: Fish the Detective!
summary: -A cartoonish capturing of noir fiction. -Cute n' funny dialogue. -About a half-hour of gameplay.

name: Fight Until Death
summary: Are you ready to Fight Until Death?

name: Fishton: A Town to Remember
summary: An open world, survival, mechanical simulation game set in a small town. Cruise around town in a new car or a piece of junk you pieced together with scrap. Race for money and glory. Solve the mystery that's been casting a shadow over this pleasant town for so long.

name: Fists of Stone
summary: Play these activity-based obstacle courses and compete against yourself or others in multiplayer mode. Also a fun way to improve your overall fitness.

name: Fix My Hand Doc
summary: Fix My Hand Doc is a simulator that teaches you how to proceed in various extreme situations. Your mission is to be a doctor who will have to treat the hands of different patients.

name: Firefly Sky
summary:
To Catch the fireflies you tap your screen to throw the jar in the air. The longer you hold the tap the higher the jar will go. Tilt your device left or right to move the little girl. The jar will move with the girl even while in the air.
Your aim is you catch the yellow fireflies on each level. Each new level will have more and more fireflies.
Be careful of the red ones. They fly slower but they'll make you lose a heart. If you lose all your hearts the game is over. Now and then a very fast pink bug will appear. If you catch it you'll get a bonus life!

name: Fivies
summary:
Fivies, the charming dice game with real physics.

The first game of Toth Games is a simple dice game in which you have to score as much points as possible. How? Just throw given combinations and write the points. The dices are randomly thrown and no prerecorded dice animations. Awesome!

Apart from English and German as main languages there is also SwissGerman! The language from the gamemaker and available in all upcoming Toth Games.

So start rolling the dices and get the highscore.

name: FireJumpers Inferno: Full Version Unlock
summary: Unlock all features!

name: First Bite: Bad Blood
summary: An LGBTQ+ Vampiric Visual Novel. So you think you’re above the law because you’re undead and have perfect hair? Think again.

name: Final Fantasy XIV: A Realm Awoken
summary: Patch 2.1, the very first major version update for Final Fantasy XIV, sees large-scale additions and refinements made to Eorzea. Featuring the first installment of the Crystal Tower 24-man raid, the housing system for free companies, and rebalanced job actions.

name: Final Fantasy XIV: Through the Maelstrom
summary: Patch 2.2 contains myriad additions and refinements to the realm of Eorzea. Players seeking the thrill of combat can face off with Leviathan or brave the new twists and turns of the Binding Coil. Artisans can try their hand at demanding new recipes, and master anglers can reel in legendary denizens of the deep. From new dealings with the beast tribes to new dances sweeping the land, there is much to see and more to do in the ever-changing realm of Eorzea!

name: Final Fantasy XIV: Defenders of Eorzea
summary: Patch 2.3 brings a myriad of additions and refinements to the realm of Eorzea including new story quests, a new primal battle, Frontline, the Hunt, and more!

name: Final Fantasy XIV: Dreams of Ice
summary: Patch 2.4 – Dreams of Ice adds a myriad of additions and refinements to the realm of Eorzea including new story quests, a new primal battle, dungeons, recipes, and more!

name: Final Fantasy XIV: Before the Fall
summary: Patch 2.5 brings a myriad of additions and refinements to the realm of Eorzea, including new story quests, a new primal battle, a new Frontline battle, and more!

name: Final Fantasy XIV: As Goes Light, So Goes Darkness
summary: Patch 3.1 brings a myriad of additions and refinements to the realm of Eorzea, including new story quests, new beast tribe quests, exploratory missions, and more!

name: Final Fantasy XIV: The Gears of Change
summary: Patch 3.2 brings a myriad of additions and refinements to the realm of Eorzea, including new story quests, new beast tribe quests, battle class adjustments, and more!

name: Final Fantasy XIV: Revenge of the Horde
summary: Patch 3.3 brings a myriad of additions and refinements to the realm of Eorzea, including new story quests, beast tribe quests, dungeons, recipes, and more!

name: Final Fantasy XIV: Soul Surrender
summary: Patch 3.4 brings myriad additions and refinements to the realm. Challenge seekers can test their mettle against fellow adventurers in duels and the Feast custom matches. Those who'd rather sit back and watch can enjoy the action with the new spectator mode. Whether you're relaxing in your new apartment or exploring the realm to collect wondrous tales, there's something for everyone here in Eorzea!

name: Final Fantasy XIV: The Far Edge of Fate
summary: Patch 3.5 brings a myriad of additions and refinements to the realm of Eorzea, including new story quests, dungeons, and more!

name: Final Fantasy XIV: The Legend Returns
summary: Patch 4.1 brings a multitude of additions and refinements to the realm. Band together with your friends in search of the legendary land of Ivalice, explore the ancient city of Skalla, or face an old foe in a reimagining of your battle with the legendary dragon Shinryu. Whether you’re relaxing in the new residential area, Shirogane, or testing your mettle in PvP, there’s something for everyone in this exciting new update!

name: Final Fantasy XIV: Rise of a New Sun
summary: Patch 4.2 brings a myriad of additions and refinements to the realm, including new story quests, the Duty Recorder, additions to the Feast, and more!

name: Final Fantasy XIV: Under the Moonlight
summary: Patch 4.3 brings a myriad of additions and refinements to the realm, including the second installment of the Return to Ivalice saga, cross-world linkshells, and more!

name: Final Fantasy XIV: Prelude in Violet
summary: Patch 4.4 brings a myriad of additions and refinements to the realm, including the continuation of the Four Lords and Omega sagas, new features such as mannequins and the Leap of Faith GATE, and more!

name: Final Fantasy XIV: A Requiem for Heroes
summary: Patch 4.5 includes a host of new features such as the very first limited job - blue mage, final chapters of the Four Lords saga and Return to Ivalice, and brand-new main scenario quests.

name: Final Fantasy XIV: Vows of Virtue, Deeds of Cruelty
summary: Patch 5.1 follows the Scions' continued adventures on the First, and features the first installment in the new alliance raid series, YoRHa: Dark Apocalypse, courtesy of guest creators Yosuke Saito and YOKO TARO!

name: Final Fantasy XIV: Echoes of a Fallen Star
summary: Patch 5.2 follows the Scions of the Seventh Dawn on their continued adventures, while the first chapter of the Sorrows of Werlyt marks the arrival of the deadly Ruby Weapon. This patch also brings the brand-new Qitari beast tribe quests, ocean fishing, and a host of additions and improvements.
developers: Square Enix Creative Business Unit III

name: Final Fantasy XIV: Reflections in Crystal
summary: Patch 5.3 brings a conclusion to the Shadowbringers story! This patch also brings the second installment of YoRHa: Dark Apocalypse, courtesy of guest creators Yosuke Saito and YOKO TARO. Other additions and refinements to the game include the addition of dwarf tribe quests, Faux Hollows, Unreal trials, and more!
developers: Square Enix Creative Business Unit III

name: Final Fantasy XIV: Futures Rewritten
summary: Patch 5.4 follows the Scions of the Seventh Dawn as they resume their adventures in the Source. This patch also brings a conclusion to Ryne and Gaia's journey in Eden's Promise. Other additions and refinements to the game include the next installment of the Sorrow of Werlyt quest series, the new Explorer Mode, and more!
developers: Square Enix Creative Business Unit III

name: Final Fantasy XIV: Death Unto Dawn
summary: In Patch 5.5 the stage is set for a cataclysmic battle that will lead into the story of Endwalker. This patch also introduces the third installment of YoRHa: Dark Apocalypse─the Tower at Paradigm's Breach─courtesy of guest creators Yosuke Saito and Yoko Taro, a new event to celebrate the Firmament's completion, and much more!
developers: Square Enix Creative Business Unit III

name: Final Fantasy XIV: Newfound Adventure
summary: Patch 6.1 follows the Warrior of Light's first steps on a new journey after claiming victory in the battle for the fate of the star. This patch also features the first installment in the new alliance raid series, Myths of the Realm, which delves into the mysteries surrounding the Twelve. A host of other additions includes the new Crystalline Conflict PvP content, the Duty Support system, and more.
developers: Square Enix Creative Business Unit III

name: Final Fantasy XIV: Buried Memory
summary: Patch 6.2 follows the Warrior of Light and their companions on a perilous journey into the void. This patch also introduces the next raid dungeon Pandæmonium: Abyssos, a challenging new trial, and Island Sanctuary for those adventurers seeking a taste of the slow life.
developers: Square Enix Creative Business Unit III

name: Fishing Ducks
summary: Let's go fishing for rubber ducks! A fun game that will transport you to the nostalgic fairground stalls, where you have to catch all the rubber ducks, using the fishing rods. Play alone or challenge your friends to see who can get the highest score. Per…

name: Fishao
summary: Fishao is an online fishing game that features a cute and very colourful theme that is very engaging. Players are presented with a huge open world to explore and plenty of special items such as fishing rods and tackle to collect that are designed to help give them the edge as they work towards the ultimate goal of winning the prestigious fishing tournament.

name: Fire Emblem: Code of the Burger King
summary: A tale of one knight’s quest for vindication after working far too long in fast food! With a campaign and planned 20 chapters and 6 gaidens! Play 34 characters pulling from across the Fire Emblem series, plus some surprises!

name: Find it! Mr. Pict of the Emergency Exit
Final Fantasy Tactics Advanced Battle
summary:
Final Fantasy Tactics Advanced Battle is a hack that brings monster taming to Final Fantasy Tactics Advance, and makes the whole experience centered around this mechanic.

The player can use a new item (the Capture Orb) to capture monsters which (unlike in the vanilla game) join the party and fight on your side. Additionally, all ways to get new humanoid party members have been disabled, the player needs to make do with only monsters and the two starting humanoid party members.

A new system to learn abilities is implemented, similarly to the original Final Fantasy Tactics the units will earn JP which they can spend directly on purchasing abilities. This is the only way the player has to teach new abilities to the monsters.

name: Fiend Folio: Reheated
summary: A fan made expansion mod for The Binding of Isaac: Rebrith that overhauls the game's floors, adds over 500 new enemies, 23 new bosses, 2 new characters and plenty of new items!

name: FiveSeven
summary: A horror game from the creators of Umurangi Generation.

name: Finterior Decorator
summary: Finterior Decorator is a game about filling up an aquarium with all the wonderful decorations and plants that keeps your fishy friends swimming and smiling! Be sure to keep these lil guys happy and healthy as you add to the aquarium.

name: Final Fantasy: Legend of Balance
summary:
Final Fantasy: Legend of Balance is a Final Fantasy fangame made in RPG Maker.
The game revolves around a group of heroes, champions of the realm of Eorzea. In the midst of an intense battle to decide the fate of Eorzea, the heroes are transported away before facing certain death at the hands of Bahamut. Finding themselves separated in a brand new world, the heroes begin a journey to reunite and find a way home. However what starts off as a simple quest quickly unfolds into a classic journey of crystals, great evil, and steadfast allies. Before this adventure ends, they will discover the truth behind this strange new world, and uncover the binds that tie it to their own home and beyond.

name: Final Fantasy Tactics Advance X
summary: Final Fantasy Tactics Advance X is a modification for the original game with increased difficulty and rebalanced jobs, mechanics, skills, and enemies.

name: Final Fight 3
summary:
Final Fight 3 is a pirated port of the SNES game of the same name, made by Hummer Team in 1998. This is Hummer Team's last game published under J.Y. Company.

This is a direct port of the SNES game. All four playable characters from the original game are present, as are most of the enemies, bosses, and rounds. However, the weaker enemies appear throughout the whole game.

name: Five Nights at Freddy's
summary:
Welcome to your new summer job at Freddy Fazbear's Pizza, where kids and parents alike come for entertainment and food as far as the eye can see! The main attraction is Freddy Fazbear, of course; and his two friends. They are animatronic robots, programmed to please the crowds! The robots' behavior has become somewhat unpredictable at night however, and it was much cheaper to hire you as a security guard than to find a repairman.

From your small office you must watch the security cameras carefully. You have a very limited amount of electricity that you're allowed to use per night (corporate budget cuts, you know). That means when you run out of power for the night- no more security doors and no more lights! If something isn't right- namely if Freddybear or his friends aren't in their proper places, you must find them on the monitors and protect yourself if needed!

name: Five Nights at Freddy's 2
summary:
Welcome back to the new and improved Freddy Fazbear's Pizza!
In Five Nights at Freddy's 2, the old and aging animatronics are joined by a new cast of characters. They are kid-friendly, updated with the latest in facial recognition technology, tied into local criminal databases, and promise to put on a safe and entertaining show for kids and grown-ups alike!

As the new security guard working nights, your job is to monitor cameras and make sure nothing goes wrong after-hours. The previous guard has complained about the characters trying to get into the office (he has since been moved to day-shift). So to make your job easier, you've been provided with your very own empty Freddy Fazbear head, which should fool the animatronic characters into leaving you alone if they should accidentally enter your office.

As always, Fazbear Entertainment is not responsible for death or dismemberment.

name: Fire!
summary:
This is "Fire!" for the Amstrad CPC released back in 1990 by New Deal Productions and developed by Luc Guillaume(code) and Elie Daniel(music).
It's another simple shooter in which you control a helicopter and all you have to do is to fly left or right, engage enemy planes and gun emplacements and destroy the with your rockets. Keep an eye on your fuel and shields because losing one of these your helicopter will become a ball of fire!

name: Five Nights At Furry's
summary: You, in the role of an FBI agent, must investigate the mysterious murders in the amusement park for the fury fans. For five days, watch the cameras looking for clues and unravel this case before it's too late.

name: Fighting Pride: The Manny Pacquiao Saga
Finding America: The Heartland - Collector's Edition
summary: Strap on your seatbelts for a trip to America's Heartland!

name: Fishing Planet: Deluxe Pack
summary: Skyrocket your angling progress and treat yourself to a truly deluxe fishing experience with the deluxe FP Pack! The Deluxe FP Pack features seven powerful Deluxe Edition rod and reel combos, along with superb Deluxe Edition fishing apparel!

name: Fishing Planet: Golden Dragon Pack
summary: Golden Dragon Pack featuring a deadly combination of tackle, equipment and even a Kayak - all decorated in the theme of the world’s most powerful legendary creature - the Golden Dragon Pack will back you with the support of ancient omnipotent forces!

name: Fishing Planet: World Bass Tour Pack
summary: Compete in catching the most popular American fish species with the help of World Bass Tour Pack, a set of tournament tackle carefully designed for the true bass professionals.

name: Fishing Planet: Crappie Valentine Pack
summary: Valentine's Day is a day to celebrate love and devotion to your one & only true passion - Fishing! And what better way to add more spark to this everlasting romance than to engage in a challenging tournament? Well...to win it, of course!

name: Fishing Planet: Golden Pack
summary: You get all the awesome Advanced & Deluxe tackle in their Golden edition, but also the most powerful Golden fishing equipment: including TEN monstrously powerful Golden Edition rod and reel combos, a set of prime quality Golden Edition fishing apparel and the awesome cherry-on-top Golden Kayak!

name: Final Boss
summary: Final Boss is a visual novel exclusively for adults! This game will immerse you headlong into the story of a guy who meets a nice girl at a party. This girl turned out to be a sexy girl who loves sex very much.

name: First Blood: Persian Legends
summary: First Blood : Persian Legends is a linear story-driven real-time-tactic strategy game based on ancient Persia, Sassanid Empire. Our story is heavily inspired by true events. Can you help saving the Sassanid Empire from within?

name: Firefly Cove
summary: Firefly Cove is a cozy open-ended dragon magic-ranch RPG! You’ve been brought to a parallel dimension by the forest spirit. Will you become a great magician, make new friends, and more? With a little spirit you might be the one whispered in legends.

name: Final Fantasy XV: Royal Pack
summary:
New Features:
・Insomnia City Ruins - new map leading straight to the game's climactic end
・First-Person View - mode allowing players to see Eos through Noctis's eyes
・Armiger Unleashed - powered-up combat mode
・Royal Cruiser - open-sea exploration, new fishing spots and recipes
・Regalia Type-D - new acquisition and enhancement quests
・Additional Achievements

name: Fighting EX Layer: Character - Terry
summary: Adds Terry Bogard character to the main game.

name: Find the Key
summary: A strange game with skeletons and giant aliens.

name: Fire Emblem: The Sacred Echoes
summary: Sacred Echoes is a demake of Fire Emblem Echoes: Shadows of Valentia for the GBA. This public release covers all of Shadows of Valentia’s 5 story acts, with 46 story maps, 1 gaiden chapter, and 8 repeatable maps. Some things are still in progress, but the latest release should address most of the remaining bugs.

name: Fields of Logic
summary: Complete all levels by using purely some logic. Get your brain into shape and start using your logical skills!

name: Fields of Mistria
summary: Start your new life! Build the farm of your dreams as you discover a world brimming with possibilities. Magic, romance, and adventure all await you in this nostalgic farming / life sim RPG!

name: Fish Bone
summary: As you land on a planet filled with water, you must survive, explore the world, take on missions from the underworld. or even robbed You can choose your own style of play.

name: First Time in Rome: Collector's Edition
summary: Kate and Nicole enjoy everything the city of Rome has to offer. Will Kate still find time to complete the assignment?

name: Five Nights at Freddy's 4: Halloween Edition
summary: This is the Halloween Edition of Five Nights at Freddy's 4, available free for a limited time. Enjoy the game all over again with new characters and new options!

name: Field Tactics
summary: Field Tactics is a Turn-Based Tactical War Simulator inspired by ancient warfare. Set up your formations, utilise a variety of tactics and lead your army to victory.

name: Fiend Heart
summary: A short game about monster girls.

name: Firestorm: Deep Dive
summary: Firestorm: Deep Dive is a first-person shooter survival game where you play as an elite member of Deep-Sea Diving Unit. Each player is equipped with K-78 Harpoon and the L-53 underwater Assault rifle to defend yourselves against the sharks.

name: FireTry: Cars Pack
summary: 21 new levels and 15 different types of cars are waiting for you. FireTry is even more fun with this dlc pack.

name: Fiend's Archive
summary: Investigate what happened in the village. Put the pieces together, find out what are you dealing with and send the evil creatures back to hell. First-person single-player horror game with an investigative story.

name: Finding Fifi
summary: A point&click puzzle game with a touch of Christmas.

name: Fight Angel Special Edition: Clothes Expansion Pack
summary: This DLC is the Costume Expansion Pack for the Fight Angels SE version, with over 80 brand new costumes built in, each one color-modifiable, breakable in combat, and applicable to all characters.

name: Fight Angel Special Edition: Realistic Pack
summary: This DLC provides the original version of realistic style character customization options. Players can choose realistic style character appearances, suitable for 10 built-in characters and custom characters. You can switch between the two styles at any time.

name: Find All 4: Magic
summary: Find over 1,000 cute animals and objects in a lot of levels of varying difficulty. The magical black and white world comes alive after coloring. Relax and enjoy playing.

name: Fishing Sim World: Pro Tour - Giant Carp Pack
summary: Featuring two incredible venues – the historic Wraysbury 1 South Lake and the incredible Gillhams Fishing Resort.

name: Fit Adventures Bundle
summary: Three fantasy, sci-fi and steampunk games in one bundle!

name: Fish Royale
summary: Eat or be eaten in this action-adventure game with puzzles to solve, secrets to find and epic bosses to defeat! You grow bigger for every fish you eat and you get new abilities and stats the more experience you get!

name: Fire Emblem: Souls of the Forest
summary: Fire Emblem: Souls of the Forest is a gameplay-focused ROM hack featuring over 50 unique units and over 20 maps. The hack features many diverse ways to play, 3 different difficulty options, over a dozen gameplay modifiers, many weapons to use, and matchup-dependent gameplay that will discourage juggernaut play and offer a challenge to those who want it.

name: Fishing Sim World: Pro Tour - Deluxe Edition
summary: Compete in career mode against over 100 pro anglers to become the best in the world. Play your way in custom multiplayer and online tournaments whilst using equipment from over 50 partners on real world venues targeting 29 different species of fish.

name: Fill the Cup
summary:
The objective of the game is simple: Fill the cup

There are 10 unique levels. Some challenging and some just pure fun all mixed in.

After you complete level 10 the game will enter a new mode, the time trial mode where you have a set amount of time to complete the level and progress to the next level.

Beyond level 20 the game will repeat over and over but giving you less and less time to complete the levels.

name: Fire Panic!
summary:
A fan-made remake of the classic Game and Watch game Fire.

Save the residents of the burning tower by catching them in your safety net and bouncing them into the awaiting ambulance. Dropping a resident on the ground will cost you a life. As you build up points, the game will speed up and you may be forced to juggle two, three or even four victims at a time.

Once the ambulance is full, rush them to hospital for treatment. Crashing the ambulance into other cars will damage it – ultimately the ambulance will break down and cost you a life. As your score increases, the traffic on the way to the hospital will become busier making accidents more common. Pick up the bonus coins to build your score.

name: Firefighting Simulator: The Squad
summary:
With Firefighting Simulator: The Squad, you can become part of a major US city's firefighting team and experience how it feels to fight fires.

Start the siren of your fire truck, grab your hose, and fight realistic fires to save lives. Discover over 40 diverse deployment locations spread across the city inspired by the North American West Coast. Equip yourself with authentic firefighting gear such as helmets, firefighter boots, and a breathing apparatus model by well-known North American firefighting equipment manufacturers.

name: Fisher-Price Dream Dollhouse
summary: Educational children's adventure/strategy PC game developed and published by Davidson & Associates, Inc. in 1995.

name: First Snow
summary: On the day the first snow fell, I fell in love with her at first sight. The days when the first snow falls, she and I get closer... First Snow is a full-voice visual novel about a 20-year-old protagonist's first love.

name: Five Nights at Pinkie's
summary: Five Nights at Pinkie's is a horror game where you are the night watcher at Pinkie's Cupcakes Corner. Your job is to watch ponies animatronics (kind of robots) during the night from 12am to 6am. But the ponies are moving and they don't have good intentions. Your weapons? Security cameras & doors with limited power. Will you survive 5 nights?

name: Fibble
summary: A daily word guessing game where players must reach a target word by continually guessing valid words. Each guess will reveal whether or not a letter in the guessed word is in the target word; however, one of the clues in every guess will be false.

name: Final Fantasy XVI: Deluxe Edition
summary:
Deluxe Edition includes the following:
- The base game
- Special Clive Steelbook Case
- Cloth map of Valisthea
developers: Square Enix Creative Business Unit III

name: FIFA International Soccer
summary: Game Boy port of FIFA International Soccer.

name: FIFA: Road to World Cup 98
summary: Game Boy port of FIFA: Road to World Cup 98.

name: FIFA: Road to World Cup 98
summary: Sega Saturn port of FIFA: Road to World Cup 98.

name: FIFA: Road to World Cup 98
summary: SNES and Sega Genesis port of FIFA: Road to World Cup 98.

name: Fire Emblem: Bells of Byelen
summary:
"Fire Emblem: Bells of Byelen" is a Mod of "Fire Emblem: The Sacred Stones".

Built with a telephone-hack system, Team Adversity worked together to build a mechanically rich and story dense custom campaign, with many inspirations taken from "Fire Emblem: Thracia 776", like capturing enemies, fatigue, leadership stars, stealing weapons and more. Bells of Byelen boasts 73 playable characters, 60 on any given playthrough, with 24 chapters and 3 interludes.

name: Final Fantasy XIV: Gods Revel, Lands Tremble
summary: Patch 6.3 introduces the next alliance raid dungeon Myths of the Realm, Part 2: Euphrosyne, a challenging new trial, the dungeon Lapis Manalis and a new arena in Crystalline Conflict.
developers: Square Enix Creative Business Unit III

name: Fire Emblem: Sacred Stones Plus
summary: This ROM hack aims to take all the hacks from the Fire Emblem GBA hacking community and put them into the base game experience. These are designed for veteran players and newcomers alike! The changes are intended to be uncontroversial enough so that this isn’t seen as an “alternate” way to play the game but an “enhanced” way. The major changes are QoL and bug fixes.

name: Find-a-frog
summary: Find all the frogs hidden in illustrations and photos submitted by froggy artists and fans!

name: FIFA Soccer 08
summary: The Wii port of FIFA Soccer 08.

name: Final Taptasy
summary:
The destiny of all the braves, save the kidnapped princess!

Our princess will be kidnapped by the Demon when taking your eyes off from her!

Be part of the journey to save the princess, the destiny that must be accepted by all the brave minds of the world! Strong companions and the power of mysterious treasures will be together in your adventure.

name: Fight the Dracula!
summary:
Fight the Dracula is a 2D Action Game where you fight Dracula. The gameplay itself is inspired by "I wanna be the Boshy" and or Mega Man.

You enter the stairway to Draculas' throne room where encouraging horses will tell you words of encouragement and sometimes gameplay hints. The fight itself is a high focus combat where you have to swiftly react to Draculas moves and hit him in the head (like in Castlevania) until he falls and dies!

The fight requires high focus and concentration as the smallest slip up can and will cause a untimely demise to the player character.

name: Firearms
summary: Firearms is a first-person shooter mod for Half-Life which originated from a Quake modification. Initially developed in 1998, Firearms was created as a quasi-realistic team-based FPS. The mod's main feature is the large amount of usable weapons in the game.

name: FIFA Soccer 06
summary: Game Boy Advance port of FIFA 06.

name: FIFA 2000
summary: Game Boy Color port of FIFA 2000.

name: Fire Emblem Fates: Anna on the Run
summary: Fire Emblem Fates: Anna on the Run is a downloadable content xenologue chapter in Fire Emblem Fates. Anna on the Run is part of the second series of Japanese DLC releases and the first series of international DLC releases.

name: FIFA Soccer 2003
summary: PlayStation port of FIFA 2003.

name: Five Nights at Konto's
summary: Fnaf inspired fan game for the Streamer kontoletzplay made in RPG Maker2003 by Florx

name: FIFA Soccer 2005
summary: Gizmondo port of FIFA Soccer 2005

name: Fish & Dagger
summary: You are a secret agent. It’s the end of the world. You are cursed. You came here to rescue your partner, but the mission has taken a turn for the weird. Parody spy thriller.

name: Find Mii
summary: Find Mii is a role-playing game. In this game, the player's Mii has been captured and it is up to the player to save him/her by battling their way through a series of rooms containing different enemies. Players use the Miis they have encountered, but can also use Play Coins to summon additional wanderers. Each Mii has a standard attack and a magic spell based on their color. For example, red Miis can cast flame spells whilst light blue Miis can freeze their opponents. Certain colored Miis are required to clear certain rooms, such as using a yellow Mii to break an enemy's yellow shield. If a Mii is encountered on StreetPass several times, their level in StreetPass Quest will increase, making them stronger, but only up to level 7. As the player progresses through the game, they can earn hats for their Mii to wear.

name: Find Mii II
summary: Find Mii II became available in December 2011 for players who had played through the first game at least twice. The sequel includes tougher enemies, multiple paths, and new hats. In addition to wanderers, players can now use Play Coins to hire up to three previously encountered Miis. In battle, similarly colored Miis can form teams to perform stronger combo attacks and spells. Play Coins can also be spent to use potions for various uses, such as clearing a room of gas. There is also a third secret quest that adds more difficulty to the StreetPass Quest II / Find Mii II maps that provides an additional set of hats that the player can win.

name: Fight or Lose
summary: In the game Horses & Pawns, the player controls a horse and needs to capture all pawns. Movement and capture happen like in a chess game. The horse moves by walking 2 squares in one direction and 1 in the other (the vertical and horizontal directions). To capture, the horse only needs to fall into the same house as a pawn. Every time the horse plays, pedestrians walk one house forward. If any pawn manages to leave the board, the player loses the game. If he captures them all, he gets 1 point and proceeds to the next challenge!

name: Five Nights at Freddy's: Sister Location - Custom Night
summary: Custom Night is a free content update to Five Nights at Freddy's: Sister Location.

name: Firefly Glow
summary: In the game, the player must tap the fireflies in the correct order to win.

name: Fish Story
summary: A clone of Feeding Frenzy.

name: Five Nights at Freddy's 3
summary:
This is the real FNAF3 hacked from Scott's site today!!!!

The "troll game" of Five Nights at Freddy's 3 is a joke game created by Scott Cawthon during the third game's development. Scott jokingly announced on Steam Greenlight that the third game was cancelled after someone "hacked" him and uploaded the game to Game Jolt for free. When starting the game, however, it turns out to be a simple reskin of one of Scott Cawthon's previous video games, There is No Pause Button!

name: Fish Tank Live
summary: Released in Sega Mega Drive Flashback.

name: Final Fight LNS Ultimate
summary:
Final Fight LNS is a beat'em up that mixes concepts and movements from both this genre and the fighting genre. It has a revolutionary and new combo system based on "cancelling", which allows us to link special movements within others, thus being able to perform a very high number of hits. The game is also designed so that its difficulty decreases considerably as we learn and run this system, so the learning curve is steep. In other words, the game will reward us as we learn to deal maximum damage to enemies.

The roster of playable characters consists of 120 (114 + 4 hidden + 2 super hidden) characters, combining fighters from several of Capcom's most successful sagas such as: Final Fight, Street Fighter II, Street Fighter III, Street Fighter IV, Street Fighter Alpha, Cadillacs and Dinosaurs, Captain Commando, Alien vs Predator, Battle Circuit, Punisher, Knights of the Round, Warriors of Fate, Marvel vs Capcom and Capcom vs SNK. Despite the wide repertoire, each character is balanced and arranged so that the playable experience is optimal, we choose the character we choose and we have chances to finish the game without continuing with any of the 120 characters and in any of the game modes.

name: Find the Birds
summary: Find the Birds is a free to play educational game about birds and conservation.

name: Fishy Dungeon Delving
summary: Explore a massive dungeon in style, as a land fish! Slide, jump, and swing your way to victory in this goofy physics based platformer.

name: Figures of Heroes
summary: The owner has been missing for some time, the other toys and game characters have grown restless. In search for answers the ancient texts were found and they are sparking adventure in the toys, they go to battle to find answers and delve in the owners realm further.

name: Firewall
summary: Hack your way out of a government-controlled city!

name: Final Fantasy III
summary: The PlayStation Portable version of Final Fantasy III 3D Remake features upgraded resolution for the PSP screen, optimized loading times and traditional button controls. While the content remains unchanged, the PSP release offers a smoother experience on handheld hardware with a more classic feel.

name: Fight Club: Join us if you can
summary: The fight club is a select secret group in which everyone wants to enter, but you will have to prove that you are worthy. Answer the questions of its members right without failing.

name: Find the Whales: Español
summary: A Spanish version of Find the Whales, an educational game about ocean conservation. Find simulated marine animals & learn how to help protect them from extinction!

name: Find the Whales
summary: Find the Whales is a free-to-play educational game for all ages about ocean conservation. Find marine animals and do conservation quests to help protect them & their habitats!

name: Final Fantasy XV: War for Eos
summary: Final Fantasy XV: War for Eos is an Android/iOS free-to-play game set in the universe of Final Fantasy XV. It features an alternate story which focuses on the rebuilding of Insomnia after the Niflheim Empire's attack.

name: Final 5
summary: Final 5 is a fast-paced mobile RPG action shooter. Dodge, shoot and upgrade to survive in a post-apocalyptic world. Gather skills that match your playstyle to advance through the horde!

name: FinalFort
summary: FinalFort is a survival game with defense as the core gameplay, and when the end comes, you use the last human shelter to constantly dig minerals, build walls and various turrets to defend against the endless zombie army.

name: Five Nights at Freddy's 4 VR
summary: Five Nights at Freddy's 4 VR is my take on the original game adapted into VR. Take full control of a child who must survive against animatronic nightmares until his birthday party using only a flashlight and his bedroom doors.

name: Fire
summary: Mario and Luigi attempt to catch Toads, Yoshis, and Donkey Kong Jrs. after they jump out the window of Princess Peach's burning castle. The catch is that different characters fall at different speeds: Toads bounce the highest, while Donkey Kong Jrs. bounce the lowest. Yoshi Eggs also appear and contain either a Bob-omb or a Moon (a Super Star in the first game); the eggs break open when they are caught or hit the ground. The player receives two points for catching an egg. If a Bob-omb reaches the carriage, everyone, including the Mario Bros., runs away as the carriage explodes, and the player gets a miss. If the Mario Bros. catch a Moon, the player receives five points. At 200, 500, and 700 points, Peach appears and blows a kiss, sending out a heart for Mario or Luigi to catch to remove a miss. Music is also featured in this version, with the tempo changing depending on the speed of the game.

name: Fire
summary:
Mario and Luigi attempt to catch Toads, Yoshis, and Donkey Kong Jrs. after they jump out the window of Princess Peach's burning castle. The catch is that different characters fall at different speeds: Toads bounce the highest, while Donkey Kong Jrs. bounce the lowest. Yoshi Eggs also appear and contain either a Bob-omb or a Moon (a Super Star in the first game); the eggs break open when they are caught or hit the ground. The player receives two points for catching an egg. If a Bob-omb reaches the carriage, everyone, including the Mario Bros., runs away as the carriage explodes, and the player gets a miss. If the Mario Bros. catch a Moon, the player receives five points. At 200, 500, and 700 points, Peach appears and blows a kiss, sending out a heart for Mario or Luigi to catch to remove a miss. Music is also featured in this version, with the tempo changing depending on the speed of the game. In the Game & Watch Gallery 4 version, the time of day changes every 200 points collected.

If the player selects this game in Game & Watch Gallery 4 yet does not start playing it, a humorous sequence plays. In particular, Mario and Luigi catch a Toad sent flying to the left and a Yoshi sent flying to the right, only to narrowly stop when discovering their next "rescue" was in fact a Bob-omb, which detonates inches from them, and are then forced to flee as a dozen Bob-ombs are raining from the sky.

name: Fire Attack
summary: The Modern version of Fire Attack involves Wario, who is trying to protect a giant golden statue of himself from a bunch of Bob-ombs and Bullet Bills. During his defense, however, Wario has to be careful not to hit any hens or apples, as they award him five and seven bonus points, respectively. The player is not penalized for hitting a hen or apple, but the player does get a miss if a Bob-omb or Bullet Bill manages to destroy parts of Wario's fort. However, Wario can remove a miss when he gets 200, 500, and 700 points by catching a heart coming from a Bill Blaster. It is Game Over if Wario's statue gets destroyed. This version also features music, with the tempo changing depending on the speed of the game.

name: Fish Kingdoms
summary:
One day, the Procrastinator lay flat in the living room, day-dreaming about all the great things they could do in the world...
Some fish showed up in the dreams, wearing costumes and makeups. Arms and legs grew out of their body as they charged one after another at something in the kitchen. One looked like Lü Bu and one looked like Zhang Fei. It was incredibly bizarre and strange, but somehow, they didn't want someone else to dictate their fate.

name: Find the Differences Detective
summary:
The Classic Find the differences now in digital format with funny images
Fun for everybody

name: Fishdom Solitaire
summary:
Never Fishdomed before? Take a deep breath and dive into an underwater world of card-based craziness with Fishdom Solitaire, an all-new free game!
Try challenging and fun solitaire gameplay as you decorate aquariums to create cozy homes for lovely, talking fish. Feed them, play with them, and watch them interact with each other. Your finned friends are waiting for you, so dive in now and enjoy this amazing underwater adventure!

name: First Letter
summary: Can you find the first letter in the scrambled word? That's the basic idea of FirstLetter.

name: Fish RPG
summary: Fish RPG borrows gameplay elements from The Walking Fish, a game the pioneered the world of fish gaming.

name: Finding America: The Pacific Northwest
summary: Explore the Pacific Northwest!

name: Finding Xavier
summary: A short adventure in which you will have to use precise platforming in order to find your cat, Xavier.

name: Fingers' Dating
summary: It's the happiest thing to do on a date with a girl, but maybe it's just you tonight.

name: Fist Tower
summary: Repair buildings with your fists. Reach higher floors!

name: Fire Emblem: Binding Blade Plus
summary:
The goal of this project is to take all the amazing hacks from the Fire Emblem GBA hacking community and put them into the base game experience. These are designed for veteran players and newcomers alike! The changes are designed to be uncontroversial enough so that this isn’t seen as an “alternate” way to play the game but an “enhanced” way. The major changes are QOL and bugfixes. The only gameplay changes come from removing localization changes.

Here are the changes present in all versions:

Adds Casual Mode
Unlocks Hard Mode at start
Prevent Misheal bug
Fimbulvetr glitch fix

name: Final Fantasy VII: Re-Imagined
summary: Final Fantasy VII: Re-Imagined is a project made by fans of the original game as an action game in the vein of 2D Side-scrollers, such as Dragons and Dungeons: Chronicles of Mystara, Streets of Rage and so on. You get to play as Cloud or Tifa in one level based on Midgar.

name: Fireflies
summary:
To survive In the deep, dark space, the fireflies must always reach out for the light! But it it’s not an easy task - lots of obstacles and enemies are in the way.
But do not have fear! We trust in you to guide these little friends to the truth.

name: Find the Bug
summary: Find the different bug and tag him. Perfect game to learn the differences.

name: Field of Glory II: Swifter than Eagles
summary: Smite your foes with bow and spear as you lead your mighty chariots to glorious victory. Swifter than Eagles extends Field of Glory II backwards to the dawn of “civilised” warfare, covering the period from 2500-681 BC.

name: Firework Simulator
summary: Play with a variety of fireworks and even make custom ones yourself using different containers, powders and colors.

name: Fight & Crush
summary: How about a rematch?

name: Final 5: Survival!
summary: Final 5 is a fast-paced, fun shooter, melee, time survival, adventure, action RPG game with roguelike elements. There’s no place else to run or hide, survival is your only goal.

name: Fish Volleyball
summary: You are a fish. You play volleyball. Up to 10 friends can flop around the volleyball court in this local multiplayer physics-driven arcade sports throwback.

name: Fighter's Rampage
summary: The ultimate Stickpage Fighter's Rampage; Featuring all of your favorite Stickpage characters!

name: File Destined
summary: Can this last case of Oliver, all be just a small part of a bigger picture? Gather clues, unravel the mystery behind the case and uncover the truth.

name: Fight Plane
summary: "Fight Plane" is a hard-core clear-cut shooting air combat game. Players control the fighter plane to shuttle through the sky full of bullets. While improving the fighter plane's ability, challenge powerful enemies at the same time!!!

name: First Cut: Samurai Duel
summary: Every strike is lethal in this blood-soaked sword fighting game. Slash, clash, parry, dodge and watch limbs fly. Choose your move carefully - the first cut is also the last.

name: First Sexy Night 2: Second Date
summary: You just lost your virginity to Ginny and the whole world of sexual possibilities is wide open. Short and intimate visual novel about one relationship and their journey of sexual exploration.

name: Fishbowl Kid
summary: Fishbowl Kid is an uplifting interactive story about coping with depression.

name: First Time in Hawaii
summary: The sun, the sea — and a wedding in peril!?

name: First Odium
summary: A prequel to Trash Vomit Studios first videogame "Victim". First Odium is a basic turn based RPG that explores the strange world of the Ominous Oppression from a differentiated minimalist perspective.

name: Five Nights at Tinky's
summary: Five nights at Tinky's is a indie horror game, where you apply for a job as a nightguard at the "Tinkys Lasagne Place". You only need to work for 5 nights to receive your payment, but soon you will find out that you are not alone... Can you survive the 5 nights?

name: First Report: Unreal
summary: You will have to investigate and find the exits while you are in the company of silence and emptiness. Will you be able to stay calm even when there are more questions than answers? Will you make it to the end? Good luck!

name: Five Nights At Smog's Poutinerie
summary: You are taking the guard night shift in a poutinerie located in The York. There is a unknown monster in the restaurant trying to get you.

name: Find the Murderer 3
summary: A young man has disappeared from his apartment. Detective Silantyev begins to investigate the case

name: Fincester Tower
summary: Overcome the dark and dangerous depths of Fincester Tower and piece together the truth of this world the deeper you go. Prepare, adapt and survive in this Hardcore, Roguelite First Person Dungeon Crawler inspired by the many greats of the early 2000’s.

name: Fingerbang: All Bullets Pointin'
summary: Fingerbang: All Bullets Pointin' is a fast-paced FPS inspired by both retro and modern FPS games. Fingerbang combines elements from each in order to create a mix of its own, with a scoring system added on top to gauge your performance through the different levels.

name: Final Factory
summary: Final Factory blends factory building with a rich universe to explore. Build a vast network of automated space stations and command a massive fleet against the hostile local aliens. Discover new technologies and unlock the secrets of an ancient civilization as you explore an infinite cosmos.

name: Fire Emblem: Engage - Expansion Pass: Wave 1
summary: Fire Emblem: Engage Expansion Pass - Wave 1 includes character – Edelgard, Dimitri, Claude and Tiki. Also includes in-game support items, In-game accessories and Silver card.

name: Fire Emblem: Engage - Expansion Pass: Wave 2
summary: Fire Emblem: Engage Expansion Pass - Wave 2 includes additional Emblem characters, in-game support items and new in-game accessories.

name: Fire Emblem: Engage - Expansion Pass: Wave 3
summary: Obtain Emblem Bracelets to Engage with more Emblem characters and get support items and new accessories with the Paid DLC for the Fire Emblem Engage game. Purchase and download the Fire Emblem Engage: Expansion Pass today for Wave 1 and meet Edelgard, Dimitri, and Claude (as a one Emblem Bracelet) and take on Divine Paralogues to get Tiki as an Emblem character. As more waves become available, you can test your mettle in even more Divine Paralogues, obtain Emblem characters and accessories, and experience a brand-new story with added characters and locations.

name: Fire Emblem: Engage - Expansion Pass: Wave 4
summary: Obtain Emblem Bracelets to Engage with more Emblem characters and get support items and new accessories with the Paid DLC for the Fire Emblem Engage game. Purchase and download the Fire Emblem Engage: Expansion Pass today for Wave 1 and meet Edelgard, Dimitri, and Claude (as a one Emblem Bracelet) and take on Divine Paralogues to get Tiki as an Emblem character. As more waves become available, you can test your mettle in even more Divine Paralogues, obtain Emblem characters and accessories, and experience a brand-new story with added characters and locations.

name: Fire Emblem: Engage Expansion Pass
summary: Obtain Emblem Bracelets to Engage with more Emblem characters and get support items and new accessories with the Paid DLC for the Fire Emblem Engage game. Purchase and download the Fire Emblem Engage: Expansion Pass today for Wave 1 and meet Edelgard, Dimitri, and Claude (as a one Emblem Bracelet) and take on Divine Paralogues to get Tiki as an Emblem character. As more waves become available, you can test your mettle in even more Divine Paralogues, obtain Emblem characters and accessories, and experience a brand-new story with added characters and locations.

name: Final Remedy
summary: You wake up in an unfamiliar snowy place, you don't know how you got there and you don't remember who you are. Find out the mystery, avoid or defeat the enemies and escape...Atmospheric, story-rich, post apocalyptic walking simulator with puzzle elements and crafting mechanics.

name: FinalCypher
summary: FinalCypher is a community-governed free-to-play team-based strategic hero FPS game developed by Station Zero X. FinalCypher utilizes bleeding-edge technology to empower players to truly own their in-game assets. Join the Kill-to-Earn era.

name: Fiz and the Rainbow Planet
summary: Control little dragons and explore a world full of gimmicks! Fiz and the Rainbow Planet" is a 2.5D dot-picture action game in which players switch characters in a resourceful manner as they progress.

name: First Person Hooper
summary: First Person Hooper is a skill based, arcade-style basketball game focused on the jump shot. Featuring first-person shooter controls with a lock-on system similar to modern FPS games, players can easily shoot the ball with power & timing mechanics relative to location on the court. Score with movement bonuses and get rewarded with power-ups for every swish and bank shot you make. Get shots up in a relaxed island setting and customize the court to fit your mood. Includes score, time-attack, and free play modes.

name: Fish Heroes
