name: Final Fantasy XIV: Dawntrail
summary: Final Fantasy XIV: Dawntrail is the fifth expansion pack to Final Fantasy XIV Online. The expansion will bring an abundance of fresh content, including an increased level cap, multiple new jobs, sprawling new areas, new allied tribes, new dungeons, and new core battle content such as FATEs, Hunts, Treasure Hunts, and sidequests, and much more.

name: Five Nights at Wario's 3
summary:
The third and final chapter in the Five Nights at Wario's trilogy, where you find yourself in a big mansion, hiding in different rooms every night, while you try to find your way out.

This game features a new mechanic never before seen in a FNAF game, being hiding. You choose between 2 different rooms to hide in, every night, with each night having its own mechanic and own characters. A total of 12 nights, Easter Eggs, and more!

name: Final Fantasy XIV: Growing Light
summary: Patch 6.5 introduces: new main scenario quests; the third installment from the alliance raid Myths of the Realm, Thaleia; a new trial, The Abyssal Fracture; a new dungeon, The Lunar Subterrane; a new Crystalline Conflict map, The Red Sands; a new Variant and Criterion dungeon, Aloalo Island, and more sidequests and sidecontent.
developers: Square Enix Creative Business Unit III

name: Five Nights With Mr. Hugs (& Friends)
summary:
(WARNING : Super serious game about super serious self-aware vacuums)

Welcome to Freddy Fazbear's bakery! We mainly deliver to Fazbear restaurants, but we also will make cakes for personal parties! (For a proper fee, of course)

We are currently hiring for a janitor to vacuum the filth from this establishment, as our air system has broken down. Our self-aware vacuum cleaners have also turned evil and try to eat up anything in the building (including you), so defend yourself if they come nearby.

name: FightBots
summary: You are a professional robot-athlete of FightBots, the most popular sport on the planet in 2125. Would you be able to be champion of the FightBots league?

name: Fire Emblem 8: Self-Randomizing
summary:
Romhack of Fire Emblem: The Sacred Stones by circleseverywhere.

Randomization options:

Tactician name as seed value
Random classes for players and enemies
Random Growths (& Bases)
Random Personal Skills
Random Weapon Stats
Random Chest and Event Items
Palettes That Might Be Janky Because That’s Part Of The Charm

name: Filling Up
summary: Luna and Rezzy are on a roadtrip, and need to get gas. Things escalate from there.

name: Final Flock
summary: Build a powerful flock and take to the skies to battle hordes of enemies. Glide and weave through perilous obstacles to gather resources and loot. Unlock powerful synergies and abilities to survive as long as you can.

name: FishOrChicken
summary: You can take your time and prepare your equipment beforehand! You can dive intently while avoiding enemies with a small amount of equipment! Be careful not to make too many items! You can have up to 16 items If you make too much, it might be a big deal. Aim for a high score!

name: Finding America: The Great Lakes
summary: Explore the beautiful areas surrounding the Great Lakes of America!

name: Fix Me Up Doc!: Dark Humor
summary: This is a parody game with dark humor, with such unbelievable graphics and so intense levels that you can even feel the smell.

name: Filler
summary: In Filler, your goal is simple: fill 2/3 of the level. To create a filler ball, press down. It will grow until you release the mouse button, it hits another filler ball, or a bouncing ball runs into it.

name: Fire Emblem: Legends of Avenir
summary: "Fire Emblem: Legends of Avenir is an incredibly distinct ROM hack that uses elements not utilized by the core series until later entries in the franchise such as Fire Emblem: Awakening. Most notably, prior to beginning the first chapter, a player is able to create their protagonist, choosing not just their gender and class, but also their background, altering the course of the game's story! Additionally, as this hack is filled with decisions for the player to make, the game features several route splits that greatly impact the trajectory of a player's experience, truly making your choices matter." - Paul DiSalvo

name: Fisher's Wharf
summary: ️ Welcome to Fisher's Wharf! ️ Dive into the pixelated world of fishing fun! Cast your virtual fishing rod and get ready for an epic adventure at the colorful Fisher's Wharf!

name: Five Nights at Freddy's: Help Wanted Plus
summary: Five Nights at Freddy’s: Help Wanted + is a mod for FNAF Help Wanted, that aims to bring back cut features from the original Help Wanted, and add in completely new levels and characters!

name: Fittest Fire
summary: In a ruined world, overrun by evil robots, a disabled cyborg named Blaze rests. Send a spark of energy from your world to Blaze’s to wake him up. Help Blaze take revenge against the robots in this fast paced 2D platformer where you workout to level up.

name: Fight! Olyn Island
summary: Explore the mysterious Olyn Island! Play against other players and use cute animal heroes towards victory!

name: Five Days of Hell
summary: A survival game in which you have to explore a desert canyon, face anomalies and various monsters.

name: Fights in Tight Spaces: Weapon of Choice
summary: Weapon of Choice is the first major content drop for Fights in Tight Spaces, and gives the player access to a new gun-fu inspired deck with 30+ new cards, new levels, music tracks, and a set of deadly new enemies.

name: Fire Shark
summary: Get ready for classic shoot-'em-up action in Toaplan's Fire Shark, now on PC with modern updates. An evil and overwhelmingly powerful military force is about to take over not only a small country, but the whole world... Defeat the enemy and accept your place of honor!

name: Fishing: North Atlantic - A.F. Theriault
summary: Expand your fishing fleet with the brand-new official DLC for Fishing: North Atlantic

name: Final Resistance
summary: Fortress Besieged is a cartoon style game that combines strategy and leisure. You need to control a castle surrounded by various monsters, collect resources, make equipment, and arm your warriors to defend it to the end in this prison like castle!

name: Final Fantasy: Sky Warriors
summary: An interesting twist on the background history of the original Final Fantasy! This game feature what happened 200 years before the original Final Fantasy 1 for the NES, featuring an unexpected cast of characters otherwise known as the 'Sky Warriors' in the canon game. Witness the catastrophe of the four Fiends of Elements making their grand entrance into the Final Fantasy world, and experience the Lufenian response!

name: Fizzy Factory
summary:
Step into the soda factory to play the most addictive puzzle game on the market.
You are faced with the tasty task of transporting soda from our naturally flowing soda geysers to color-coded soda bottles. The gameplay is simple. Just drag your finger to move soda around the board. Red soda goes in the red bottle. Easy enough, right?
Sure. At least until you have to mix the blue and yellow soda to fill the green bottle.
This factory is outfitted with the latest in soda making technology. Slide that blue soda through the red Color Station, and we’ve got purple soda! We can even run that orange soda through a Splitter for more red and yellow soda!

name: Five Nights at Roblox 2 RePartyin
summary: It’s been awhile ever since Roblox Chill Hangout was shutdown. Even after 2 shutdowns, Blox Entertainment still wants to continue making more places. With NPCs becoming smarter, Blox Entertainment want to move forward with this technology creating newer and better bots. Roblox Corp gives them one more chance. Roblox Party Area was born.

name: Finger Maniac
summary:
How fast are your fingers?? Just how fast can you type the alphabet?

Over 40 levels of finger typing fun! Can you type out all the words within the given time? Watch out as the words get tougher and longer as you move up the levels! Again, be accurate!!

name: Fi-Knight Kingdom
summary: Challenge your friends in this Local Multiplayer RPG Board Game hybrid. Choose a starting class that fits your playstyle. Encounter lots of enemies, fight strong boss monsters and collect gold to buy powerful dice and pieces of equipment to get the upper hand on your opponents.

name: Finger Football: Goal in One + Two
summary: Take aim and shoot and these two great finger football games!

name: Finding Anastasia
summary: Finding Anastasia is a 3D first person horror game. You have to find missing girlfriend Anastasia.

name: Fishing Guy
summary: This is a casual design game. In the game, players can catch a variety of fish with the cannon, including small fish, large sharks, and more. With beautiful graphics, realistic sound and innovative gameplay, it's a casual game for all ages.

name: Fishing Planet: Topwater Kayak Pack
summary: Tired of sitting with a fishing rod on the shore? Then Topwater Kayak Pack is what you need! It contains not only spinning and casting rods, powerful reels, wobblers, frogs, and many other surface lures, but also a branded kayak that will allow you to fish literally anywhere on the waterway!

name: Fit Puzzle Blocks: Expansion Pack
summary: This DLC adds more than 200+ puzzles to the base game.

name: First Steps
summary: Unite with friends or compete against them in our sci-fi themed Third Person Shooter! Enjoy 3 game modes - Free for All, Team Death Match, and Capture the Flag. Master various cutting-edge weapons. Host or join online lobbies for endless multiplayer fun!

name: Five Nights at Freddy's Simulator
summary:
You're not the nightguard, in FNaF: Simulator you play as the animatronics!
Get to experience FNaF from a variety of animatronic POV's within a multitude of locations in the beloved FNaF franchise.

name: Five Nights With 39
summary:
You have been called out, by a teal animatronic bunny with glasses, his name is 39.
He has a strange personality, something you wouldn't see in your average animatronic, he's foul, he's roudy, he's stupid, and he's coming for you! Survive his random movements, and his little pal that will surely end you if you are not quick enough, boop his nose to keep him away!

name: Finity
summary:
Welcome to Finity: a thoughtful, handcrafted matching game.

A few rules lead to endless strategy, flow, and exciting close calls.

1. Tiles wrap around.

2. Slide rows or columns to match 3.

3. Moves are limited, so think carefully!

Climb the leaderboards as you level up your skills to unlock challenging special tiles, power ups, and new themes to suit your mood in Classic Mode.

Or swipe over to Tempo Mode and get lost in music while you make swift matches and find your flow.

Finity will continue to expand and evolve over time, so look out for updates soon.

name: FIFA Manager 2023
summary: A mod of the EA FIFA Manager 2013 bringing players and clubs from 2023 to the orginal game that is no longer continued by EA Sports.

name: Five Nights at Freddy's: Security Breach - Chaos Mod
summary: Welcome to the Chaos Mod, chaos in its purest form! This is just pure chaos, there are a total of over 30 random events! Lots of surprises are waiting for you. So are you ready, Gregory?

name: Fistagon
summary:
Compete in the futuristic Fistagon-tournament against the best atheletes in the world!
Play in multiplayer to crush other fisters around the world or in single player to top the global leaderboards. Fistagon is a game that's easy to learn, but hard to master.

name: Find Up!
summary: Find the differences between two images. Export images as wallpapers. Built-in game editor allows players to make their own game content. Support Steam workshop to share the ugc content.

name: First Strike: Multiplayer
summary: The multiplayer mode for First Strike is here! Wage nuclear war against other players from all over the world and nuke the Earth into nuclear Armageddon together. Will you be the last one remaining when the whole world blows to smithereens?

name: Fire Chief
summary: Help the fire chief get to the building fire before it's to late, and then help the fire chief rescue computer disks from a burning building.

name: First Up
summary: Race to the summit with friends in "First Up" – the ultimate climbing showdown! Show off your skills, outsmart rivals, and use unique character abilities in this strategic, multiplayer adventure. Whether you're a pro climber or a newbie, it's time to conquer the heights and be "First Up"!

name: Fishman's Last Stand
summary: Brace yourself for a fight ahead, as humans set their sights on your land. Their unwavering determination fuels their pursuit, and they'll stop at nothing to claim it. Stand your ground with unwavering resolve, knowing that your defense holds the key to safeguarding your territory

name: Fishing Echoes
summary: Step into the cozy realms of Fishing Echoes, a game that beckons you to shorelines filled with rare fish and whispered legends. Ready yourself for the ultimate angling challenge as you embark on a journey to mastery.

name: FireKrackers
summary: Grab a firecracker and try to clean up the board as quick as possible. You can chain-destroy similar blocks together, use different kinds of firecrackers and rockets.

name: Fire Breakout
summary: Fire breakout is a fire-themed simulation game, which aims to restore the real daily fire scene, through the fire phenomenon in the game scene, with the help of tools, players can judge and deal with fire accidents.

name: Fight Bingo
summary:
Five lines Bingo fight.
You can play with a powerful AI.
Five lines to win!

name: Fight Crab 2
summary: Flip your opponents on their backs in this crustacean wrestling fighting game! Come up with your own strategies and use the deceivingly deep physics engine to your advantage. Challenge mighty foes in Career Mode, or pit your crab against others in online multiplayer.

name: Fighting cop
summary: “Fighting cop " is an exciting VR shooting game that gives you the experience of becoming a hero of the entire city. In this city, gang criminals are prevalent, and you are a rare sharpshooter in the police community. Your mission is to combat criminals and protect the safety of citizens.

name: Fishyphus
summary: Traverse an impressionistic sea, listening for predator and prey. Cast a lure and feel their cues to reel them in. The reaper slowly tracks your movements, who you must outmaneuver to survive.

name: Five Nights at Freddy's
summary:
Welcome to your new summer job at Freddy Fazbear's Pizza, where kids and parents alike come for entertainment and food as far as the eye can see! The main attraction is Freddy Fazbear, of course; and his two friends. They are animatronic robots, programmed to please the crowds! The robots' behavior has become somewhat unpredictable at night however, and it was much cheaper to hire you as a security guard than to find a repairman.

From your small office you must watch the security cameras carefully. You have a very limited amount of electricity that you're allowed to use per night (corporate budget cuts, you know). That means when you run out of power for the night- no more security doors and no more lights! If something isn't right- namely if Freddy bear or his friends aren't in their proper places, you must find them on the monitors and protect yourself if needed!

Can you survive five nights at Freddy's?

name: Five Nights at Freddy's 2
summary:
Welcome back to the new and improved Freddy Fazbear's Pizza!

In Five Nights at Freddy's 2, the old and aging animatronics are joined by a new cast of characters. They are kid-friendly, updated with the latest in facial recognition technology, tied into local criminal databases, and promise to put on a safe and entertaining show for kids and grown-ups alike!

What could go wrong?

As the new security guard working nights, your job is to monitor cameras and make sure nothing goes wrong after-hours. The previous guard has complained about the characters trying to get into the office (he has since been moved to day-shift). So to make your job easier, you've been provided with your very own empty Freddy Fazbear head, which should fool the animatronic characters into leaving you alone if they should accidentally enter your office.

As always, Fazbear Entertainment is not responsible for death or dismemberment.

name: Five Nights at Freddy's 3
summary:
Thirty years after Freddy Fazbear's Pizza closed it's doors, the events that took place there have become nothing more than a rumor and a childhood memory, but the owners of "Fazbear's Fright: The Horror Attraction" are determined to revive the legend and make the experience as authentic as possible for patrons, going to great lengths to find anything that might have survived decades of neglect and ruin.

At first there were only empty shells, a hand, a hook, an old paper-plate doll, but then a remarkable discovery was made...

The attraction now has one animatronic.

name: Five Nights at Freddy's 4
summary:
This time, the terror has followed you home.

In this last chapter of the Five Nights at Freddy's original story, you must once again defend yourself against Freddy Fazbear, Chica, Bonnie, Foxy, and even worse things that lurk in the shadows. Playing as a child whose role is yet unknown, you must safeguard yourself until 6am by watching the doors, as well as warding off unwanted creatures that may venture into your closet or onto the bed behind you.

You have only a flashlight to protect yourself. It will scare away things that may be creeping at the far end of the hallways, but be careful, and listen. If something has crept too close, then shining lights in its eyes will be your end.

name: Five Nights at Freddy's: Sister Location
summary:
Welcome to Circus Baby's Pizza World, where family fun and interactivity go beyond anything you've seen at those *other* pizza places! With cutting-edge animatronic entertainers that will knock your kids' socks off, as well as customized pizza catering, no party is complete without Circus Baby and the gang!

Now hiring: Late night technician. Must enjoy cramped spaces and be comfortable around active machinery. Not responsible for death or dismemberment.

Don't hold it against us.

name: Fix the Lab!
summary: Lucas, a newly hired young scientist's assistant, accidentally turns the lab into chaos! Now he must retrieve the gears to fix the machines before his boss returns.

name: Filled to the Limit
summary: ​A newspaper ad inspires a girl to become a test subject for a tube-feeding machine, and must reach her full capacity!

name: Five Nights at Candy's DX
summary:
No company is without a rival.

Freddy Fazbear's New Pizzeria has closed for good. And so, another restaurant is going to take its place in the world of entertainment.

What could go wrong?

name: Five Nights at Candy's 2 DX
summary:
Rebuilt. Enhanced. Upgraded.
We brought joy to many, but that was long ago.
Broken. Fractured. Damaged.
In the end, we ended up where we came from.

name: Five Nights at Candy's 3 DX
summary:
"I've always liked it when it rains...
the rain makes the silence go away,
it feels comfy and relaxing.
I don't like the silence
the silence means they're hiding
if they're hiding, they're coming closer
and if they come closer
they'll hurt me, for what I did- didn't do...
for what I couldn't do"

name: Final Fantasy X: Fantasy War
summary: An unlicensed game for the Game Boy Color, loosely based on the Final Fantasy series of RPGs.

name: Finding Frankie
summary: Finding Frankie invites you to participate in Frankie's terrifyingly twisted parkour game show. Stealthily navigate around horrifying characters, tackle obstacle courses, and swing and wall-jump through challenging parkour courses! This is a game show you wouldn't want to miss!

name: Filter
summary: Filter merges fast-paced 2.5D action with advanced, yet accessible, movement mechanics. Offering online PvP through rollback netcode and a transparent MMR system, FILTER caters to casual and pro players alike. A rich single-player campaign and unlockable character customization.

name: Firefighter Connor
summary: Firefighter Connor is a linear narrative visual novel that tells a story in a modern world where humans and furries coexist. The player will play the role of Luo Geng, who is 22 year-old, eligible for marriage registration, and somehow ends up with a marriage with a furry firefighter named Connor.

name: Fitness Boxing feat. Hatsune Miku
summary:
A continuation of the Fitness Boxing series with Hatsune Miku as the main instructor along with Rin and Evan from Fitness Boxing to fully support the different game options.

The game has the normal modes from the previous games along with the new "Mixercise" mode that uses songs from past games along with original songs different characters including Hatsune Miku, Kagamine Rin, Kagamine Len and Megurine Luka.

Hatsune Miku has costume options in-game and Piapro is looking for more songs, costumes and illustrations to use as part of the collaboration.

name: Final Fantasy VII Rebirth: Digital Deluxe Edition
summary:
Content of the Digital Deluxe Edition:
・ Final Fantasy VII Rebirth main game
・ Digital art book
・ Digital mini soundtrack
・ Summon Materia: Magic Pot
・ Accessory: Reclaimant Choker
・ Armor: Orchid Bracelet
developers: Square Enix Creative Business Unit I

name: Final Fantasy VII Rebirth: Deluxe Edition
summary:
Content of the Deluxe Edition:
・ Final Fantasy VII Rebirth main game
・ Mini art book
・ Mini soundtrack
・ Steelbook
developers: Square Enix Creative Business Unit I
publishers: Square Enix Creative Business Unit I

name: Final Fantasy VII Rebirth: Collector's Edition
summary:
Content of the Collector's Edition:
・ Final Fantasy VII Rebirth: Deluxe Edition (includes: mini art book, mini soundtrack, steelbook)
・ Sephiroth Static Arts figure
・ Moogle Trio Summoning Materia (DLC)
・ Magic Pot Summoning Materia (DLC)
・ Accessory: Reclaimant Choker (DLC)
・ Armor: Orchid Bracelet (DLC)
・ Armor: Midgar Bangle Mk. II (DLC)
developers: Square Enix Creative Business Unit I

name: Final Fantasy VII Remake & Rebirth: Twin Pack
summary: This is a combined set of Final Fantasy VII Remake Intergrade and Final Fantasy VII Rebirth, the two first entries in the trilogy of the Final Fantasy VII remake project.
developers: Square Enix Creative Business Unit I

name: Final Fantasy VII Remake & Rebirth: Digital Deluxe Twin Pack
summary:
Digital Deluxe Twin Pack Contents:
・ Final Fantasy VII Remake Intergrade main game
・ Final Fantasy VII Rebirth main game
・ Digital art book
・ Digital mini soundtrack
・ Summon Materia: Magic Pot
・ Accessory: Reclaimant Choker
・ Armor: Orchid Bracelet
developers: Square Enix Creative Business Unit I

name: Final Fantasy XI: Rhapsodies of Vana'diel
summary: Released across the May, August, and November 2015 version updates, Rhapsodies of Vana'diel is designed to be the conclusion of the main scenario missions of Final Fantasy XI, tying together plotlines and characters from across the game's previous stories. Completing the missions requires registration of and progression through all previous expansion packs. Other additions include the new areas Escha and Reisenjima and new trusts.

name: Final Fantasy Sonic X: Episode 1
summary: The first installment to the FFSX series.

name: Final Justice
summary: Japanese indie beat'em up for PC.

name: Final Exerion
summary: Call on CELLs, change your weapon, and shoot however you want!

name: Fish Survivor: Feed, Grow and Evolve!
summary: Dive into an epic underwater world in "Fish Survivor," where you'll start as a small fish and embark on an exciting survival journey. Hunt, feed and grow into super-sized sea creatures as you explore an amazing underwater playground, all while evolving and gaining new abilities along the way.

name: Fire Water Green
summary: This is a 30-second survival shooting game. You shoot with the mouse for direction and move your ship with WASD. There are 3 attributes: fire, water and green, and 3-way deadlock.

name: Fit the Shape!
summary: When the last square reach the main square you better fit the shape.

name: Five Nights on the Toilet: Number 2
summary:
A comedy parody of the Five Nights at Freddy's indie horror series, and the sequel to Five Nights on the Toilet.

Survive five nights upon a toilet in an abandoned Freddy Fazbear's location, and investigate what events brought the story to where it is now.

Features first person sit and survive horror gameplay, with many levels, secrets, and challenges.

name: Five Nights on the Toilet
summary:
A comedy parody of the Five Nights at Freddy's indie horror series.

Survive five nights upon a toilet in a Freddy Fazbear's location, and find clues as to what's really happening that week.

Features first person sit and survive horror gameplay, with many levels, secrets, and challenges.

name: Fine Artist Color Pixel Number
summary:
Draw great pixel arts easily with numbers
Relax yourself with Fine Artist App!
Make some great drawings very easily, just select a model with a touch on the top middle button, and paint it very quickly. You pick up a colour at the bottom of the app, and you press on the corresponding number. Draw each number until all done and enjoy a very cool pixel art by yourself.
You share it to your friends by clicking on Share button only when you are satisfied of your work.

name: Five a Side Football 2024
summary: The world’s fastest, most fun five-a-side management game is back! In Five A Side Football 2024 you can take control of comedy versions of your favourite team or cast your mind back to a time before the Premier League and take on a retro challenge. Whether you're chasing the league trophy with a team of superstars, attempting to turn a mid-table squad into champions, or saving a struggling bunch from relegation; the fate of your team and your job is in your hands!

name: Fishing the Deep
summary:
Fish the deepest depths of the ocean with this Nintendo DS Homebrew Game!

Created in 48 hours for the Ludum Dare 48 Compo Event.

name: Filly Astray
summary: A platforming adventure game with a new take on combos, dare you adventure into the world of Filly Astray and face the monsters and mayhem within?!

name: Five Nights with Mac Tonight
summary: Five Nights with Mac Tonight is a fan-made Five Nights at Freddy's game made by Photo Negative Mickey, Lampz and ThatOneWankEngine.

name: Firebowl
summary: FireBowl is an Arcade Multiplayer game inspired by the classics. It is set in High Fantasy world with all the classic characters such as Halflings, Wizards or... Toilets? Join the party and discover the number one sport of the Middle Ages.

name: Field of Honour
summary: Field of Honour is a single-player game that combines elements of first-person shooter and strategy, set in the Napoleonic Wars. You can take command of massive battles or engage as a single soldier to defeat the enemy in various game modes.

name: Firerainbow
summary: Firerainbow is a small (9 main maps, 1 underhall and 2 secret maps) MBF21 community project originally hosted in @Meowgi discord server by Petyan. The WAD name has something to do with the award-winning legendary FIREBLU texture but with a twist - FIREBLU has been recolored into a huge variety of colors including a whole rainbow.

name: Fiend
summary: Quickly dig graves and run for your life while solving puzzles to solve the mystery of the Wendigo

name: Figurality
summary: Figurality - A game with a choice of actions, by controlling the mouse cursor you must guide it to the correct figure before you hit the wall, the further you progress the more difficult the figures become.

name: Fish Game
summary: Fish Game is a detailed and highly “sofishticated” aquarium simulator, lovingly crafted *by* enthusiasts *for* enthusiasts! Featuring fish with personalities and dynamic relationships, water quality modeling, and so much more! Made with support from our friends at Smarter Every Day!

name: Final Fantasy XI: Ultimate Collection
summary:
This bundle includes Final Fantasy XI Online and its four first expansions:

-Rise of the Zilart
-Chains of Promathia
-Treasures of Aht Urhgan
-Wings of the Goddess

As well as three add-on scenarios:
-A Crystalline Prophecy - Ode of Life Bestowing
-A Moogle Kupo d'Etat - Evil in Small Doses
-A Shantotto Ascension - The Legend Torn, Her Empire Born

Everything is included on a single DVD.

name: Five Night At Freddy's: Security Breach - Glamrock Factory
summary: You and your friend decide to go to the Megaplex Factory, to explore the premises and steal a few things. But not everything goes according to plan...

name: Final Fantasy 2.0
summary: "Final Fantasy 2.0" is a turn-based RPG inspired by the renowned Final Fantasy franchise. Explore a fantastical world, choose from a variety of unique classes, and engage in strategic battles. Dive into an epic adventure where imagination and strategy come together to create a captivating gaming experience. Moreover, you'll have the opportunity to traverse the worlds of other beloved franchises. This is a fan-made game, crafted with passion and admiration for the original series.

name: Final Fantasy I & II: Mod of Balance
Fire Emblem: Void's Blitzarre Adventure Hack
Fishing Hook
summary: Fishing Hook is a fishing game for you to enjoy the feelings of real fishing as it is.

name: Fights in Tight Spaces: Complete Edition
summary: Fights in Tight Spaces: Complete Edition

name: Five Nights at Freddy's Area 51
summary:
After the closing of Freddy Fazbears Pizza, Polices has realized the animatronics moved on their own.... they have been taken to a facility for a check.
You have gotten a job to keep an eye on them through the night. You must use the high tech systems to protect yourself against the animatronics!

name: Fire Emblem: Deity Device
summary:
Deity Device is a heavily story driven romhack of Fire Emblem: The Sacred Stones created by the user Permafrost. The game begins with a young noblewoman on a pilgrimage with her band of knights, but she is diverted when her brother is kidnapped, gradually being drawn into the larger plot. Both the gameplay and story are strongly inspired by Genealogy of the Holy War; with a focus on large maps and political schemes.

The game features:
-39 Main Story Chapters and 10 Gaiden Chapters
-A smaller more developed cast of 26 playable units
-An all new magic system

name: Finite State Automaton Challenges
summary: In this game, we will play with the simplest automaton model, Finite State Automaton, and use it to cope with 30 challenges.

name: Final Fantasy
summary: The first Final Fantasy game ported for the Game Boy Advance in the Final Fantasy: Dawn of Souls compilation released in 2004. It has new content, different mechanics and a bestiary added to the game.

name: Final Fantasy II
summary: The second game in the Dawn of Souls compilation for the Game Boy Advance released in 2004. This remake of the original Final Fantasy II has updated mechanics, a new playable scenario and a bestiary.

name: Fitment
summary: A fitness mobile game for microworkouts. Get motivated to exercise a few minutes a day with Fitment. Collect new moves, items and decorate your world.

name: Fireblue Jam
summary: A once-sealed evil has found new life in the realms of Quake! Blast your way through 11 maps featuring the most infamous texture from DOOM, FireBlu! Made using Dumptruck_ds's Speedmapping Progs

name: Fight or Flight VR
summary: Fight and fly across vast alien worlds in Fight or Flight, a VR-exclusive FPS where physics-based locomotion and high-powered weaponry meet. Utilize a jetpack for tactical combat or swift escape in this high-octane shooter. Every moment demands a decision - will you fight or will you flee?

name: Five Nights at Treasure Island 2: Original Revamp
summary: You're Greg, you've been working on Treasure Island for a good few months, until, one day, your boss signs you up for another position, you're going to work in Treasure Island's main power building which supplies power for the Island's attractions and lights, you're a night guard in there for 5 nights due to recent reports of suspicious activity. Your job is to find out what's happening there. Nothing will go wrong right? On an island of Disney Dreams.

name: Fire on the Mountain
summary: Fire on the Mountain is a 5 map limit-removing episode for Doom II and is my first proper mapset. Difficulty is slightly above Doom II, so this WAD should be fairly easy going.

name: Fifth World
summary: This is a very interesting puzzle game.

name: Fish Flop
summary: Fish Flop is a fun, physics-based adventure where one fish must escape a fish market, and get back home to the sea!

name: Five Nights at Treasure Island: Room Zero
summary: Five Nights at Treasure Island: Room Zero is the upcoming Five Nights at Treasure Island and Five Nights at Freddy's fan-game

name: Fiora Arc
summary: Go through the complex life of B as he struggles to balance his life between the island that calls to him, and fighting his way to the top of the gangs of Cardigan.

name: Finding America: New England
summary: Explore scenic landscapes, uncover hidden treasures, and immerse yourself in the rich history of this iconic region.

name: Fitness RPG
summary: Train your team of heroes as you exercise, the more activities the stronger your heroes become! Let’s take on the challenges, and embark on the journey of becoming the new best you!

name: Finding Nemo
summary: Finding Nemo is a platformer for the Sega Mega Drive made by Glorysun, and a simple graphical hack of James Pond, originally developed by Vectordean Ltd, Millenium Interactive and Electronic Arts.

name: Fishing Minigame 2
summary: The pseudo-visual novel sequel to the first Fishing Minigame is here! The hero Roselle decides to re-visit the Fishing Shrine to have a good time and finds herself enraptured by the minigame, to the dismay of the shrine's sage and another visitor. Dark Lord? Who cares about that fella?

name: Five Nights at Freddy's AR Lite
summary: Five Nights at Freddy's AR Lite is a recreation of Five Nights at Freddy's AR Special Delivery, without any augmented reality.

name: Find the Pairs Memo Game for Kids
summary: No friend nearby to play with? Then just play Find the pairs of picture cards against an intelligent, funny cat!

name: First Crusader
summary: Determine the fate of the Crusaders in this history-based visual novel game. Be the leader of the Christians or the leader of the Turks. Choose your own path in a story where every decision matters. You will change the history of this Crusade.

name: Five Nights at Sonic's 2
summary: Welcome to the new and improved Sonic's Hero Pizza Palace! Here you will find 4 of the most recognizable heroes of the 1990's except that they are animatronics. The clones were a little spoiled, so we left it. Do not worry. Even if you work at night, nothing should go wrong.

name: Five Nights at Sonic's 3
summary: Welcome to the Sonic's Heroes Pizza! Ten years after we closed, we reopened... We hope nothing else goes wrong..

name: Five Nights at Sonic's 4
summary: Welcome … We enjoyed your stay earlier... But now we are back for revenge...

name: Five Nights at Sonic's 5: The First Chapter
summary: Welcome to Soniс's Fast Food Diner! Here you can see Soniс himself on a day of fun! It's pretty fun!... If you work here at night..."

name: FireBall 2
summary: Fireball 2 is an elegant and satisfying arcade-survival game about dodging swarms and triggering bombs. Take control of your fireball and weave through the massive flood of enemies. Lure the flood towards bombs and trigger them, either directly or indirectly, to take out as many enemies as possible.

name: Five Day Detective
summary: The Five Day Detective is a point n click whodunnit featuring multiple cases and a twisted sense of humour.

name: Fire Emblem: Drums of War
summary:
A familiar sun set over foreign soil. The Aulestri pulled back, leaving swathes of their own behind, their fierce legions left broken against the rag-tag militias of the Federal Guard.
It wasn’t enough. It would never be enough. Tomorrow, the legions would resume the attack; rested, reinforced, against starving, demoralised and desperate conscripts. Tomorrow, the Guard would break…

FE: Drums of War is a full campaign total conversion hack, that implements a wide array of custom graphics, QoL patches and unique objectives, while still operating within the non-SkillSys GBAFE framework. It features 22 chapters, a cast of 46 playable characters and over 50 complete support chains, as well as a number of non-essential secrets. It aims to tell a nuanced, grounded story, without reverting to tired cynicism; no matter how dark the hour, it is strength to be found in each other, and a new day will always come.

In gameplay, emphasis is placed on decisive, aggressive play to deal with tight, hard-hitting enemy formations that will overwhelm passive play and outflank lowmanning. It is probably closest in difficulty to Radiant Dawn’s Normal mode, or the Hard/Classic setting of more recent titles, and is designed to be ironman-friendly with clear signposting, a tough lord, and a constant stream of available recruits. An easier campaign with Casual Mode implementation is planned for a future release.

name: Final Fantasy Sonic X: Episode 2
summary: The second installment to the FFSX series.

name: Final Fantasy Sonic X: Episode 3
summary: The third installment to the FFSX series.

name: Final Fantasy Sonic X: Episode 5

name: Final Fantasy Sonic X: Episode 6
summary: The sixth installment to the FFSX series.

name: Fish
summary: Fish is a beautiful, bizarre and realistic experience that takes you on a planet 56. But note: this is not the 56th planet per se but this is planet 56 - fifty-six is its own name. Let's dive to Cosmos nad Universe!

name: Filthy Us: Complete Edition
summary: Filthy Us: Complete Edition is an original horror adventure game with a dark story and puzzle elements. The game not only contains a large number of Buddhist and oriental elements, but also the horrifying customs of the people who used to live in that world.

name: Fishing Online

summary:
Five Nights at Treasure Island: Sister Location (also known as Oblitus Casa Troll Demo) is a Five Nights at Freddy's fangame released by Radiance Team under the disguise of a Oblitus Casa demo.
The game was intended to be a joke and not to be taken seriously.

name: Final Fantasy IV: The DSfication
summary: Final Fantasy IV - The DSfication is a hack designed with the DS game as inspiration.

name: FireChess
summary: Unleash a new level of chess tactics with mage pieces that create fires, fog of war, portals, freeze opponents, and much more. Strengthen your army by purchasing additional pieces (standard or mage) when you earn income from occupying gold spaces.

summary: Five Toons at Night is upcoming Five Nights at Freddy's and Five Nights at Treasure Island fangame

summary: you came over to the old fnaf location and you must monitor the place because your the new night guard good luck

Or you can just call it a "demake".

name: First Blood
summary: "First Blood" bağımsız bir optimizayon mekanizması kullanır. Oyunda, Klasik Mücadele, Eğleneli Mücadele ve Macera modları vardır. Harika silahlar, sürükleyici atış deneyimi ve heyecan verici savaşlar, oyuncuların silahlarla savaşma eğlencesinin tadını çıkarması için tasarlandı.

name: Five Nights At Freddy's: Nightshift
summary: The Gameplay Consists of a quick and smooth movement alongside responsive controls as well giving it some style in the game.

name: Fighter Street II
summary: A PICO-8 demake of Street Fighter II.

name: Final Alone in the Dark
summary: This final compilation of BAITD series lets you play (almost) all parts of the mod. BAITD is a pure experimental mod that shows to players new ways to mod the game and dedicated to original Alone In The Dark game series.

name: Five Nights at Freddy's: Security Breach - The Remains
summary: The Remains is a soon to be releasing mod for Steel Wool Studios' Five Nights at Freddy's Security Breach. This mod restores every single scrapped mission, model, map, minigame, ETC. Back into full functioning order!

name: Fiction Fixers: Curse of OZ
summary:
The Land of Oz is in great peril. The evil Victor Vile has erected towers that consume the people, light, and energy of Oz itself. Protect Dorothy and Toto as they travel across Oz in hopes of finding a way home to Kansas.

Team up with the Scarecrow, the Tinman, and the Lion and use their powers to overcome great obstacles. But beware of the Wicked Witch and Victor, an Illiterati agent, who will stop at nothing to destroy you.

name: Fishing Planet: Thanksgiving Cornucopia Pack
summary: Exclusively for Thanksgiving, we present to you the Thanksgiving Cornucopia Pack! It is your Horn of Plenty in the world of float fishing! Jam-packed with exclusive goodies, the Thanksgiving Cornucopia Pack features limited-edition telescopic rods that are available exclusively in this Pack!

name: Fish Fighter
summary: Get ready to eat, or be eaten! Venture into the spectacular ocean and eat as many fish as you can in this aquatic adventure. Eat the required number of fish to progress through the levels. If you like sea food, you're in for a treat!

name: Five Nights at Freddy's Doom
summary: This 1993 DOOM mod lets you visit Five Nights at Freddy's 1, FNaF 2, and FNaF 3 pizzerias.

name: Five Nights at Freddy's: Help Wanted - Full Time Edition
summary:
Five Nights at Freddy’s: Help Wanted - Full Time Edition is a combined version of the best selling Five Nights at Freddy’s: Help Wanted, and it’s DLC, Curse of Dreadbear EXCLUSIVELY for the PS5 & PSVR2. This new edition includes all content from the original Help Wanted, plus the Halloween DLC, Curse of Dreadbear, giving you over 50 scary-fun minigames in one terrifying package.

Face your fears in VR or Standard non-VR modes, and see if you’ve got what it takes to be an upstanding, committed member of the Fazbear team!

name: Fire Fly
summary: It's an intense,adrenaline-pumping zombie mowing game where youll overcome many odds to find a cure.The game is not finished yet,and I will do my best to complete this game in the future,learn from the feedback,increase the gameplay,and make sure that it does not disappoint each and every one of you

name: Fimbul's Gemboree
summary: Collect Gems, explore worlds, and party hardy. You’ll do it all in Fimbul’s Gemboree- a fast-paced adventure platformer. Play as Fimbul, a little ice dragon, and help him run, jump, and roll across lands to collect items that will let him into the best party on the block.

name: Final Man
summary: Shooting game with a still soldier who cannot move, only aim.

name: FishTDX
summary: Buy towers to defend your islands against waves of fish! Unlock new towers after each round with new play styles and new synergies. Build your defenses to annihilate the fish with hours and hours of incredibly satisfying and addictive gameplay!

name: Fire Guardian
summary: A platform adventure game. Explore various scenarios, lute against mercenaries, drones. Feed the animals.

name: Five Nights at Backrooms: Waifu Edition
summary: Welcome to Backrooms, to a previously unknown level. The Backrooms are inhabited by special entities that look cute, but when you get close to them, they'll do anything to kill you. Their peculiarity is that they move only at night. Yes, on this level Backrooms has a day and night shift.

name: Fire Emblem Engage Bundle
summary: The Fire Emblem Engage Bundle includes both the base game and its expansion pass.

name: Fix It
summary:
Fix It is a puzzle game where the player assembles various machines out of a kit of spare parts. The machines are similar to Rube Goldberg devices and involve releasing a bolt from a wrench and then have it reach a box. For each machine the player has access to a toolbox with a certain amount of components of various kinds that have to be placed on the playing field to complete the machine. Most common are the elbows (l-shaped pipes) which change the direction of the bolt and the converters which change the property of the bolt. The bolt can be small and hollow, large and hollow, small and solid or large and solid and these properties have to match with the properties of the box and the parts. For example, to reflect a small and hollow bolt only an elbow with those properties will work. There is also the bouncer which rebounds the bolt in the opposite direction and the key which the bolt has to pass through to enter a locked box.

The game consists of 200 machines. The first 100 only uses regular parts while the latter 100 contains modified parts. These differ in that their properties change every time they are touched by the bolt. The parts can also rotated and change position. Machines can be built in any order even if previous ones have not been completed. Additionally there is an editor that allows the player to create new machines.

name: First Time In Hawaii: Collector's Edition
summary:
Kate and Nicole Robinson hit up Hawaii for a very special occassion: the wedding of their good friend Stella! Kate's got a date with with Hawaii!

In this Hidden Object game with a tropical twist, see all the local sights, experience all the local favorites and maybe even give your good friend Stella the best wedding ever!

name: Five Nights at Fredbear's
summary: Five Nights at Freddy's: Fredbear, or as it was named later, Five Nights at Fredbear's, is a FNaF fan-game made by KidduTheMan and epicsurfingvids119

name: Fishlets
summary: Fishlets is a cute, cozy aquarium game. Care for adorable pixel fish and design charming aquatic environments for your pets to call home. Collect rare fish and color variants as you relax and nurture your underwater friends.

name: First Encounters
summary: Discover mixed reality on Meta Quest 3 with First Encounters. You are on a strange new planet and pesky space puffians are about to flood into your room. Catch as many as you can before time runs out – match colours for a high score!

name: Fight Ippatsu! Juuden-Chan!! CC
summary: “Fight Ippatsu! Juuden-Chan!! CC” is an adventure game based on the TV anime based on the original work by Mr. Jitama. The game revolves around the original character "Cell" (CV: Eri Kitamura) created by Mr. Jitama, and includes full voices by the same cast as the TV anime. We use multiple stories and multiple endings, where the story changes depending on which characters you become friends with.

name: Finite State Automaton Challenges 2
summary: In the second episode of Finite State Automation Challenges, you will use finite-state automata to overcome 40 challenges from character string manipulation, computer science, and mathematics.

name: Fifteen
summary: Welcome to ‘Fifteen', where each swipe is a brushstroke on a canvas of endless possibilities. With intuitive mouse controls, explore diverse themes across multiple levels. Immerse yourself in the revolutionary 3D 360-degree perspective, redefining puzzle-solving in a visually immersive experience

name: FishVerse: Ultimate Fishing
summary: Dive into FishVerse, the ultimate multiplayer fishing game! Experience realistic fishing, competitive duels, and global challenges. Catch various fish species, upgrade your gear, and race on boats. Download now for the best fishing experience!

name: Fill the Cat Box!
summary: A Casual 3D Physics Puzzle game, where you combine cats of the same size and color to create larger cats. Fit as many cats into the box as you can before letting a cat fall out and touch the aluminum foil on the table! Try to break your old high scores!

name: FireFront
summary:
FireFront is a free to play mobile shooter game featuring:
- Large-scale multiplayer combat with a focus on teamwork (64 players per match).
- Ground vehicles, helicopters & infantry.
- 2 game modes + 2 maps at launch & more to follow soon thereafter.
- More realistic graphics, smoother movement and more satisfying gunplay than the best mobile shooter games.
- More mature gameplay mechanics (high recoil, no aim assist, voice chat for teamwork, etc).

name: Fighter Aircraft Race
summary:
Epic Skyward Duels Await!

Dive into "Fighter Aircraft Race" – where high-speed aerial races meet thrilling local 2-player battles! Navigate treacherous skies, outmaneuver your rival, and flaunt your superior piloting prowess.

name: Final Fantasy XVI: Echoes of the Fallen
summary: Echoes of the Fallen is the first DLC of Final Fantasy XVI, which unlocks a whole new story, battles, weapons, accessories, level cap and more. For players who have completed the required quests, this new adventure begins before the base game’s final battle, as strange, dark crystals begin to circulate on the black market. Players will follow Clive and his friends during their investigations as they encounter a group of suspicious traders, leading them to a long-abandoned Fallen tower known as the Sagespire. There, they will unravel the terrible secrets that await within.
developers: Square Enix Creative Business Unit III

name: Final Fantasy XVI: The Rising Tide
summary: The Rising Tide is the second DLC for Final Fantasy XVI, which will bring new challenges, new locations and more, including the confrontation between Clive and the legendary Eikon, Leviathan.
developers: Square Enix Creative Business Unit III

name: Final Fantasy XVI Expansion Pass
summary: The Expansion Pass set includes Final Fantasy XVI DLC “Echoes of the Fallen” and “The Rising Tide” at a discounted price.
developers: Square Enix Creative Business Unit III

name: Five Card Draw Poker
summary:
The crowd couldn't make it over for the regular weekly game?
Relax, your personal computer will play 5 card DRAW POKER and bring the crowd with it.

COMPUTER DRAW POKER sets you up with four other players controlled by the computer.
Lucky, Shifty, Ace, and Slim are their names and they play a smart game, each in their own personal way.
Players betting strategy is based on their hand and the betting behavior of the other players.

name: Fitness Boxing: Fist of the North Star - Expansion Pack
Five-Star: Chef Ops
summary: Make no mistake rookie - this ain't a cooking game. This is a tactical kitchen simulation with a hint of cooking. Dive into the culinary universe of Five Star: Chef Ops, a strategy-packed adrenaline ride where every second drains profits and every miscalculated action brings calamity upon you.

name: Fighting
summary: A battle role-playing game The main task is for players to control the protagonist in battles, defeat enemies one by one, gain experience points and coins to upgrade. Further acquire stronger weapons and skills.

name: Final Paradox
summary: Final Paradox is a minecraft CTM map where you will find an immersive story and a deep lore, with interesting characters and memorable antagonists, from the imposing conqueror to your faithful companion Koros. This map contains amazing scenery, challenging enemies, and unique mechanics. It has more than 40 hours of gameplay that you can enjoy alone or with friends.

name: Fire&Fly
summary: In this fast-paced 3D platform game, control an AI warrior and improve your combat skills in a virtual world. Use skills such as wall running, sprinting, grappling hook, and bullet time to pass a total of 12 levels of training and defeat the final boss to complete the challenge.

name: Five Nights at Cobson's
summary: Recently having become a night guard at the Soyjak Mental Asylum, Dr. Soyer faces a difficult task of watching over the institution's mysterious patients - also trying his best to make it out of his shift alive.

name: First Hand
summary: First Hand is an official Hand Tracking demo built by Meta. Experience the magic of interacting with the virtual world directly with your hands. Use switches, levers, virtual UIs as you solve puzzles to build robotic gloves, and then experience their superpowers.

name: Five Nights at Wario's 4
summary:
Five Nights at Wario's 4 is the 5th game in the series. The gameplay is in a style never seen before in a FNAF fan game :) I know I said I wouldn't make more FNAW games, but minds can change, and mine did. Fan games aren't hurting anybody, right? They're something I have fun making, and I choose to share them with you to play for free if you feel like it. So I don't feel this should be a bad thing for anybody.
The game takes places entierly on a TV screen... but is it real? Or are they just a dream? This is most likely them most challenging FNAW game out of them all. Can you beat all nights, and unlock the secret, new gamemode?

name: Fighters of Capcom
summary:
Fighters of Capcom is a cancelled mobile fighting game by Capcom that started development in 2012. The game was a crossover game featuring characters from various Capcom games.

In December 2023, various prototype builds of the game were leaked online as a part of the TestFlight teraleak.

name: Fibrilis
summary: What would you do if you were forced out of your still life into a dying world of tangled patterns?

name: Five Nights at Haunted House
summary: Can you survive five nights in haunted place where your mission is to save yourself by evils ghost and mummy? Then be ready and select the best player of your own choice and start your mission. Enter in our haunted survival manor house and get ready for the mysterious quest!

name: Fia's Night Out
summary:
Fia's mother just put her to bed, but Fia can't possibly rest like this! There's still so much to do! So many sights to see! So many desserts to eat!

Fia sneaks out to get what she wants and everything is normal.

name: Five Nights at Freddy's: In Real Time
summary: You work the nightshift at Freddy Fazbear's Pizza looking out for the animatronics, now moving towards you in real time. Relive FNAF 1 with a moving animatronics camera system; but as we all know, the animatronics tend to wander a bit.

name: Fibbler.io
summary:
fibbler.io is a social deduction quiz game, that combines knowledge with trickery.
Engage in brain-bending questions, outwit friends as Fibbler or rise as the ultimate Quiz Master.
With party play, unique scoring, and interactive voting, it offers a dynamic and strategic quizmaster experience.
Test your wits in this unique blend of knowledge and deduction.

name: Final Fantasy IV
summary:
A port of Final Fantasy IV for PlayStation that adds an opening and ending FMV cutscene as well as some gameplay improvements such as the ability to run in dungeons and towns.

It is largely based on the original Japanese release for the Super Famicom but includes some of the changes made in the Final Fantasy IV Easy Type release. Due to the CD-ROM format of PlayStation it has longer load times in comparison to the Super Famicom versions.

The North American version, which is only available as part of the Final Fantasy Chronicles and Final Fantasy Anthology compilations, came with a brand new English localization. Although certain translated lines from the previous localization by Kaoru Moriyama, such as "You spoony bard!", were kept, as they had become fan favorites.

name: Final Fantasy 25th Anniversary Ultimate Box
summary:
Final Fantasy 25th Anniversary Ultimate Box is a box set of the Final Fantasy main series to commemorate the Final Fantasy 25th Anniversary.

It includes the following games:

- Final Fantasy (PS1)
- Final Fantasy II (PS1)
- Final Fantasy III (PSP)
- Final Fantasy IV (PS1)
- Final Fantasy V (PS1)
- Final Fantasy VI (PS1)
- Final Fantasy VII International (PS1)
- Final Fantasy VIII (PS1)
- Final Fantasy IX (PS1)
- Final Fantasy X (PS2)
- Final Fantasy XI Vana'diel Collection (PS2)
- Final Fantasy XII (PS2)
- Final Fantasy XIII (PS3)

The box also includes a 25th anniversary video, the Final Fantasy 25th Anniversary Crystal Art Works artbook, a two-disc compilation of music, Final Fantasy 25th anniversary artwork on a stand by Yoshitaka Amano, and an item code for "Mogu Mogu" earrings in Final Fantasy XIV. It was exclusive to Square Enix's e-Store.

name: Fireman
summary: Your mission is to protect the apartment building from fire started by Candles, Bombs and or Dynamite. Using fire extinguisher from the truck or by pulling hose from hydrant. Pressing a button releases a flow of water on the fire or a danger. The fireman can not touch danger when he walk, otherwise a life will be gone.

name: Final Fantasy IV
summary:
This version of Final Fantasy IV released as part of Final Fantasy IV: The Complete Collection includes many of the features introduced in the Advance version such as the Bestiary, Music Player and bonus dungeons, whilst also incorporating a number of changes and features exclusive to other ports.

The opening FMV returns from the 3D Remake's Nintendo DS port as well as new 3D cinematic cutscenes. There is an option to switch between the original Super Famicom or the arranged 3D Remake versions of the soundtrack. It also includes an auto-battle feature for the first time as well as other gameplay changes.

An Art Gallery containing illustrations by Yoshitaka Amano has also been added.

name: Final Fantasy IV
summary:
A port of Final Fantasy IV for WonderSwan Color released only in Japan. It is largely based on the PlayStation port while lacking its FMVs and having a decreased screen resolution, and down-sampled music and sound effects to meet the specifications of the device.

The WonderSwan Color port introduces a number of graphical enhancements to character sprites and backgrounds by providing additional details and color shading. The original character portraits were replaced with new, smaller portraits. Also, certain boss sprites were changed to those featured in the Japanese Easy Type version of the Super Famicom game.

The game features a revamped difficulty different from both the original and the Easy Type versions.

name: Final Fantasy IV
summary:
A mobile phone port of Final Fantasy IV that was released for different mobile platforms in Japan only.

It includes a whole new "EX Dungeon", a redesigned version of the Lunar Ruins with a number of story changes, and new items introduced in Final Fantasy IV: The After Years.

name: Fill Multicolor
summary: You are presented with a grid of dots and you must connect all the dots, but there are two-color dots that require certain rules in order to be connected. Dots cannot be connected twice. You must connect all the dots.

name: Fisher-Price: Time To Play - Pet Shop
summary: Time to Play Pet Shop gives kids the chance to feed and care for animals in an interactive setting. They can choose names, groom and bathe the animals, and play pet vet. There are nine activities in all. Along the way, they will learn about over 40 species of furry, feathered, and scaly animals while enjoying paw-stomping original songs.

name: Five Nights at Freddy's: Into the Pit
summary:
Jump into the pit and immerse yourself in a new chapter in the Five Nights at Freddy’s universe. Oswald wishes his town, and his life, weren’t so boring. That all changes when he explores the ball pit in a rundown pizzeria and finds himself in the past. However, Oswald’s deepest desire will have an unexpected cost…

Survive five nights of terror in this chilling adventure game. Travel between time periods, gather clues, and outrun the threat relentlessly pursuing you. Move swiftly and stay hidden, and you may just survive. But be careful—it’s not just your own life that’s on the line. Oswald’s father and children from the past could all meet their end if you don’t save them.

name: Firework Survivor
summary: "Firework Survivor" is a SurvivorLike game with the theme of fireworks. In the game, you will enter the dreamland of a kitten, which is full of dangers, but the only thing that can help it is - fireworks!

name: F.I.S.T.: Forged In Shadow Torch - Limited Edition
Figuras y Figuraciones
summary: Join a rigorous study to find out what makes people laugh.

name: Fit My Cat
summary: Purrfect cat organizer – fit them all

name: Five Nights At Shrek's Hotel 2
summary:
This game is the second version of our older game 5 Nights At Shrek's Hotel.
You are just another regular customer, just like before...
You only have to stay 5 nights. you know it's going to be fine, it has always been.

name: Five Nights at Freddy's 6: Freakshow
summary:
It has been more than 40 years since the horrible happenings at Freddy's, Fazbear Entertainment is Trying to recover from the bad reputation, trying to do another building as their last hope to being succesfull again.
You accept the work of a security guard, by a request from an old friend, but you are not there just for that, you have a purpose, a mission, get them all in.

name: Fish Combat: Arcade
summary: Speed through hoards in this Speed based Combat Game!! Out maneuver your enemies and drift around fully 3D arcade levels!

name: First Gen
summary: Follow the story of Markus Orwell, a First Generation soldier of the North Alliance while he tries to solve a painful crime and get his life back on track. Navigate through branching paths, multiple endings, where each decision crafts a different journey.

name: Final Clue Oakloon
summary: Final Clue Oakloon is a Gritty Dark VHS Urbex Homicide Detective Survival Horror with combat and emphasis on atmosphere, as well as unpredictability, realism and providing a realistic solo urban exploration in a abandoned overgrown house in the woods & the feeling of being stalked during your investigation for the truth about an old crime case, you will have to fight your way through whoever resides here in order to come to the truth and conclusion of this old case.

name: Five Starless Rivers
summary: A point-and-click adventure game featuring an undergraduate student who needs to find the Helm of Hades while also trying to navigate adult life in contemporary Athens.

name: Fire Racing
summary: Real Racing game. 6 tracks. A racing game with day, night, and seasons.

name: Fist Food
summary: One-button arcade score chaser. Grow and shrink your fist to combo your way to victory. Eat all insects as quickly as possible before the day runs out, otherwise it's game over.

name: Fish Folk: Jumpy
summary: Fish Folk is a tactical 2D shooter, played by 2-4 players online or on a shared screen. Aim straight left or right; the rest is up to clever movement and timing in this fish-on-fish brawler!

name: Fine Work Act I
summary: Weave Rhythm and Romance! Charm 7 otherworldly clients with your artisan prowess in this rhythm-infused dating sim.

name: Fishing Universe
summary: Fishing Universe is an engine building incremental game about collecting fish. Place down a plethora of different unit types ranging from simple spearman to extraterrestrial fish harvesters in order to maximize your FPS (fish per second).

name: Fisherman's Palace
summary: Fisherman’s Palace is an adventure game about a man who escaped the chaotic city life to start a new chapter in a relaxing village, BUT a mysterious fish has appeared. You must fish, compete in tournaments, craft new gear and build your farm to become the BEST in the whole village!

name: Fire Thief
summary: Twin-stick action fire fighting game. Extinguish fires, rescue citizens, and protect property... at least until you steal it. Sneak past other fire fighters and police to sell your stolen loot while trying to keep the fire under control.

name: Firefrost
summary: Firefrost is a turn-based combat game about snow clearing. Use your flamethrower to burn through the snow, your enemies, and reach soup. Upgrade your flamethrower to unlock new tactical options. If you die, just get up again, no progress lost. Chase the SSoup rank, unlock more upgrades.

name: Fixer's Tale
summary: Welcome to the Scientific Research Facility "Camelot-22". The emergency personnel replacement system has chosen you to address the next unusual contingency. Immerse yourself in the humorous tale of a repair job filled with laughter, silly dialogues, angry chairs, and dim-witted robots.

name: Final Fantasy XI: Ultimate Collection - Abyssea Edition
Final Fantasy
summary: A port of Final Fantasy for mobile devices, which features a re-translated script and an expanded inventory system, among other changes and fixes. It released in North America in 2010, the same time a port of Final Fantasy 20th Anniversary Edition was released for iPhone and iTouch.

name: Fish & Bubbles
summary: Purchase fish, feed them to collect coins, upgrade your tank and Zen out in... "Fish & Bubbles"!

name: First Sexy Night
summary: First Sexy Night is a short and sweet visual novel about losing your virginity. Can you make the night special for Ginny and finally cross that line? Featuring explicit as well as implicit sexy scenes!

name: Fiery Catacombs
summary: Your next step may be the last. Immerse yourself in adventure and try to survive in the catacombs littered with traps.

name: Firebird
summary: You play a firefighter who has to extinguish fires started by the firebird.

name: Fibonacci's Final Sequence
summary: Prove your intelligence as a AI experiment by solving an increasingly complex sequence of puzzles. Construct and program marvelous logistical contraptions to solve numeric puzzles. Can you be the first experiment to finish Fibonacci's Final Sequence?

name: Final Desolation
summary:
A 100% vanilla 8 level DOOM wad, dedicated to Cacodoomonic's beloved late doggie Layla and their beloved late mother, both of which loved DOOM, and often used to watch them playing it. They both passed away, their dog on August 3rd 2023 and their mother September 27th 2023. This game is dedicated to them both and may their memory live on forever in this mod.

The wad is an 8 level chapter starring Joan Dark as she fights against the forces of Hell as it invades the UAC bases and gradually takes over. A powerful demon, code-named only DESOLATION, has risen from the depths of Hell and brought with it an army of darkness that is utterly relentless. DoomGuy isn't around. Nobody is around except the demonically possessed corpses of former fellow UAC military... so it's up to Joan Dark to deal with this on her own.

name: Fieldwork
summary: A Text-Adventure about you in a forest

name: Fireman Sam
summary: Fireman Sam is a video game released for the Nintendo DS in 2010 of the same name. Based on the TV series. The game features several mini-games, such as spot the difference games, observation games, and music games.

name: Five Nights at Billy's
summary: Billy and Van have had a glitch in their programing. It's up to you to make it through five nights and not let them get you.

name: Fire Race
summary: Employ your drifting skills and power-ups to gain an edge, while dodging obstacles strewn across your path on the way to the podium.

name: Fire Emblem Fates: Shadow Dragon
summary:
A Shadow Dragon Remake on the 3DS!
This is a remake of FE1/FE11 using Fire Emblem Fates as a base. This is fully completed and you can play start to finish. It has all 25 chapters from Shadow Dragon as well as the five Gaiden chapters from the DS remake (No you do not need to purge your army to access them).

name: F.I.T.
summary: Challenge your spatial awareness and reflexes in F.I.T. An addictive puzzle game where you are the master of your own geometric shape, and must skillfully fit into falling blocks of various sizes and shapes to survive and thrive in this captivating arcade style game to achieve the highest score!

name: Fire and Rescue
summary: Fires have broken out all over the city! Use your portable water tank to extinguish raging fires and carry innocent civilians to safety. Play by yourself or simultaneously with a friend to see who is the best fire-fighter in FIRE AND RESCUE!

name: Fighting breakthrough
summary: Fighting breakthrough is a 2D platformer, where you take on the role of a soldier who must fight his way through enemy forces and complete his mission. Exciting levels filled with shooting, dynamic battles and intense combat missions await you.

name: Five Hundred
summary: The classic Five Hundred card game, available on PC! This version of the game has been lovingly crafted over many years to be the best possible version of the game it can be, now available on Steam!

name: Final Man
summary: VT03 port of Final Man.

name: Fisherman'sWorld
summary: An indie game where you need to collect all species of fish, while you have to manage coins to collect all items.

name: Fishin' for Average Caucasian Boyfriends
summary: Fishin' for Average Caucasian Boyfriends is a semi-autobiographical Game Boy game about expectations, queerness, and the possibility of dreaming bigger.

name: Fight To The Death
summary: Join an arena filled with hundreds or thousands of monsters, use each character's unique skills, collect powerful items, create your own play style and become the last man standing.

name: Final Fantasy VI
summary:
A port of Final Fantasy VI for PlayStation that adds an opening and ending FMV cutscene and includes a number of bonuses, including a bestiary and artwork gallery that can be accessed from the main menu, and which are revealed as the player progresses through the game.

It is largely similar to the Super Nintendo version with the only notable changes to gameplay being the revision of Vicks to Biggs, the correction of a handful of bugs, and the addition of a new "memo save" feature, which allows players to quickly save their progress to the PlayStation RAM. Due to the CD-ROM format of PlayStation it has longer load times in comparison to the Super Nintendo version.

In Japan, it was available in both a standalone release and as part of Final Fantasy Collection, while in North America it was available only as part of Final Fantasy Anthology. In Europe it was sold only as a standalone release.

name: Final Fantasy V
summary:
A port of Final Fantasy V for PlayStation that adds an opening and ending FMV cutscene as well as some gameplay improvements such as the ability to sprint.

It is largely similar to the Super Famicom version but due to the CD-ROM format of PlayStation it has longer load times in comparison to the Super Famicom version.

In Japan it was available as part of Final Fantasy Collection, while in North America and Europe it was available only as part of Final Fantasy Anthology. This is the first international release of Final Fantasy V as the Super Famicom version was only released in Japan.

name: Five Unreal Nights at Candy's
summary:
No company is without a rival.
Freddy Fazbear's New Pizzeria has closed for good. And so, another restaurant is going to take its place in the world of entertainment.
What could go wrong?

name: Five elements for 24!
summary: On that day, mankind remembered the fear of being dominated by the math Olympiad in primary school. 4 random numbers, 3 operations, get 24 points!

name: Final Apex
summary: Get ready for the ultimate adrenaline rush in "Final Apex," an arcade racing game set in the near future where speed knows no bounds! Step into the driver's seat of seven unique and powerful cars and it's time to unleash the full potential of futuristic racing!

name: Find Together on Stream
summary: Find Together on Stream is a chat game that you can play with your Twitch community. It's a game where chat users form words from randomly generated letters in a bowl. As a streamer, you can also create the letters of any word in your language.

name: Fight till the End!
summary: Fight Till the End! is an action-packed game that puts you in the shoes of a courageous character who finds themselves trapped in a deadly game of life and death.

name: FireWorks Inc.
summary: FireWorks Inc. is a serious and fast-paced firefighting game, that combines fun and irony. The world has reached the point of no return due to climate change, and fire stations had to privatize. You are working to afford rent – deciding yourself which lives are worth saving.

name: Firespike
summary: How many Waves can you survive? Firespike is an wave survival game with minimalistic gameplay and roguelite elements. You play an rifleman and defeat the hordes of skeletons that come each wave. Each Wave gets progressively more difficult.

name: Fire Path
summary: Embark on a pixelated journey through "Fire Path," where mischievous goblins and haunting ghosts light your way. Master challenging gameplay, adapt to diverse enemies, and explore atmospheric landscapes. Can you conquer the flames? Your 2D adventure awaits!

name: Find Cats
summary: “A cute game for cat lovers of all ages! There are several maps and the opportunity to look for furry ones that are hiding intelligently!”

name: Find Cats With Friends
summary: Find Cats With Friends - gather friends, search the island for 100 mischievous cats, and bring them back in this cooperative multiplayer quest!

name: Final Fantasy II
summary: A port of Final Fantasy II for mobile devices based on the original Famicom release but includes some visual updates from later versions as well as other small changes.

name: Field of Vision
summary: This is a puzzle game. The mischievous little flying dragon jumps in different clouds. Move left and right to keep the little flying dragon in the picture and above the clouds, otherwise the game will end. There are attackers and bonus balls above the clouds, try to avoid all attacking objects as much as possible, and pick up bonus balls to get higher scores. The gameplay is simple yet challenging, come and try how many points you can get!

name: Fire Emblem: Thracia 776 - Forseti's Cut
summary: Forseti's Cut is a project that restores unused content (namely units, events and bosses), adds dozens of brand-new conversations, and rebalances the game on both the player and enemy side, on top of many enhanced portraits and slightly improved UI, all in an attempt to offer a fresh experience for FE5 veterans.

name: Fight Night Round 2
summary: Exclusive to the GameCube version is Super Punch Out as a bonus game.

name: Find The Backdoor
summary: Find the Backdoor is a single-player horror game. Go through different sinister levels in order to find the next backdoor. Survive those you meet and discover all the secrets. Will you manage to complete the game?

name: Fight Back The Night
summary: A fantasy action-adventure game in which you must use a variety of fire-based powers to defeat an army of monsters infesting your realm. Upgrade your abilities, unlock new ones, and fight more and more enemies in this bullet-hell like game.

name: Finally Free
summary: A point & click top-down horror adventure game that takes place in a nightmare

name: Five Likes Please
summary: Five Likes Please is a fast-paced multiplayer arena shooter. Build your arsenal by obtaining new weapons and buying attachments. Obtain "likes" and buy powerful streaks, such as vehicles and power weapons. We know this game is bad, so as long as we can at least get five likes, that would be great.

name: Five Likes Please: Neon Pack
summary: A pack that includes new futuristic-themed weapons that operate on heat rather than reloading. This pack also includes more reticules, reticule colors, weapon camos, and the ability to change any base weapon's tracer/muzzle flash color.

name: Five Likes Please: Historic Weapons Pack
summary: A pack that includes new weapons, mainly from WW1 and WW2. Each DLC weapon is derived from a base weapon with set attachments and other minor tweaks. The DLC weapons can be equipped even if the base weapon is not unlocked yet, but their attachments cannot be customized.

name: Final Dash
summary: Introducing Final Dash, the thrilling platformer where you'll embark on an adrenaline-fueled journey through stunning worlds! Jump into fast-paced challenges, create your own levels, and compete with friends. Are you ready to dash to victory?

name: Final Contract
summary: A Hired Assassin Goes On His Final Mission...Before Christmas.

name: Five Nights at Freddy's 1 Doom
summary: FNAF Doom is a mod of the famous game Doom that combines elements from Five Nights at Freddy's (FNAF) with the intense and frenetic gameplay of Doom. In this mod, you can play with your friends or other players online while trying to survive the attacks of the scary animatronics.

name: Finger Soccer League
summary: Finger Soccer League is a 3D soccer game using bottle caps as players. It features offline turn-based matches against AI or friends

name: Firesky
summary: Firesky is a multiplayer action RPG with strategic PVP and card collection elements. The game follows a cast of heroes who overcome tremendous odds to fight a great evil spreading throughout the universe.

name: Find 101 Doomers
summary: Find 101 Doomers is the first object search game in which you have to find all the yearning doomers!

name: Find 101 Doomers: Deluxe Content
summary:
This DLC Includes:
New level with 101 more doomers
Artworks in high resolution (dark and light themes)

name: Final Eden
summary: This is a side scrolling aerial shooting game where players need to operate the last human survivor, Lilith, to move and shoot in the air, use constantly improving weapons to eliminate enemies, complete all levels, and ultimately find her own value in the shattered world.

name: Find Room 96
summary: Observe your surrounding and be confident there is or is not a anomaly to progress.

name: Fighting Vipers
summary:
Exclusive to the Sega Saturn version of the game is Pepsiman, the mascot for the Pepsi Company in Japan.

Other exclusive features to the Saturn version include the addition of Playback Mode and Training Mode.

name: Five Nights at Freddy's Doom Mod Remake
summary: A remake of FNAF1 Doom mod, FNAF1Remake is an upgrade on all aspects. Graphics, Gameplay, Unending Chaos. 1-8 Players.

name: Fit My Cat: Cat's Puzzle Pack 1
summary: Purrfect cat organizer – fit them all

name: Fit My Cat: Cat's Puzzle Pack 2
summary: Purrfect cat organizer – fit them all

name: Fit My Cat: Cat's Puzzle Pack 3
summary: Purrfect cat organizer – fit them all

name: Fight 'N' Jokes: Storylines
summary: Dive into 'Fight'N'Jokes: Storylines', an episodic 3D adventure game where puzzles, quick-time events, and rich dialogues bring the story to life. Explore the lives of iconic characters, make impactful choices, resolve conflicts, make new friends, and rise to become the true champion of the realm.

name: Fit In The Hole
summary:
You are a cube on a journey through the walls.
Find the gap in the wall, roll over the terrain and try to fit inside.
Don't get hit by the wall!

name: Find My Weiner
summary: Embark on a whimsical journey through vast and vibrant fields of grass to reunite with your beloved weiner. But this isn't just any weiner—it's your four-legged friend who's gone on an adventure of their own! This game offers a blend of humor, heart, and the untold thrill of the hunt.

name: Fishing Planet: Sport Kayak Pack
summary: Introducing the unique Sport Kayak Pack for those looking to zoom across the water. Sport Kayak Pack includes a fast Dotted Shark sports kayak from MagFin and 20 BaitCoins for an attractive price.

name: Find Him
summary: A 3D First Person Psychological Horror Game. Discover the anomalies in the house to find Him. This is a very challenging hide and seek game.

name: Five Nights at Freddy's: Security Breach - Ruin 2
summary: You will meet many different mechanics on your way. You will need to turn on generators & escape from animatronics, and so more easter eggs to the original game.

name: Finding America: The West - Collector's Edition
summary: Explore the West and uncover its hidden gems through the excitement of finding fun objects.

name: Find True Love or Hell!
