summary: First-person perspective through role-playing When getting along with the "Destined Heroine", they constantly make choices to deepen mutual understanding, and strive to exchange sincerity for true love. These choices determine the final emotional outcome. In the end, who will Huang Di's true love be

name: Fight School Simulator
summary: Step into the world of Martial Arts, an immersive FPS Simulation where you take on the role of a martial arts instructor determined to build the ultimate dojo. From humble beginnings, guide to greatness by mastering martial arts, teaching the next generation of fighters, and standing up to rivals.

name: Fighter on the Path of Glory
summary:
A pixel art platformer action game!

There are two types of stages: boss battle stages and road stages.
When you conquer 3 stages in the same level, you can advance to the next level.

Use big attack against hard enemies and bosses. You can deal a lot of damage at a time.
It is important not only to attack, but also to watch the enemy's attack and avoid it.

name: Fission
summary: When the ball hits a fungus, the fungus disappears and the ball bounces back. The game is completed when all the fungi on the screen disappear by repeating this process. When the fungus disappears, a capsule that fission the ball may be dropped. There are 9 stages in total.

name: Five Nights With Los Penguinos
summary: Five Nights With Los Pinguinos is a horror game about a security guard who accidentally got a very dangerous job.

name: Fishing for a Living
summary: Step into the shoes of the family's breadwinner, mastering the art of fishing, and exchange your catch for essential groceries. Strategically navigate challenges to ensure the well-being of your loved ones is fully met.

name: First Break
summary: First Break is a puzzle/bullet-hell game about surviving a strange prison full of traps.

name: Fire Emblem: Three Houses - Expansion Pass
summary:
An expansion pass granting access to all additional content once it is released. The following content is included:

- 2019-JUL-26 Academy Uniform for protagonist
Allows the protagonist to change their clothing.
For more information, please see the relevant introductory page for this DLC.

- New Attires
2019-SEP-10: Pack 1
2019-NOV-7 Pack 2
For more information, please see the relevant introductory pages for this DLC.

- 2019-SEP-10 Additional auxiliary battles:
Additional auxiliary battles and a new song are now available.
For more information, please see the relevant introductory page for this DLC.

- 2019-SEP-10 Support items:
The Sacred Items set of support items has been released.
For more information, please see the relevant introductory page for this DLC.

- 2019-NOV-7 Additional resources:
Anna has been released for the additional resources included in the season pass.
For more information, please see the relevant introductory page for this DLC.

- 2019-NOV-7 Additional quests:
Additional quests have been released. For more information, please see the relevant introductory page for this DLC.

- 2020-FEB-12 Side Story: Cindered Shadows:
Featuring a storyline spanning several chapters and separate from that of the main game, with all-new characters, locations and battles.

- 2020-APR-20 Additional storyline:
Featuring a storyline spanning several chapters and separate from that of the main game, with all-new characters, locations and battles.

name: Fire Emblem: Three Houses + Expansion Pass
Final Fantasy XIV Online: Complete Edition
summary: This bundle includes "Final Fantasy XIV: A Realm Reborn", "Final Fantasy XIV: Heavensward", "Final Fantasy XIV: Stormblood", "Final Fantasy XIV: Shadowbringers" and "Final Fantasy XIV: Endwalker".
developers: Square Enix Creative Business Unit III

name: Final Fantasy XIV Online: Starter Edition
summary: While having the same name as another edition, this updated package contains the first two expansions rather than only the first expansion.

name: Final Fantasy XIV Online: Complete Collector's Edition
summary: This bundle includes "Final Fantasy XIV: A Realm Reborn", "Final Fantasy XIV: Heavensward", "Final Fantasy XIV: Stormblood", "Final Fantasy XIV: Shadowbringers" and "Final Fantasy XIV: Endwalker". All in-game bonus items from the Collector’s Editions are included.
developers: Square Enix Creative Business Unit III

name: Fish N Chat
summary: Welcome to Fish N Chat! Feel free to take things easy and relax on the wide open lake in this low poly and 90s chatroom style horror game! Chat with the locals, explore this peaceful lake, and aim to catch the massive fish everyone keeps talking about...

name: Finland Corruption Simulator: World Corruption
summary: --- story --- world is corrupting and there is nothing to do about it currently in finland currently where player is located there the corruption starts first player need to survive long as possible and if player survives the corruption the next day may be seen

name: Fight for Freedom: Civil War
summary: A minimalist game about fighting for freedom and independence in the United States of America!

name: Final Fantasy XIII-2: Requiem of the Goddess
summary: An extra episode featuring Lightning's struggle against Caius Ballad. The episode has 7 new, exclusive roles available to Lightning and upon completing the episode, you unlock Lightning in her Valkyrie attire as a paradigm ally (Role: Commando).

name: FileKiller
summary: A game that doubles as malware, 'FileKiller' is a gauntlet that selects random files from your computer and asks you to delete them one-by-one. After twenty files (of which two are folders) are deleted, you will have won the game.

name: Fiona's Dream of Atlantis
summary: The little mermaid Fiona has fallen in love with the statue of a warrior. She wants to bring the warrior back to life, but the only force capable of such a feat is very dangerous. Fiona must survive by navigating many obstacles and solving match 3 puzzles.

name: Fire Emblem Warriors + Season Pass Bundle
summary:
Clash with legions of enemies as Marth, Xander, Corrin, Chrom, and other Fire Emblem warriors by unleashing over-the-top-powerful Dynasty Warriors-style moves. Take control of characters with distinct attacks, issue strategic commands, pair up warriors for stunning moves, and more in an epic tactical action game from the Hyrule Warriors team.

In the Kingdom of Aytolis, new heroes mystically collide with warriors from across the history of Fire Emblem, who must band together to face countless enemies and restore the mysterious Shield of Flames to stop the Chaos Dragon. Advance the story to unlock additional playable characters, each with different attacks, weapons, combos, and voiced dialogue. A combination of intense combat and strategic Fire Emblem gameplay offers a take on battling that’s new to the series. Change between heroes anywhere on the battlefield and command them to victory. The materials and gold you earn in battle can be used to upgrade heroes, weapons, and more.

name: Fishdom: Seasons Under the Sea
summary: Celebrate the holiday season with Fishdom: Seasons Under the Sea! Solve match 3 puzzles and build up your Halloween, Thanksgiving, and Christmas aquariums.

name: Final Fight And Cadillacs
summary: Created by Pablo Vera, this is a crossover of Capcom's two most nostalgic beat'em up games: Final Fight and Cadillacs & Dinosaurs. Two universes collide in this awesome adventure.

name: Final Fight And Cadillacs 2
summary: Created by Pablo Vera, this is a crossover of Capcom's two most nostalgic beat'em up games: Final Fight and Cadillacs & Dinosaurs. Two universes collide in this awesome adventure.

name: Fishing Craze
summary: Catch a boatload of fishy fun in Fishing Craze, an arcade challenge! Load up the RV and crisscross the country in a series of tournaments that will put your angling prowess to the test. Catch fish to earn points and climb to the top of the rankings in the amateur, pro, and elite circuits, but watch out for surprises swimming just below the surface that will slow you down.

name: First Responder Simulation Bundle: Police Firefighting
summary: The astragon First Responder Bundle includes Police Simulator: Patrol Officers & Firefighting Simulator - The Squad. Police Simulator: Patrol Officers Welcome to Brighton!

name: Firewall: Cyber Defense
summary: A lore-based cyberspace tower-defense where you defend artificially intelligent Constructs from Corrupted bugs and viruses.

name: Final Fantasy Restored & Rebalanced
summary: Restored & Rebalanced is a bugfix and rebalance hack for the original, NES Final Fantasy that aims at fixing the game's notorious bugs, adding several quality of life features and smoothing over the game's difficulty curve, as well as adding some bonus postgame content.

name: Fish Hero
summary: A physics, parkour adventure! Launch yourself up a collection of biomes to reach the summit. Compete against friends by pushing them off platforms to throw them off course. Explore a unique world as a fish out of water.

name: Final Fantasy XVI: Collector's Edition
summary:
Final Fantasy XVI is the first fully fledged action RPG in the mainline Final Fantasy series. Clive Rosfield is on a mission to free mankind from its fate, and must use the Eikonic powers at his disposal to overcome every obstacle his enemies lay before him.

Collector's Edition in-game item
Bonus Weapon: Blood Sword
The fabled scarlet steel of Firion, hero of Final Fantasy II.

Collector's Edition bonus digital contents
Digital Mini Artbook, Digital Mini Soundtrack
These digital contents allows you to enjoy the world of "FINAL FANTASY XVI" to your heart's content.

Collector's Edition bonus physical contents
Premium Statue - Phoenix vs Ifrit
A premium statue depicting a battle between two eikons - Phoenix and Ifrit.
Approx. size: W230mm x D150mm x H270mm
Material: PVC, ABS

Metal Eikon Pin Collection
A premium metal pin collection featuring eight eikons.
Approx. size: W33mm x D5mm x H35mm (Ifrit)
Material: Zinc Alloy, Brass

Special Clive Rosfield SteelBook Case
A SteelBook case featuring artwork of Clive Rosfield, the protagonist. Use the case to store the disc-based media of your choice.
Material: Tin, Polypropylene

Cloth World Map of Valisthea
A cloth map of Valisthea where the story unfolds.
Approx. size: W615mm x D350mm, Thickness 0.3mm
Material: 100% Cotton
developers: Square Enix Creative Business Unit III

name: Fit the Ball 3D
summary:
Fit the Ball 3D will keep you hooked for hours!
Puzzle game with one finger control. Easy to play, hard to master.
Features unlimited gameplay.
Build your newest addiction!

name: Fire Emblem: Host of the Dark
summary: Fire emblem 8 rom hack

name: Firey's Candy Bar Adventure
summary: Firey's Candy Bar Adventure is the first game released based on the Battle For Dream Island series, predating the show itself. However, the game is incomplete and is not currently being worked on.

name: Finding Sparky
summary: 'Finding Sparky' is game in which an extremely ordinary boy, Tom, goes on an adventure across a haunted village to retrieve his kidnapped dog. With Tom, defeat the ghosts and (a slightly big) animal friends to get to the bottom of the case and find out what the hell dog kidnapper really wan

name: Find Eden
summary: In this cute adventure game you play as Timmy, who was magically teleported into the realm of cats. Unravel the mystery of Eden and awaken the fighting spirit of the felines. You solve puzzles, defeat monsters, upgrade new powers, all while meeting quirky cats in a classic hand-drawn 2D style.

name: Fio Fizhook
summary: A colorful first person game about a made-up sport. Throw an anchor, hook peculiar fish and punch them through ramps and turns!

name: Fixeight
summary: Introducing FixEight, Toaplan's thrilling vertical run-and-gun game featuring eight peerless warriors with cutting-edge weapons. Embark on an exhilarating cosmic escapade with up to three players at once. Now on PC with modern extras!

name: Five Elements: Ghosts Delivery
summary: This is a minimalist puzzle game where players control ghosts with unique traits to transport five elements between nodes. By applying the rules of generation and restraint, they transform or eliminate elements to reach specified quantities and objectives.

name: Fightin' Words
summary: "Psh, just another game on Steam?" Them's Fightin' Words!! No really, this is Fightin' Words, the world's first word game auto-battler. Play words strategically, carefully choose upgrades, and send your words off to fight. Your words are your Warriors!

name: Five Finger Discount
summary: Five Finger Discount is a single-player first-person heist game. Steal anything, from a bottle of juice in the local super market, to a 200 mil $ painting from a billionaires penthouse.

name: Fissure: Cubic
summary: Playable With/Without VR! A sci-fi 3D geometry based puzzle game. Alternate universe Earth history in a futuristic Type I Kardashev civilization setting. Puzzle mechanics featuring lots of advanced technology.

name: Five Nights at Silver Pine
summary: Fight for your life as creatures try to turn you into their next meal.

name: Five Nights of Nightmare: Escape Horror Story
summary: A chilling horror game that will push your nerves to the limit... An abandoned house, shrouded in a dark secret with the terrifying ghost of an old woman.

name: Fire Emblem: Call of the Armor
summary: Fire Emblem: Call of the is a hackrom of Fire Emblem: The Sacred Stones. It was built in ~4 months by a team of 14 chapter creators, dubbed Team Distant Roads. The mod features 20 chapters w/ 3 Tear Ring Saga inspired character selection interludes. You can play with up to 65 units total, and 50 in any single run of the hack.

name: Fire Emblem: Tales of Kotor
summary: Fire Emblem: Tales of Kotor is a hackrom of Fire Emblem: The Sacred Stones, and the sequel to Fire Emblem: Call of the Armor.

name: Field of Growth: A Farmer's Odyssey
summary: Embark on a first-person farming simulator in Field of Growth: A Farmer's Odyssey. Cultivate your land, craft, gather resources, raise livestock, and defend your farm. Every sunrise brings new adventures. Are you ready to grow?

name: Figments
summary: Embark on a powerful, heartfelt journey in Figments, a third-person action-adventure from VaporLock Labs. Immerse yourself in a hidden world, known only to Henry, where you can explore, craft, and fight to survive. Learn to conquer your deepest fears in this upcoming epic debut title.

name: Finsternis Kreuz
summary: A high-speed barrage-absorbing 2D action movie in which a girl who wields a magic sword that devours everything confronts vampires with two swords. Turn your enemy's power into a sword and devour vampires.

name: Final Fantasy ++ World of Chaos
summary: A semi-sequel of the author’s previous hack, Final Fantasy ++. It includes adaptations of various dungeons from FFs 3, 4, 5, & 6, SaGa 2, and Dragon Quest 5, along with a couple of new ones.

name: Final Fantasy Renaissance
summary:
A fangame tribute to the original Final Fantasy game released by Square on the NES. There are currently two distinct game modes in FFR. “Classic Mode” and “Renaissance Mode”.
Classic Mode is intended as a faithful recreation of the original Final Fantasy gam, but with all known bugs fixed.
Renaissance Mode is the same core game as Classic Mode, but with a number of new job classes available to choose from, as well as new game mechanics added. The new job classes are all based on job classes introduced in later games in the Final Fantasy series (such as Evoker, Lancer, Blue Mage, and many more).

name: Fishing RPG
summary: Fish your way to victory in this relaxed quest for the ultimate reward: soup.

name: Final Fantasy V Spoof
summary: This is a comedy / parody hack of Final Fantasy 5.

name: FictIf
summary: Welcome, wonderer. You’ve found FictIf, a stunning collection of interactive, inclusive visual novels where you make the decisions.

name: Fishing Adventure
summary:
You can fish for anything if you have a white sail, wind and a spear.
Old man's reckless voyage to the end of the ocean.
With personal combination of fish ability and spearing skills, catch the fish together with the old man!

name: Fish Hooks
summary: A collection of thoughts and poems and fragments about whose pieces I'm made of.

name: Five Nights at Freddy's: Security Breach
summary:
Five Nights at Freddy’s: Security Breach is the latest installment of the family-friendly horror games loved by millions of players from all over the globe. Play as Gregory, a young boy trapped overnight in Freddy Fazbear’s Mega Pizzaplex. With the help of Freddy Fazbear himself, Gregory must survive the near-unstoppable hunt of reimagined Five Nights at Freddy’s characters - as well as new, horrific threats.

Enter the ruins of Freddy Fazbear’s Mega Pizzaplex in the all-new, FREE story DLC for Five Nights at Freddy’s: Security Breach, now included with Purchase of the Base Game on Epic Games Store. Gregory is once again trapped in the now abandoned Pizzaplex, and he needs your help! Can you save your friend, yourself, and the Pizzaplex?

name: Final Doomer
summary:
Final Doomer (also known as Final Doomer+ after the update) is a gameplay mod featuring 9 weapon classes themed after official and community-made megawads. Barring the Doom 2-themed class, each set replaces the entire arsenal with new weapons that have altered functionality and stronger damage rates while still fitting into a vanilla template.

TNTguy's chaingun replacement is a pair of machine pistols that fire weaker bullets but at a splintering rate. The Ancient Aliens weaponset swaps the rocket launcher for the Photon Scepter, which fires a ball of light that explodes wider the farther it travels. The mod's simplicity combined with its creativity make it a very easy mod to use with mostly any wad.

name: Finger Suck
summary: Use your finger like a magnet!

name: Finding America: The Pacific Northwest - Collector's Edition
summary: Explore the Pacific Northwest!

name: Final Fantasy III + Final Fantasy IV: Double Pack Edition
summary:
Two of the most representative titles of the classic role-playing game series, brought together to get lost in their timeless stories of heroes, betrayal, love and redemption... now on PC.

Final Fantasy III

The game includes new and improved story sequences and 3D graphics, trading cards and Steam achievements, as well as new designs for Master's Diplomas. When darkness falls over the world and the light disappears, four young people are chosen by the crystals to embark on an adventure and save the world.

Final Fantasy IV

As the first game in the series to introduce the innovative continuous-time battle system, this classic title marked a milestone in Final Fantasy history. The game tells the story of Cecil, a dark knight who seeks redemption and ends up at the center of a battle that will decide the fate of the world.

name: Final Fantasy X/X-2 Ultimate Box
summary: Final Fantasy X/X-2 Ultimate Box is a three-case boxset of the Ultimate Hits versions of Final Fantasy X and Final Fantasy X-2, and Final Fantasy X: Eternal Calm, released on the PlayStation 2 in Japan.

name: Final Frog
summary: Final Frog is a platform game in which a cute frog traverses levels to collect treasures (and flies)!

name: Five Nights At Maggies
summary: This game is a fan game created by Michael Genaro. It is a FNAF (Five Nights At Freddys) remix/remake, click and point horror game, very difficult but very fun! Completely recommend! Also, This game is not mine however the actual developer has not added it to this site, and since it was made 2~3 months ago, i thought i would add it myself for him, the rest of the info is on the official (gamejolt) release site, i could not find any other.

name: Fishing Fantasy: Buzzrod
summary:
Possum, an archaeologist from the Kingdom of Emgrand, does no research and does nothing but fish. One day, while out on an adventure , possum finds a note in his missing uncle's book about a mysterious ancient civilization that worship fish as messengers of gods.
Possum sets out on a journey with his favorite rod in order to get closer to his admired uncle, a famous archaeologist, and above all, to meet a fish he has never seen before.

name: FIN: The Way Home
summary: Congratulations! You've just started your first day as a handler-in-training at Oceans of Adventure, the one and only destination to view carcharmorphs: a rare, mysterious species of humanoid fish. Don't let their looks deceive you though, despite their humanlike appearance, they're just an odd looking fish... Right?

name: Five Nights at Roner's 2
summary: Searching for fast money, you stumble upon an ad for a paranormal investigation. Upgrade your office, maintain your systems, and above all else: don't let them get to you. It's easy work, right...?

name: First Queen
summary: First Queen is a Strategy game featuring artwork by Yoshitaka Amano. It was developed and published by Kure and released in Japan in 1988. It was ported to the SNES in 1994.

name: First Queen II
summary: First Queen II is a Strategy game featuring artwork by Yoshitaka Amano. It was developed and published by Kure and released in Japan in 1990.

name: First Queen III
summary: First Queen III is a Strategy game featuring artwork by Yoshitaka Amano. It was developed and published by Kure and released in Japan in 1993.

name: Fire Showdown
summary: "Fire Showdown" is a classic ARPG game with a retro style. The game can bring players exquisite graphics experience, hearty combat experience and rich and spectacular game experience.

name: Fishing Fishing
summary: Fishing Fishing is a first person fishing simulation role-playing game where you will travel to multiple provinces in China, experience different scenery and cuisine, and use a variety of fishing gear to fight against big fish.

name: Five Nights at Freddy's: Into Madness
summary: A free compilation of several previous gameplay ideas in the same vein as FNaF World: Update 2.

name: Fighting Frontier
summary: The three-day doujin convention has opened, but many troublemakers have shown up. Fighting Frontier is a small comedy 3D third-person action game with 3 levels. Knock those troublemakers down before they break the roadblocks or get into the hall.

name: Finder
summary: Finder receives an invitation to the Cradle from the lords of that ancient city. Use the map and unravel all the secrets of the mysterious labyrinthine, haunted city to find the only true path to the Philosophers Tower!

name: Find the Orange Narwhal
summary: Overcome your crippling hangover and work out how to get the Narwhal back! Point-and-click your way around town, run errands, and uncover the mystery. But choose who you help carefully - your decisions may come back to bite you! Think outside the box and brace yourself for a fever-dream adventure!

name: Fiskal Clif
summary: Live the American dream. Ride to success.

name: FindIt
summary: Try to find all the hidden objects, left clicking on them to collect them. The goal is to find all the objects to finish the level, or the episode.

name: FindIt: Bonus Maps 1
summary: This DLC includes another 5 special maps, extremely cool and beautiful, which will make you love the game even more, and a few more new objects to look for.

name: First Law
summary: Escape the ice caves of Europa and return home in this retro inspired 2D sci-fi platformer. Journey through ice caves using Newtonian physics.

name: FIFA Superstars
summary: FIFA Superstars was a football managing game developed by Playfish and Electronic Arts.

name: Final Spin
summary: A 2-4 player online party game about risking your life for the thrill of high-stakes gambling. Use your items wisely to gain an edge over chance and play until you are the last person standing.

name: Fishing Planet: Ocean Voyager Pack
summary: Go on a 30-day ocean fishing voyage in the waters of Kaiji No Ri island aboard the swift Scutum fishing yacht with the Ocean Voyager Pack! The yacht comes with 6 rod holders (2 for each player) and enough space to store the catch of each of three anglers onboard.

name: Fishlets: Ocean Conservation 2024 Pack
summary: Add four endangered marine critters to your aquariums in the Fishlets - Ocean Conservation 2024 Pack. Customize your saltwater tanks with the new Great Barrier Reef tank background and sand substrate. Care for the Giant Manta Ray, Red Handfish, Chinese Pufferfish, and Sunflower Sea Star!

name: Fishing Planet: Japan Odyssey Pack
summary: Get ready for a 60-day ocean odyssey to explore the surrounding waters of Kaiji No Ri island with the Japan Odyssey Pack. Bring along your friends on the luxurious Volans fishing yacht!

name: Fix-It Felix Sr.
summary: Fix-it Felix Sr. is a parody remake of the game Fix-It Felix Jr. featured in the Disney film Wreck-It Ralph. Fix-It Felix Sr. is a simple, colorful, and fun arcade game.

name: Fish Idle 2: Underwater Mystery
summary: Catch fish idle on a hook in the fish kingdoms and become an idle fish tycoon.

name: Find Brains
summary: Find Brains — action-adventure game with platformer elements. Long-forgotten and forbidden magic began to return to the world. Go on an adventure with slime Kevin and his friend Elis to restore him to his former power!

name: Fit My Zoo
summary: Help wacky animals to relax in the pool by matching them on the floatie!

name: Fields of Asphodel
summary: Fields of Asphodel is a 1.3 million-word interactive novel by JJ Laurier. It's entirely text-based, without graphics or sound effects, and fueled by the vast, unstoppable power of your imagination.

name: Finn JRPG
summary: Turn-based traditional RPG in a low fantasy setting. Grind mobs for gold and gear in a setting based on old Finnish mythology.

name: Finch
summary: This game is about finding mistakes by comparing the correct room with the wrong room. There are 6 stages in total, and each stage has 10 mistakes!

name: Fishtronomy
summary: Fishtronomy is an adorable minimalistic puzzle game where you launch fish through space to form constellations and help clean up the skies!

name: Five Nights with Mac Tonight 2
summary:
Ever since the Mac Tonight commercials came in, McDonald's has been swarming with Customers for their new night hourly openings. One McDonald's made so much profit, they decided to step up their advertising and order a set of new animatronics to entertain the customers while they eat! That's where you come in.
The animatronics were recently shipped to a Storage Facility that McDonald's owns that keeps old belongings in there from the past moments. The animatronics are as of now being stored in there until the Staff at the McDonald's get the place set up properly before the Animatronics arrivals.
You're were hired to work in their Warehouse due to word that people have been breaking into the Warehouse, and stealing or even vandalising the property.
These animatronics were spent a fortune on, and McDonald's cannot afford having parts of them stolen or even destroyed. Don't let anyone get in.

name: Find Your IF
summary: Find Your IF is a browser-mobile game based on the movie IF. The game is an augmented reality experience that uses your devices camera to find imaginary friends from the movie in the real world.

name: Five Nights at Freddy's Gameboy
summary: A complete port of the original Five Nights at Freddy's game to the Game Boy system.

name: Figure Adventure
summary: "Figure Adventure" is a trendy game with the theme of hand-made figures, which integrates card cultivation and placement and hang-up gameplay!

name: Fierce Soldier
summary: A side-scrolling shooter for the Vircon32.

name: Finch & Archie
summary: An episodic co-op murder mystery in which you play as one half of a crime-fighting duo: Jack Finch the detective or Archie the police dog! Use your skills to find evidence, interrogate suspects, and catch the culprit in a gritty 1930s setting.

name: Fiesta Animal
summary: Fiesta Animal is a party multiplayer game 5v5 online. Play with friends and your family! cooperation and friendship are your best tools to victory. Run, jump, swimming and laugh as much as you want!

name: Five Laps at Freddy's
summary:
Welcome to Five Laps at Freddy's, The premier animatronic kart racing circuit featuring you favorite and lovable Fazbear friends! Sponsored by Fazbear Entertainment

Select one of 12 of your favorite animatronic #FNaF characters and race on sixteen tracks set across 4 cups! Each track is based on your favorite locations from Five Nights at Freddy's lore, including Fazbear Hills, Midnight Motorist and more!

name: First Person Stapler
summary: Clear targets in your office call center and race to the exit in this ridiculous, stapler-centric target shooter.

name: Fix the Robot!
summary: With a limited number of levels, every repair task is a testament to your skill and ingenuity.

name: Final Fantasy Adventure DX
summary: A full colorization of Final Fantasy Adventure for Game Boy Color version. Also includes a new world map and many bug fixes.

name: Fighting Force Collection
summary: Who doesn’t love a good brawler? In Fighting Force, you and up two three friends have a simple, four step strategy: break things, get weapons, use those weapons to pummel people, and repeat as needed. It’s straightforward streetside carnage with a 3D flair.

name: Fire Emblem: 7 Siblings
summary: The continent has been at an uneasy peace following the fierce Magus war. However, 25 years after the fact, strife bubbles once again. Unanswered questions from the previous conflict abound, with dark forces on the move. One family finds itself at the center of the intrigue. An ailing mother and her seven children must navigate the trials that await them, while clinging to each other as they never have before...

name: Fighting of School
summary: Fighting of School is a fighting game, inspired by anime and games from very famous fighting game franchises, it mixes 8-bit elements with 16-bit sounds.

name: Final Destiny
summary:
Join the journey of a girl and baby looking to go beyond the end of the world.
Destroy all monsters and feel the dynamic combat system.

name: Fimbles: Fimbling Fun!
summary: Minigame compilation based on the CBeebies series.

name: Five Nights with Creg
summary: Five Nights with Creg is a FNAF-inspired survival horror game where players must defend themselves against five animatronic characters - Creg, Rebi, Freb, Segb, and Trab. The game features both online and offline modes, challenging players to survive night shifts while managing resources and monitoring hostile animatronics.

name: Find Cats2
summary: "This is a cute game for finding foodie kittens!" A few maps and a chance to find the furry creatures that are cleverly hiding!"

name: Final Fantasy XIV Online: Complete Edition
summary: This bundle includes "Final Fantasy XIV: A Realm Reborn", "Final Fantasy XIV: Heavensward", "Final Fantasy XIV: Stormblood", "Final Fantasy XIV: Shadowbringers", "Final Fantasy XIV: Endwalker" and "Final Fantasy XIV: Dawntrail".

name: Final Fantasy XIV: Dawntrail - Collector's Edition
summary: The Collector’s Edition includes Final Fantasy XIV: Dawntrail, the in-game bonus items, Dawntrail Special Art Box, Expertly Crafted Viper Figure, Adventurer’s Cloth Map, the Unending Journey and Adventurer’s Pen Case.

name: Final Fantasy XIV Online: Complete Collector's Edition
summary: This bundle includes "Final Fantasy XIV: A Realm Reborn", "Final Fantasy XIV: Heavensward", "Final Fantasy XIV: Stormblood", "Final Fantasy XIV: Shadowbringers", "Final Fantasy XIV: Endwalker" and "Final Fantasy XIV: Dawntrail". All in-game bonus items from the Collector’s Editions are included.

name: Fishlike
summary: High speed microgames involving fish, fishing, and fishlike activities.

name: Fire Emblem: Reincarnation of Light and Darkness
summary: An unlicensed Fire Emblem game using many assets from other Fire Emblem games. An alternative bootleg exists using Langrisser characters in the same game.

name: Fit Music
summary:
Exercise and music go together like aerobics and sweatbands! Whether you prefer to tackle rhythm-driven fitness routines or listen to your favourite tracks while you power through your workout sets, you'll get a combination of both with this title. Fit Music is a unique workout game for Wii where different fitness combinations are explored and tailored to suit your needs. Right at the start you'll undergo a physical analysis, which will let you know your current physical condition and help you set the goals you want to achieve. Fun and easy to play - just follow the on-screen character movements and you're ready to start on the road to fitness!

The Fit Music routines have been conceived by European fitness champion Patrizia Salviato, a pro coach who will be your in-game instructor. The game features two energetic modes - a fun Fit Dance mode that has you move your body and work out along to the music of 15 international dance hits, as well as a substantial Training mode consisting of a wide variety of dynamic exercise programmes. These are based on your physical condition, as determined by data gathered when first creating your game profile. There are different levels to suit your current fitness condition, and of course the higher the level you do, the harder the workout will be!

name: Finding Buddies
summary: Daniel has just started his adult life. Despite his sad past, he managed to move on and re-socialize. So many responsibilities are coming and it is up to you to decide how he will handle all of this. The great thing is that maybe you can find some cute guys along your path

name: Filler
summary: The aliens have taken over another city and it's your mission to kill them all and find your way to the bus station, hop a bus, and get out.

name: First Contact
summary:
A time-loop based puzzle, adventure game inspired by Outer Wilds and Carl Sagan’s Contact.

You wake up in the middle of nowhere, on a deserted island, without your memories…
Your curiosity drives you to find out where you are and why…
If you die, the day restarts, but your new memories remain!
Time your decisions well, because some locations are only available early on!
Solve puzzles in a 3D world, collect clues, and find out what’s behind the mistery!

name: Fit My Zoo: Zoo's Puzzle Pack 1
Fit My Zoo: Zoo's Puzzle Pack 2
Fit My Zoo: Zoo's Puzzle Pack 3
Fire Emblem: An Unexpected Caller
summary:
An Unexpected Caller is a group hack using the Telephone format, seen previously in Call of the Armor, Bells of Byelen, and Embers Entwined. Those hacks stand out in large part due to their varied, unique characters and interesting custom maps. This hack features neither of those.

The premise of this hack is simple. Make an entirely custom campaign, only using the maps and characters from the vanilla GBA games. While initially meant to be a short, lower effort hack after most of the team had just finished their work on Bells of Byelen, this project still ended up being a significantly longer endeavour than Call of the Armor, which we hope shows.

name: Fit in Bed
summary:
Fit everyone in the bed! Make sure they're happy so they can get COSY

Meet Alex, Max, their friends and Mr Whiskers in this surreal world where people can only move by the designs of an omnipresent hand (that is you, the player).

Make sure you fulfill their desires. Do it for the cosy.

Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 54 with the theme Limited Space

name: Fit My Dog
summary: Help your doggy friends relax after playing and find a perfect nap spot!

name: Fista Retro Horror Pack
summary:
Travel back to the early days of the internet and play the slasher fan games that started it all! You play as Jason Voorhees, Michael Myers, Freddy Krueger & Candyman in these old-school games featuring MS Paint graphics and WAVs ripped from VHS tapes.

This is an all in one program that contains all 4 PC slasher fan games by Fista Productions.

name: Field of the Dead
summary: Field of the Dead is a post-apocalyptic sci-fi horror game where you battle undead and mutants with space weapons. Level up, fight bosses, acquire rare gear, and explore infested areas to uncover the apocalypse's secrets. Supports single-player and up to four-player multiplayer.

name: Find Colibries
summary: Test your attentiveness in the captivating world of Aztec jungles in the game Find Colibries and find all the hidden birds!

name: Find Me
summary: This is a 2D flatformer game where you go on an adventure to regain your body, and you arrive at your destination through various sections. Lots of prepared obstacles, traps, and tricks. I hope you reach your destination with all your detailed manipulation, memory, persistence, and luck.

name: Five-element Seal: Infinity
summary: Representing the world of hell; A world that can shuttle through space, a world that can rotate continents... In the future, there will be more worlds and levels waiting to be explored, representing a world of creation where one can create their own world

name: Fishing Tale
summary: Fishing Tale is a relaxing fishing adventure game where you catch over 40 unique fish across diverse environments like oceans, lakes, and rivers. Customize your character, track your catches in a detailed journal, and enjoy the soothing sounds of nature.

name: Final Fantasy VI: The Eternal Crystals
Fire Emblem: New Theory of Thracia 776
Find The Thing
summary: Embark on a thrilling quest in 'Find The Thing'! In this immersive game, players are challenged to locate specific objects amidst a chaotic landscape of spawning items. With each successful discovery, players earn points and time, while the stakes increase with more objects spawning. As the score climbs, so does the intensity, with a cluttered playing field making each find more challenging. The ultimate goal? Achieve the highest score possible in this endless adventure of observation and quick thinking!

name: FightingChicken
summary: 3D shooting mini-game with easy operation. Save the chicks and eliminate the bats, pay attention to dodge and keep moving.

name: Fishing For Cats
summary: If you are tired of fighting and killing, then come fishing and feed the cats. In this game, you will fish in the park and feed the fish you catch to the hungry stray cats in the park, constantly improving your intimacy with the cats and becoming good friends with them.

name: FingFing
summary: Try to solve various puzzles with cute characters by tapping with your hands

name: Fish
summary: you click fish to get fish.

name: FightGirl
summary: Horizontal fighting, a game of passionate competition.

name: Find X
summary: "FindX is an all-age suitable first-person casual shooting game, where players need to find differences in two time-frozen and similar worlds, and use a variety of quirky weapons to address these discrepancies."

name: Film Morbid
summary:
You wake up in a small and messy room. There's a storm raging outside, with the lightning illuminating a projector in the middle of the room. You investigate the projector, which surprisingly is still equipped with a film reel. You get it going, but you're not sure if that was the best decision...

Do you have what it takes to escape the room and it's looping projector?

Film Morbid is a game made by Point Vertex, during the 8th Black & White game jam. The development of the main game took 10 days.

name: Find the Lost Lights
summary: Embark on an epic journey with Mono to retrieve the Lost Lanterns and restore light to the realms of Lunaris, Arcadia, and Luminis. Face unique challenges and formidable enemies in this thrilling platformer!

name: Find the Stalker
summary: Find the Stalker - a psychological thriller, that is set in a rural village. As our heroine, deal with your dark past, before it deals with YOU.

name: Fisher Guy
summary: Fisher Guy - A game with a top view, where the player as a fisherman must catch fish and deliver it to the chef's bucket, but only he will be hampered by eco-activists who are against your fishing, they have taken over all the islands!

name: Find The Cat
summary:
Find one different cat among many cats!
A brain training game that exercises your blink of an eye by finding cats!

name: Firework Syndrome
summary: You'll respond to the villagers' requests as the new Pyrotechnician of the village called Natsuwa. Draw your own fireworks and use them to mark special moments and illuminate the night sky to touch every heart with your dazzling artistry.

name: Fish Flash
summary: A simple arcade game where you maneuver your net to the left, right, and middle positions to gather as many fish as you can while avoiding the nasty snakes. Playing earns currency that can be spent on cosmetics. Do you love fishing and fashion? Then Fish Flash is for you!

name: Find Cats: DLC 01
summary: Free DLC100 cats [10% are hidden cats]Two maps [One are hidden maps]

name: Final Night
summary: A nightmarish descent into your worst memories awaits. In "Final Night," you're forced to relive your darkest traumas - now twisted into monstrous, living horrors that hunt you relentlessly. Every shadow hides a piece of your broken past, eager to drag you into the abyss.

name: Five Nights At Skibidi Toilets
summary: FNAST offers a unique gameplay that combines elements of strategy, survival and horror. Will you be able to solve the mystery of this mysterious building and prove the truth of the information from the newspapers?

name: Find it! Festival in the Hotel
summary: We are holding the Find it! festival in the hotel! Walk around the rooms and search for hidden items. In rooms filled with many things, can you find the items you're looking for? Enjoy 10 different themed rooms.

name: Fish Chips and Bombs
summary: Dive into the fin-tastic world of PvP (Phish vs Phish) where you use your gravity defying fishing rod to move around bombs and blow your fish friends into chips! It’s a reel blast!

name: Fill the Fridge
summary: Fill the Fridge is a fun and challenging game that puts your sorting skills to the test as you try to organize the contents of a fridge.

name: Five Fold Tower
summary: "Five Towers" is a Roguelike game, where the main gameplay is to fight monsters in the overhead corner. There are over 100 types of magic weapons and talents in the game, and there are various types of monsters in the tower, as well as multiple bosses for players to challenge.

name: Final Fantasy VI: A Soldier's Contingency
summary: A Soldier’s Contingency is a comprehensive gameplay and expansion hack for FFVI, based on the wonderful hack by Fedorajoe/Fauntleroy titled the “General Leo Edition”. In addition to being able to recruit Leo, there are 200+ new monsters, new alternate character sprites, 50+ new battle themes, an entire Gameplay overhaul, dozens of new items, beast hunting, new bosses, over 50 patches/hacks from the community, all major bugs fixed, new spells/skills, smarter AI, new plot twists, and far too much else to list here!

name: Final Fantasy XI: The Voracious Resurgence
summary: Final Fantasy XI: The Voracious Resurgence is an episodic story series update to Final Fantasy XI that began release in 2020. Like add-ons previously released for the game, the story series is introduced as part of a regular version updates. Unlike those add-ons, The Voracious Resurgence does not require an additional purchase to access.

name: FireStarter 2
summary: FireStarter 2 is a simplified forest fire simulation game that offers a first approach to fire science for all.

name: Five Nights at Freddy's: Secret of the Mimic
summary:
Enter the abandoned workshop of Murray’s Costume Manor and unravel the mystery left behind by the reclusive inventor, Edwin Murray. In Five Nights at Freddy’s: Secret of the Mimic, you’ll step into a world where every dark corner holds a secret and every flicker of light hints at an ever-present threat. The Mimic, a prototype endoskeleton, can adapt to any costume and become any character, including what you fear most. Armed with only your wits, a few gadgets, and a heavily redacted corporate briefing, you’ll attempt to retrieve Fazbear’s prized prototype technology while grappling with cryptic clues and a relentless shadow determined to dispatch all unwanted company.

Prepare for heart-pounding thrills as you explore the labyrinth of the deserted Costume Manor, discovering remnants of Edwin’s unfinished work and eluding the monster he’s created. Experience Five Nights at Freddy’s: Secret of the Mimic, and survive the mystery and madness. Five Night’s at Freddy’s: Secret of the Mimic will be available on June 13th, 2025.

Disclaimer: Fazbear Entertainment is not responsible for whatever you awaken in the dark.

name: First Blood
summary: A set of 14 Boom-compatible maps designed for pistolstart. The difficulty starts off like Episode 1 of Doom 1, then ramps up to some Plutonia / late TNT difficulty near the end.

name: Fire Emblem Fates: Map Pack 2
summary:
This add-on for Fire Emblem Fates is a compilation of the following DLC maps:

- Another Gift From Anna
- I: In Endless Dreams
- II: Realms Collide
- III: The Changing Tide
- IV: Light’s Sacrifice
- V: Endless Dawn
- End: Lost in the Waves

name: Fire Emblem Echoes: Shadows of Valentia - DLC Pack 4: Rise of the Deliverance Set
summary:
This add-on for Fire Emblem Echoes: Shadows of Valentia is a compilation of the following DLC maps:

- Battle of Zofia Harbour
- Outpost Rescue
- Flight from the Ruins
- Siege of Zofia Castle

name: Fish On! Bass
summary: Fish On! Bass is a Sports game, developed and published by Pony Canyon, which was released in Japan in 1999.

name: Five Years Old Memories
summary: This is an interactive omnibus animation based on interviews with my friends about their memories around the age of five, based on their personal sensory memories and episodes.

name: Fit My Cat: New Floor Pack
Fighting Fantasy Classics: Armies of Death
summary: Agglax the Shadow Demon is amassing an army of undead warriors to conquer Allansia. Can YOU defeat the nightmare horde of undead? Rally your troops and join a quest to seek out the special powers you will need to defeat the dark lord!

name: Fishlets: Natural Decor Pack
summary: Customize your tanks with 14 nature-themed decor objects in the Fishlets - Natural Decor DLC Pack! Create a blackwater haven using the leaf litter and cholla wood, add some beauty and serenity with the flowing bonsai trees, or decorate your marine tanks with shiny sea glass and seashells.

name: Filthy Rich
summary: Filthy Rich is the first and thus far only book of the Filthy Rich series.

name: First Comes Love
summary: First Comes Love is the first and only book of the First Comes Love series.

name: Fish
summary: It is a clicker game where you feed the fish. Click on the screen to feed the fish. You can get new fish every 3 hours.

name: Find Room 96 + Exit Station 7 + The Eerie Surroundings + HighScore Anomaly Shop + HighScore Anomaly Underground
Five Nights at Freddy's Cleanup Crew: Employee Assessment Teaser
summary: Hide from animatronics and sneak your way through environments on the exciting Story Mode, discovering the deepest and darkest secrets that lurk within a mysterious partner to Fazbear Entertainment.

name: Find Cats 3
summary: “A cute game for cat lovers of all ages! There are several maps and the opportunity to look for furry ones that are hiding intelligently!”

name: Fitness Boxing 3: Your Personal Trainer
summary: Start your fitness journey with Fitness Boxing 3: Your Personal Trainer for Nintendo Switch!

name: Fish Fear Me
summary: A top-down action roguelike about catching fish, fighting them, selling their bones, and catching more fish. Upgrade your boat and weapons, hunt down sea monster bounties, and try to become the greatest battle-fisherman of all time.

name: Five Lethal Demons
summary: Five Lethal Demons is a free 2D point-and-click adventure. You play the role of Helga who likes bloody and violent games. Therefore she hires a team to develop such game to her liking.

name: Find Us Cats
summary: Find Us Cats is a new hidden object game starring our favorite feline companions! Find dozens of cats in each level and aim for a high score in Level 1 of our free demo, the Planetarium.

name: Final Fantasy V-Pixel Freemaster
summary: Final Fantasy V-Pixel Freemaster v5.88 is an Ultimate or Redux-like version of Final Fantasy V for the SNES. It is the culmination of many authors work and two years of many revisions, bugfixing, and playtesting efforts. It is a FFV fan’s answer to the Official Pixel Remaster. FFV-Pixel Freemaster comes in two varieties with a ton of new QOL improvements including innuberable bugfixes, a new game plus, visible job class sprites in map, MSU1 cd quality audio, super custom classes, amazing optional patches like a fixed 2x abp,xp,and gil or a no encounters mode that allows you to get into a random battle by pressing start and many more!

name: Fill The Cup
summary: Main challenge lies in maneuvering the water stream around various obstacles that block the direct path to the glass. However, the player doesn't have an infinite supply of water. This means that players must use their resources wisely, ensuring they avoid unnecessary obstacles and carefully plan their water usage to collect all the stars and to make a happy glass full of water.

name: Finger Cuts
summary: Slice the shapes

name: Final Outpost: Definitive Edition
summary: Final Outpost is a survival strategy base-builder. You lead the last survivors of the apocalypse. Assign roles, craft tools, and manage resources carefully. Construct buildings, level up your citizens, and fortify your town against hordes of zombies. How many days can you survive?

name: Fight Legends
summary: RPG combat arena with bloody medieval sword fights for honor and shadow bounty

name: Firedog: Swooce & Rescue
summary: Firedog: Swooce & Rescue is a momentum-based platformer where you play as a firefighting dog with a powerful firehose. Balance the uncontrollable force of a handheld firehose with the athletic moves of a high-energy Pomeranian as you fight enemies, put out fires, and rescue the good citizens of Dog City. And yes, you can pet the dogs.

name: Fit My Dog: Dog's Puzzle Pack 3
Fit My Dog: Dog's Puzzle Pack 2
Fit My Dog: Dog's Puzzle Pack 1
Final Tank
summary: This is a top-down barrage shooting Roguelike game. You will experience driving a tank in a dangerous post apocalyptic wasteland to dodge enemy bullets and use weapons such as cannons and machine guns to defeat enemies and save the world

name: Final Fantasy IV: Daughter of Darkness and Light
summary:
What if the King of Baron had banished Joanna rather than Cecilia? That Kluya meets Joanna, the two fall in love, and they have a son and a daughter? And that, after tragedy strikes, this daughter ends up been abandoned in the woods… only to be found and raised by the King?

A single ripple becomes a wave that sends a pair of lovers down vastly different life paths. Cecil, the White Wizard. Rosa, the Dark Knight. This is her story–one of redemption from the darkness within.

'Final Fantasy IV: Daughter of Darkness and Light' is a fork of the 'Project II: Final Fantasy IV' hack. Not only does it include the bugfixes, restoration of missing content and revised script of the latter mod, but it also an alternate story with Rosa Farrell as the protagonist.

name: First Strike Still Deadly
summary: A set of 3 Limit Removing Levels for Doom 2.

name: Fire Emblem: Dream of Five - Definitive Edition
summary:
Dream of Five was an FE7, FEditor-era hack made in the early 2010s by a team of teenagers with too much time on their hands. For years, it has remained dormant, collecting cobwebs as the hacking scene advances in leaps and bounds.

Until now.

name: Fixation
summary: Fixation is a prequel to The Company of Myself. It is a puzzle platformer that focuses on smoky mechanics, like activating a switch by bouncing a smoke ring off of a wall. It also aims to discuss the various habits that people form and the ways that people behave depending on who is nearby.

name: Fishing?
summary:
A short atmospheric horror game revolving around fishing. You're alone at a lake in a forest, fishing at a dock.

But are you really alone?

name: Fishing for a God
summary:
I come to you, reader, with a warning born of terror and despair. Deep in the heart of a forsaken lake, where the waters run dark and still, lies a twisted game of fate and peril. A fisherman's tale, once filled with dreams of bountiful catch, turned sinister by the unknown.

Catch fish and journey to the enigmatic market, hidden far to the west, shrouded in darkness and secrecy. There, an unworldly buyer awaits, inscrutable and foreboding. Be wary, for the coins that burst forth in the market's belly are no mere trinkets but carry a haunting aura of evil.

Yet, as you brave this treacherous path, beware the malevolence that lurks unseen. For in the shadows of ancient trees, treehuggers skulk, eager to snatch your hard-earned catch and curse you with a darkness that spreads through your very being. My skin, once tanned by the sun, now turns black like theirs, a mark of doom that lingers. We are them.

I implore you, weary traveler, to wield caution and wit, for the lake's dark secrets have claimed countless fishermen before you. Their dreams of riches and glory swallowed whole by the lake's insatiable hunger. Tread lightly, for it thirsts for more souls to claim, entangling its victims in an eternal struggle.

Your journey's end beckons in the shop beyond, far to the east. Procure the enigmatic items it holds, and only then may you dare to hope for liberation - to "release him." But I beg you, heed my warning and break the cycle of this wicked game. Turn back, return to the safety of your home shores, and forsake the haunting allure of this macabre endeavor. Your life, your soul, they are precious, and this game is nothing but a cruel, treacherous ruse.

name: Find All 5: Vikings
summary: Hey you, warrior! Do you want to go to MeowHalla? Then grab your axe and sail with us to new lands full of glorious battles and rich booty.

name: Fire Strike
summary: Play 5v5 quick action matches for 5-7 minutes, upgrade weapons and equipment, arrange shooters, use tactical grenades and try to survive. Learn all the game maps and they will become your weapon in the world of the game engulfed in protests and critical confrontation of different fractions.

name: First in... Line?
summary: "It's opening night, and our lead star dropped out! Can you memorize these lines REALLY quickly?"

name: FIFA World Cup 2022
summary: Compete as one of the 32 qualified teams in a complete solo recreation of the FIFA World Cup 2022, either playing from the opening match or customizing your tournament experience by changing groups and including teams that didn’t qualify for the FIFA World Cup finals in a Custom Tournament. In Online Tournament Mode, progress through the knockout stages with any of the 32 qualified countries, and go for FIFA World Cup glory against others from around the world.

name: FIFA Women’s World Cup 2023
summary: Experience the FIFA Women’s World Cup in a variety of ways in FIFA 23. Step onto the pitch and lead your country as a soccer star with your own custom player. You can also compete in the tournament in Solo Tournament Mode or Kick-Off Mode.

name: Firebat: Revolution
summary: Break every brick in this retro pixel art adventure!

name: Find-o'-Lantern
summary: Solve logical riddles in this simple, yet challenging game based on the classic star battle format.

name: Fizz Quiz
summary: FizzQuiz is a trivia game with over 100 topics and 10,000 questions. Play alone or with up to 10 friends in seven unique rounds, featuring questions in text, images, models, and audio formats.

name: Fishing Mayhem
summary: Fishing Mayhem is a multiplayer game in which players catch fish and try to blow the other boats out of the water.

name: Fight Life: Vanguard
summary: Engage in strategic turn-based combat, manage and upgrade each character, and strive to reclaim harmony in a world on the brink of oblivion. Take on the mantle of leadership as you guide a mercenary squad through perilous landscapes, selecting your comrades from a diverse pool of skilled recruits.

name: Final Fantasy XIV: Crossroads
summary: Patch 7.1 introduces: new main scenario quests; the first installment from the alliance raid Echoes of Vana'diel, Jeuno: The First Walk; the Extreme version of the Sphene's Burden trial; a new dungeon, Yuweyawata Field Station; a new Ultimate Raid, Futures Rewritten; a new type of high-end content, Chaotic Alliance Raids; and more sidequests and sidecontent.

name: Fire Rescue
summary:
A game from 2009 that was distributed with Nestles Cereals. In the game the player controls a plane based on an Canadair CL-415 and CL-215.

Extinguish wildfires before the entire forest is engulfed in flames. Learn how to fly your firefighting aircraft. Fly low and skim nearby lakes to pick up water, then release it over the fires. Put out all the fires before time runs out to complete the level and save the forest.

name: Five Nights at Mr. Krabs
summary:
Five Nights at the Krusty Krab is the official prequel to Five Nights at the Chum Bucket, and was released on January 29th, 2015. It is the first game in the series.

Mr Krabs has opened a brand new Krusty Krab in the city, staffed completely by animatronic versions of his old employees (because it was cheaper than paying their salarys). You are hired as the night watchman at this new restraunt, however strange things begin to happen as the lights go out, and you find yourself in a greater danger than you had expected...

name: Fire Emblem: The Morrow’s Golden Country
summary:
Ulmaron. A world of constant change. Of mystical researchers. Of fierce warriors. Of fallen kings. Of undying darkness.

A young noble, seeking to prove herself. Her path will place her at the center of a conflict that may very well decide the future of the continent.

name: Final Fantasy XVI: Complete Edition
summary:
The COMPLETE EDITION is a bundle containing the following:

Game Content:
- FINAL FANTASY XVI Base Game
- Echoes of the Fallen DLC
- The Rising Tide DLC

name: Fist Hell
summary:
The city has a zombie problem and the mayor can't be trusted to fix it. Time to grab your friends & fight!

Game available on UFO 50.

name: Fisherman Simulator
summary:
Forge your path through the islands—Hunt for sea animals and other resources to make a profit. Buy and upgrade boats and fishing gear, and sail across the seas!
Tags

name: Five Hearts Under One Roof
summary: Yuman’s, the player, once solitary home and routine are now invaded by five beautiful women! Each has her unique charm – the 'childhood friend of 20 years,' the 'first love and former idol,' the 'demanding boss,' the 'bold younger girl,' and the 'shy recluse.' Who will you choose?

name: Fields of Gold
summary: Fields of Gold is a casual farming game where you grow crops, expand your fields, and build manufactories. Defend your farm from mischievous rabbits as you transform your land into a thriving agricultural empire. Start playing now and defend your farm before the rabbits take over!

name: Fix This House
summary: A relaxing and minimalist puzzle game where your task is to fix the building using a variety of blocks. Enjoy the interactive environment, soothing music, and sounds of nature. Solve puzzles, explore the world, and take your time.

name: Fishing Grind
summary: Fishing Grind is a first person 1-6 player co-op fishing game with a twist. The place you are fishing may not always be safe...

name: Firefighter Wizard: The Elemental Order
summary: FFW is a third-person action-adventure game with stylized firefighting. Use the power of magic to douse burning cities and fight fire forces of nature. Explore a fantasy world and find clues to the source of the disaster that turned once peaceful land into a fiery inferno.

name: Finnish Cottage Simulator
summary: Finnish Cottage Simulator is the ultimate cottage experience. Relax and enjoy the Finnish summer nature, go to the sauna, get drunk, grill food or play games with others!

name: Five Nights to Remember
summary: It's been three years since the tragedy. The newly established Fazbear Ent. has attempted to turn the public perception of the once-beloved Fredbear's Family Diner around with a hit show and a new line of animatronics, and they want you to join the Fazbear family as a night watchman.

name: Finishline
summary: A driving simulator that helps you reconsider your life choices

name: Fingun Forever!
summary: In a horrible tragedy, Casino Karen and her army of giant anime waifus have kidnapped your girlfriend. Pilot Fingun once again and save the day!

name: Fishdle
summary:
The only daily game in the word focused on fish, Fishdle is the brainchild of a keen angler who’s specially chosen fish with unique profiles that those who really know there fish will be able to get. Be warned, there are some tough ones that will test the mind of even expert anglers.

Guess the fish from the profile and score points – the fewer hints you need, the more points you score. There are over 50 different fish to guess – one a day. Share the game on social media to build your fishing karma!

name: Fight the Skeleton Mage from the Crypt!!
summary:
Welcome brave Wizard, take your staff and be ready to defeat an old plague who has emerged from the Crypt!

In this sidescroller game all you have to do is defeat the enemy. Easy and simple! The head is the weak spot!

name: Find This Pixel Anomaly
summary:
In Find This Pixel Anomaly your task involves monitoring real-time surveillance camera feeds. Identify any irregularities within the monitored areas. These anomalies can vary from missing furniture to cute visitors.

Found an anomaly? File a report and hope it will get fixed in time. Otherwise you will get in trouble, because too many anomalies will end the game.

name: Finn Dorset's Institute For Livestock Replication
summary: An animated incremental game about cloning livestock. Make as many moon sheep as you can. Research technology, upgrade your operation and become a clone farm billionaire!

name: Find the Cat
summary:
Welcome to "Find The Cat", a fun hidden object puzzle game where your mission is to find cats hidden in black and white backgrounds. Simply tap on the cats to reach your goal and advance to the next level.

As you progress through the levels, you'll discover new and exciting places around the world. Each level brings a fresh challenge, keeping the gameplay engaging and enjoyable. There's also a daily mode where you can search for more hidden cats in vibrant, colorful backgrounds.

New levels, scenes, and challenges are added regularly, ensuring that there is always something new to explore. You'll need sharp eyes and quick reflexes to find cats in the most unexpected places. "Find The Cat" is designed for all ages, offering endless fun and adventure for everyone.

Download "Find The Cat" now and start your cat-finding journey. Can you find all the hidden cats?

name: Fisraduth: Castle of Tyramis
summary: You control a knight with a sword that can swing high or low, and you fight creatures that can hit you or shoot things at you. Along the way you gain a shield that can block projectiles and can increase your armor/sword strength by going into rooms (including secret rooms) to collect powerups. You are usually limited to a single background in Family BASIC. Fisraduth uses darkness to hide portions of the background to give you the feeling of multiple rooms. There are even hidden, secret rooms.

name: Finding America: The Great Lakes - Collector's Edition
summary: Explore the beautiful areas surrounding the Great Lakes of America!

name: Fire Emblem: Cerulean Crescent
summary:
The Tale of an Untamed Land
Ellerie sets sail for the Cerulean Crescent, a new frontier yet to be conquered by any nation. While she dreams of amassing wealth and power, this untamed land won’t be so kind to a newcomer. The bitter feuds between the settler factions may prove deadlier than the malevolent coast itself. The young captain must navigate a treacherous balance of interests to come out of this mess on top.

name: Finnish Cabin Mayhem: Mökkimähinä
summary: Alcohol. Action. Violence. Get ready to take your friends "behind the sauna" using whatever there is at hand.

name: Fire Emblem: Immortal Sword
summary: A fan-made prequel to the popular Fire Emblem: Blazing Sword (FE7), Fire Emblem: Immortal Sword (FE7x) is the tale of a vast conspiracy to throw the world of Elibe into chaos, and of three young leaders caught in its wake. A tale of questionable alliances, political intrigue, and the confusion of conflict. Follow a cast of your favorite characters in a brand new adventure, as their mettle is tested in both battlefields and moral dilemmas. Explore a world of new classes, skills, and features that bring the classic land of Elibe into a modern standard of tactical depth.

name: Five Nights at Jaygi's: Into Dreams...
summary: After the events of the mishaps at Jaygi's Pizzeria, Ashley decides to relax and falls asleep after reading her newspaper. Upon waking up, she finds herself in a place that isn't like the real world and gets trapped

name: Final Fantasy XIV Mobile
summary: An official mobile version of the widely acclaimed MMORPG, developed by Lightspeed Studios!

name: Final Memories
summary: Point & Click Psychological Thriller about losing memories and gaining life

name: FiendFinder.com
summary:
At FiendFinder.com, we understand that conventional dating just doesn't cut it for everyone. That's why we've created a platform where the desperate and the damned can come together in unholy matrimony.

Whether you’re haunted by loneliness, thirsty for revenge, or yearn for forbidden knowledge, we’re here to match you with the perfect soulmate to fulfil your soul’s deepest desires – for a price.

name: Finity
summary: Fuse monsters, build strategic decks, catch wild beasts, and battle players worldwide in the ultimate monster MMO!

name: Fire Emblem: Path of a New World
summary:
Fire Emblem: Path of a New World follows the tale of the Wayfarers, a group of elite soldiers sent to control a rebellion born of an aristocratic conspiracy, trying to subjugate Trames under the rule of it's sworn enemy, Algard, both countries of the continent of Gravia.

Their tale continues as they find much more than a war or a political crisis...

name: Five Nights at Freddy's Stars
summary:
Five Nights at Freddy's STARS it's a Team-Based Online Fan-Game for up to 8 players.

Select a team: Protect or Attack, your main goal it's to get the highest score to win!

name: Fish Shop Simulator
summary: Manage your own aquarium shop in a cozy neighborhood of New York. Buy and sell fish, aquariums, and decorations to friendly customers. Create beautifully decorated aquariums and make a profit by selling them!

name: Final Fantasy I+II Premium Package
summary: This Japanese special edition includes two enhanced PlayStation ports of the first two Final Fantasy games with commemorative figures.

name: Firehawk FPV: Drone Warfare Simulator
summary: Nexus is a high-speed FPV roguelike shooter where you pilot combat drones through intense aerial missions. Master fluid flight mechanics while blasting through procedural missions. Customise your build, upgrade your base, and push deeper into enemy territory with each run.

name: Fist 2 Face
summary: Battle an evil grocery store clerk who won't stop overcharging you for your food. Keep an eye on the items as he scans them... Punch him if he tries to rip you off! Fist 2 Face will test your observation and reflex skills as the game progressively gets harder! Do you have what it takes?

name: Fiddler's Wood
summary: Fiddler's Wood is an atmospheric horror experience about being lost in the woods, it was made in 4 weeks by a solo developer for the Haunted PS1 Jam with a theme of "Folk Horror".

name: Five Nights at Vsauce VR
summary: Can you survive being explained to death?

name: Final Response
summary:
Final Response is an ultra brutal shooter dedicated to players who enjoy gore and visceral combat.

This game is build on Leaden Sky Update 4 engine - the goriest version of LS Demo before it began to focus on other aspects.

Final Response is a game with extremely advanced gore system and basic gameplay elements, but it does include some interessting things like stealth, dynamic lighting, day and night cycle and rain effects.

The game is very brutal, it features many gory mechanics such as surface based wound system, many amputation points for dismemberment, detailed blood spilling, permanent mess, prolonged death animations affected by physics and many more.

The game is made to be dark and edgy, but that's a part of it's charm.

name: Find Squidward
summary: A SpongeBob fangame inspired by the Wanted! minigame from Super Mario 64 DS, but with a few added twists and levels.

name: Fishing With The Homies
summary: Begin your fishing journey in this surreal angling experience! Be wary though, the current masters of these ponds might not respond kindly to a rookie fisherman appearing on their turf. Can you uncover the secrets that lurk beneath the surface and rise to the top of this fintastic experience?

name: Find All: Christmas
summary: What's that ringing filled the air? A wonder is coming! Santa has once again received many letters of wishes. The production conveyor have started! The Christmas season is upon us! Find 150 different items to give presents to everyone!

name: Fisher-Price: Time To Play - Dollhouse
summary: This software designed for younger girls provides a virtual dollhouse full of activities to encourage role-playing, exploration, and imagination. Players search eight different areas for hidden surprises and play with four interactive dolls at special tea parties.

name: Find Love or Die Trying
summary:
Welcome to Find Love or Die Trying, a dating show where ending up single means ending up dead! Will you find love? Or only score a date with death?

Not sure why you'd sign up for this, but now that you're here, you've got 7 days to get
one of the lovely ladies on your tropical island getaway to fall in love with you. If she's
willing to put a ring on it, you're both free to leave.

This version includes both the base game as well as the fan pack.

name: Fisher-Price: Big Action Construction
summary: Fisher-Price Big Action Construction is an activity center game released on September 17, 1998. It is Funnybone's take on Tonka Construction. In the game, the player can visit different work areas of the Big Action Construction Site. Collector Cards are rewarded for playing the actives. Obtaining all the collector cards in an activity will reward the player a certificate. One all six are completed, the player is declared a "number-one construction worker".

name: Finding America: New England - Collector's Edition
summary: Explore scenic landscapes and rich history of this iconic region.

name: Final Fantasy 5: Void Divergence
summary:
Chrono Cross meets Bravely Default in this re-imagination of Final Fantasy 5 with additional jobs and mechanics.

The main ideas were to make the battles more dynamic and give each character more, well, character. As a result of that every character has now access to an individualized job list of 21 out of total 31 jobs (freelancer is NOT available) while each job level now has a permanent impact on a character’s stats. For example klutz Bartz can not be a chemist and Lenna hasn’t it in her to go Berserker.

More dynamic battles are achieved via !Brave, !Def and field elements. Move a future turn to now with !Brave or take two turns at a later point with !Def while modifying the field elements to your liking with each skill or ability used. Changed field elements affect damage, healing and status effect chance.

name: Fisherman
summary: click start fish

name: Fighting Simulator
summary: This is a VR game in which you fight waves of enemies, however you want. Use your fists or gadgets to help you win. Unlock new abilities, and level up your character.

name: Finnish Pub Simulator
summary: Run your very own pub in the Finnish countryside either on your own or with friends! Manage your pub's inventory, set your own prices, and be ready to refuse service if things get too crazy.

name: Final Fantasy VI: Divergent Paths
summary:
Final Fantasy VI: Divergent Paths is a complete modification of Final Fantasy 6 for the SNES. At it’s heart, it is a storyline modification, re-arranging content, re-purposing content, and sometimes adding new content in order to make the game flow more naturally. Leo has been repurposed from a guest to a main character, with a full character arc, sidequests, and even his own musical theme. In addition, every named character receives an end to their story arc, both main characters and side characters.

There are more edits than just storyline modifications though. Instead of replacing an existing character, Leo is added as a 15th fully-playable character. A secret 16th character has been added too. You can even recruit crew members to the Falcon! There are new spells, new espers, new abilities, a reduced encounter rate, dummied content restored, and more. Over 2 dozen hackers are listed in the credits of the manual for contributions to this project.

Even with all of those changes listed, Divergent Paths has become somewhat noteworthy not for its changes, but for its restraint. There is no difficulty rebalancing, no retranslation, no graphical changes, and only a handful of spells and items renamed. Every change is made in service to its characters, and the core of the game remains the same. It never stops feeling like the Final Fantasy 6 you know and love.

name: Finally A NSMB2 Christmas Mod
summary:
The first ever Christmas themed mod for New Super Mario Bros. 2!

This mod includes:
~ Brand New Levels with a Christmas theme!
~ Brand new and familiar festive graphics!
~ Tons of remodeled enemies and objects to fit the Christmas theme!
~ Custom Snow themed Worldmap!
~ A Soundtrack made up of many game franchises!
~ And much much more!!!

name: Final Sanctuary
summary: A year after the disaster, the bunker's life support systems fail critically. Communication with the outside world is completely lost. You are a mechanical engineer, awakened in your quarters by a piercing siren, alone and cut off from the world.

name: Find or be Found
summary:
Find or Be Found is an asymmetric co-op horror game. Go on heists as a pair of burglars looking for the most valuable items in haunted houses. Locate the specific item to earn money and progress, but search for too long, and unimaginable horrors will awaken.

Play as either the hacker or the robber. Only the hacker knows what to steal and where to find it, and only the robber inside the house can grab it. Communication is key.

name: Find The Truth
summary: Find The Truth is a horror RPG puzzle game that revolves around a girl who has lost her memory due to an accident, and her journey to reclaim her lost memories. Your actions in the game will impact the story and lead to different outcomes.

name: Five Minutes Till Christmas
summary: Race against the clock in Five Minutes Till Christmas, a fast-paced holiday arcade game! Sprint through a bustling mall to gather last-minute gifts, evade vigilant security guards, and complete as many whishes before the time runs out. Perfect your strategy to top the global leaderboards!

name: Fitness Fables
summary: A fantasy world where fitness becomes an adventure. Fitness Fables turns your workouts into story-driven quests, combining fun challenges with beautiful, immersive environments.

name: Five Nights at Raiden's
summary: Five Nights at Raiden's is a Genshin Impact themed Five Nights at Freddy's fangame.

name: Fish
summary: Fish is an unreleased Atari 2600 game that was developed by Mike Albaugh in 1983. A prototype of the game was discovered in January 2025.

name: Fighter Aces: Sky Dominance
summary: Your Sky, Your Rules: Experience the Ultimate Aerial Combat!

name: Fishing Valley
summary: Dive into a story-driven fishing adventure!

name: Five Nights at Freddy's: Backlogged
summary: Five Nights at Freddy's: Backlogged is an arcade-style bullet heaven game set in the Five Nights at Freddy's universe. Destroy waves of enemies, upgrade your stats, and ultimately conquer each round in this high-action new take on the Five Nights at Freddy's series! But be warned - it seems that something isn't quite right...

name: Fideos
summary: Just shoot another eel's brain.

name: Final Redoubt: Zombie Apocalypse
summary: Survive the onslaught, manage your ammo, and endure in Final Redoubt, a relentless survival shooter where every bullet, every swing, and every decision counts!

name: Fiefdom
summary: Change the world, one battle at a time in FIEFDOM: a multiplayer action melee game set in a playerbase-driven story. Clash swords, cast spells, rain down arrows & more in in battles of up to 100 players both at land & at sea. Dive into a world where your victories define the outcome of entire wars. Who will you be fighting for?

name: Five Nights At Amendoca's
summary: Five Nights At Amendoca's (or FNAA) is a Five Nights At Freddy's fangame created by furry productions inspired by the Amendo Gordo channel, the most scoundrel channel on YouTube

name: Firewheels Shop Simulator
summary: Firewheels Shop Simulator lets you manage a diecast model store. Organize shelves, assist customers, and expand your shop in a detailed, realistic world. Hunt for rare and chase cars, trade with customers, and grow your diecast empire

name: Fight
summary: A turn-based roguelike with the micro mechanics of a sokoban block sliding puzzle. When you are sliding the blocks your end goal is to combine them into something that will help you progress through the dungeon. Each floor has a mini boss that holds the key to the next floor.

name: Five Nights at Roner's: Remastered
summary: You are an ambitious paranormal investigator searching for his big break. When you're presented the opportunity of a lifetime--$25.99, to be exact, you jump at the offer. But everything comes with a catch, and Roner and his friends are keen to teach you that...

name: First Steps in the NICU: Discovery Edition
summary:
Welcome to “First NICU Experience”! Experience neonatal care in this serious game. As a nursing student, work with medical staff and families to care for infants and tackle post-discharge challenges. With interactive choices and story-driven gameplay, learn key skills in 1 hour.

Players take on the role of a nursing student participating in clinical training at a NICU. By collaborating with medical staff and families, you will learn the basics of neonatal intensive care, communication with patient families, and the challenges of transitioning from hospital to home care.

name: Five Nights at Freddy's: Blood & Gears
summary:
"You hoped you'd never have to return to this place of sorrow, but after 20 years, something has called you back."

FNAF: Blood & Gears, created by JDBRYANTdev, is a ground up reimagining of the original Five Nights at Freddy's game by Scott Cawthon.

name: Find All 6: Netherlands
summary: Immerse yourself in an exciting adventure in the Find All 6: Netherlands game! You will explore the unique landscapes, historical cities and famous landmarks of the Netherlands. Look for hidden objects and color this painted world.

name: Five Nights with Mac Tonight: Halloween Special
