summary: Five Nights with Mac Tonight: Halloween Special is a Halloween-themed version of the FNwMT series.

name: Fiendrise
summary: Fight through endless hordes of enemies in FIENDRISE, an action-roguelike, bullet-hell game. Explore ever-changing areas, unlock powerful fiends, each with a unique set of abilities, and experiment with different builds to survive the chaos.

name: Firefighters Together
summary: Firefighters Together is a chaotic co-op action platformer where 1-4 players work together to rescue kittens from dangerous, fire-filled maps. Overcome challenging obstacles, extinguish flames, and save those kittens!

name: Fire Emblem: Curse of Lagdou
summary: Eight hundred years before Grado’s invasion of Renais, the Lagdou Empire dominates the continent. Powerful mages rule with technology beyond the ken of mortal man. Condemned by the gods, the empire drowns in blood and fire. A curse of the flesh, cast with fear and greed upon the innocent, births a single entity known as the Demon King.

name: Fight Ascension
summary: Survive the onslaught of endless waves of humanoid monsters in melee combat with manual mechanics. Defend, dodge, and counterattack as a warrior named Sentinel Ignis, who can manipulate fire to face his adversaries.

name: Fire Hero: Pixel Rescue
summary: Fire Hero - Pixel Rescue is a 2D pixel art platformer where you play as a firefighter rescuing civilians and animals from burning buildings. You'll travel through different worlds and biomes, following a story with short dialogues that reveal the dramatic events your character is experiencing.

name: First Person Shouter
summary: Yell at your computer and watch things explode. Pick one of 6 frustrating environments and 6 infuriating game modes. And SHOUT THEM INTO OBLIVION!!!

name: Fish Fight!
summary: FISH FIGHT! Dive into a bullet-hell fishing odyssey where the fish are tainted by a sudden, mysterious force. Reel them in, sell your catch, and upgrade your fish fighting arsenal! Journey through diverse biomes, each unveiling new mechanics, hidden secrets, and characters needing your help!

name: Fishing the Abyss
summary: This is a relaxing atmospheric game where you simply watch a robot catch creatures. Place it at the edge of your screen like a vertical desktop accessory and observe the ecosystem. It’s neither an idle game with mountains of stats nor an exciting fishing game.

name: First! Person Shooter
summary:
A game made for 7DFPS 2013.

YouTube is littered with people commenting "FIRST!", so obliterate them in the fast paced shooter "FIRST! Person Shooter." Sort through comments on a quest to cleanse YouTube, while trying not to delete useful comments.

Graphics by yours truly, music by Kevin MacLeod used under a Creative Commons License.

name: Firefly Village
summary: The Firefly Village awaits! A bite-sized, streamlined farming sim that focuses on moments that matter, without wasting a single second of your time. Build a homestead, raise crops, tend to livestock, make friends, and enjoy a pocket of paradise where farming is a delight and friends plentiful.

name: Firelore: Short Tales
summary: 3 short stories set in a mystical fantasy universe. You are a newborn Face of God. Hear tales of human suffering and triumph. Decide which Face of God you are. Pick a different fate for each main character. A short, linear experience that is introspective, emotional and spiritual.

name: Fisher Idle
summary: Start from scratch in the middle of the ocean as a fisherman! Buy bigger boats, upgrade your ships, and build your fishing empire. Remember: more fish means more gold!

name: Fish-Click Squad!
summary: Fish-Click Squad! is a casual multiplayer idler where you purchase various aquatic creatures and nurture them to maturity with your friends through clicking and touching earning coins and rewards to unlock more fish and idle features! There is nothing happier than slacking with friends!

name: Fire: The First Dreamer
summary: Uncover ancient secrets, summon totemic magic, decode enigmatic messages, and explore the majestic Preseli mountains of Wales in this open world adventure inspired by a true story. Dare to embark on this journey and rediscover the lost secrets of a life lived with purpose and meaning!

name: Fishing Clicker
summary: It is not easy to catch the best fish the first time. Being a good fisherman requires patience. Start with a small rod and worm. Fish and mysteries will earn you more money. Earn the chance to catch more mysterious and valuable fish with special fishing rods. You should choose your baits well.

name: Final Fantasy XIV: Seekers of Eternity
summary: The Patch 7.2 series update includes: New Main Scenario Quests, a new Dungeon, a new Raid, a new Trial, Cosmic Exploration, a new Large-scale Battle-oriented Duty – Occult Crescent, New Allied Society Quests – Mamool Ja, new Hildibrand Quests, Duty Support Additions, and PvP Updates

name: Find 100 Ducks and Blast Them!
summary: In this game, you must blast 100 toy ducks! Relax, take aim, and let the feathers fly! With light-hearted gameplay and cute ducks to hunt, it's a casual first-person experience full of wholesome, family-friendly fun!

name: Finding Pots & Pets
summary: Finding Pots & Pets: A charming hidden object game with a pixelated twist. Explore Bunnyland, discover cute pets and pots, solve puzzles. Enjoy relaxing gameplay, meet quirky NPCs. Classic seek-and-find meets pixel art adventure. For casual gamers and hidden object enthusiasts alike.

name: Finnish Cottage 8
summary: You've been trapped in a looping Finnish summer cottage. Use your observation and memory to find anomalies and make the right choice to escape the Finnish Cottage 8.

name: Filiy Eclipse
summary: Filiy Eclipse is an exploration action RPG that explores a mysterious science fiction world.Explore the surface, underground and sky of the star to discover what happened aboard it.

name: Five Nights at Sonic's Side Story Act 1
Fight Legends: Mortal Fighting
summary: Unleash your rage! Choose your class, weapons, and armor! Explore and fight!

name: Firefighting Simulator: Ignite
summary: Face unpredictable dangers, fight perilous fires with your crew, and save lives in Firefighting Simulator: Ignite. Step into the boots of a U.S. firefighter and play with up to 3 friends or with the help of your NPC controlled crew members.

name: Fishing Sim World: Pro Tour - Quad Lake Pass
summary: The Quad Lake Pass grants access to the next 4 lake add-ons upon their release. Four fantastic venues, one great price! Requires Fishing Sim World core game, sold separately.

name: Firearms Master
summary: Firearms Master is a horizontal scrolling shooting game. The story tells of the endless wars of the continent of Armas, you need to conquer this continent to end all wars.

name: Find Oann
summary: Find Oann is an action-horror game that follows the story of the protagonist, Thomas, who must solve mysteries, arm himself, and fight against horrendous creatures to survive and find the mysterious Oann.

name: FIFA Rivals
summary: Officially licensed FIFA football game featuring arcade style PvP on iOS / Google Play

name: Fire Magician: Arcana
summary: "Fire Magician" is a third-person action shooter game where the player controls a cute magician named Arcana, battling poker enemies. By stacking energy, the player can use cool wind and fire abilities to defeat the Poker King, Suoha, reclaim the Wheel of Fortune, and save their plundered homeland!

name: Fire Emblem: The Hag in White
summary:
In a world where the healing arts are forgotten, a chance encounter changes a huntress’s life forever…

Follow Kyra, a huntress from a small village, as she is dragged into a whirlwind of tragedy and hope in equal measures! Play through a campaign of over 25 maps! (Plus a wacky postgame if you feel like you want more by the end), meet a cast full of all sorts of heroes, weirdos, misfits… and baddies.

Experience an entirely revamped class tree! Due to the unique staff situation, lots of existing classes were reworked or recontextualized; a number of new classes have also been created. Listen to a fully custom soundtrack pulled from a plethora of sources! You can hear a few examples in the trailer and much, much more!

name: Fire Emblem: Dark Stone
summary: Ever wondered what would’ve happened if Lyon had been more proactive in his quest to destroy the Sacred Stones and didn’t just leave everything to his father and the generals? Wonder no further.

name: Find Love or Die Trying: Til Death Do Us Part
summary: The afterstory to Find Love or Die Trying is here! Continue your romance with your chosen partner in the world beyond the killer dating show. Will your love survive, when the world turns against you?

name: Fifi and the Flowertots: Fifi's Garden Party
summary: In Fifi and the Flowertots: Fifi’s Garden Party, Fifi Forget-Me-Not has forgotten all about the party she’s planning! Help Fifi and Bumble explore the Flowertot Garden, solving 15 charming puzzle games to gather treats and decorations for the celebration. With three levels of difficulty and all your favourite Flowertot characters, this delightful game encourages memory, logic, and problem-solving skills in a colourful, kid-friendly world.

name: Firefighting Heroes: Truck 911 Simulator
summary: Gear up and answer the call with "Firefighting Heroes: Truck 911 Simulator." Step into the role of a dedicated firefighter in this thrilling simulation, where you'll tackle fires across over 30 diverse areas inspired by real American locations. Experience the urgency of emergency response as you drive fire trucks, wield authentic firefighting tools, and save lives in a variety of challenging scenarios.

name: Fish With Names
summary: A surreal fishing experience.

name: Fire & Brimstone
summary: Fire & Brimstone is a traditional roguelike with a randomized skilltree. You play as Jess, a lonely imp come to explore the depths of a temple lost in the guts of a volcano, in search of a powerful artfact that may let them have friends.

name: Fireflies
summary: Immerse yourself in Fireflies, a Voxel-based Puzzle Platformer which takes place in a dark and dangerous world that you must venture to discover its secrets. Overcome difficult levels with menacing creatures lurking and ready to take you down.

name: First Light
summary: After a decade of living in the dark, away from the world. Bahar, and his wife Guidry, believe the Plague has ceased to be and are on the pursuit of a way out, a way back to the world they once knew.

name: Firefighter Frankie
summary: Help Firefighter Frankie, the brave Golden Retriever, save the town! Drive your firetruck, upgrade your tools, and fight fires . Find clues to solve the mystery and uncover who is causing the trouble. Relax and explore at your own pace in a colorful low-poly world.

name: Fisher's Idle
summary: Welcome to Fisher's Idle! Immerse yourself in the relaxing world of fishing, where you can buy and manage fishing boats to build a thriving fishing empire.

name: Fight Club World
summary: FCW - Fight Club World - Inspired by Fight Club is an exciting and intense fighting game that puts players in the shoes of skilled combatants from all over the world. The game offers a variety of characters to choose from, each with their unique fighting style and backstory.

name: File 47
summary: A forgotten file. An echo that repeats. Memories that aren't yours. The past always finds a way back. Are you ready to remember?

name: Fisher-Price Little People Christmas Activity Center
summary:
Join Dudley the Elf and help him get ready for Christmas with Fisher-Price Little People Christmas Activity Center. There are ten holiday crafts and activities to do including such tasks as decorating the Christmas tree, placing presents around it or heading outside to build and decorate a snowman. Many of the activity results can be printed using Avery Kids printable stickers.

Back inside once more, you can choose any number of Christmas craft activities and then join Dudley and the other Little People for a sing along of five perennial favorite Christmas carols such as "Deck the Halls," "Up on the Housetop," and "Jingle Bells."

name: Fish World
summary: Create your own underwater paradise in Fish World, a fun-filled 3D aquarium simulation game whereby you can collect from a huge variety of beautiful fishes, including both realistic and fantastical ones, design amazing tanks and share them with your friends! Let your creativity shine in Fish World today!

name: Fillet Fury
summary: Set in the Original Wild West, Fillet Fury is a high stakes game of strategy, skill, and survival. Engage in intense showdowns where every decision counts. Will you walk away a legend or lose it all? Literally!

name: Fire Emblem: Eckesachs
summary: An FE6 Rom hack starring the villains. The story has been rewritten in its entirety. Follow Zephiel and his jolly cadre of war criminals as they conquer the entirety of Elibe in a tale that is sometimes humorous, sometimes dead serious. Every single playable character from the game has been replaced by a boss and every boss is now a former Elibean playable or ally.

name: Fire Emblem: Eligor's Spear
summary: Long time ago, the remote continent of Amasea was ruled by fearsome warlords. The divine saw no choice but to intervene, and so put an end to the warlords’ tyranny. However, crypts of said warlords still remain scattered throughout Amasea. A collector of rare items and artifacts, Grismond, intends to add one of the warlords’ weapons - Eligor’s Spear, to his collection. This task falls on a trio of thieves: Skylar, Avanni and Camian. Little did they know that obtaining the Spear was the easy part. In doing so, they unknowingly put into motion a cataclysmic chain of events…

name: Fire Emblem: Sealed Hope
summary:
Llyr is the tactician of the Cipher Mercenaries, a small group of mercenaries that has accumulated fame over the years. After a successful job, he meets with his best friend, King Mao of Jrablibe who in search of his missing father, Aurlen. He believes his father’s disappearance is related to a object known as the Fire Emblem, and requests Llyr restore it to find further clues to his father.
Unknowingly to Llyr, his mission would only become a stepping stone into finding out the true meaning behind the world, and his life.

name: Fire Emblem: Shackled Power
summary:
The Land of Altina has been at rest for many years after the massive crusades from its most powerful nations, Birene and Gothen. Their collective conquests reduced the land to being split down the middle between their lands. In the coming years, both have dreamed of building themselves back up into great military powers to claim the rest of the land for themselves.

However, their latest stalemate resulted in the death of Gothen’s warlord, King Gustav. Morale in Gothen is low and must be corrected if they truly hope to get revenge on Birene. While Birene has been satisfied in turning itself into a trade empire, the surviving queen has been provided with an extreme measure for taking control… and she’s ready to act on it.

Via a thwarted attempt to put Birene into a state of array, the Birenian king’s youngest son learns that the Gothen queen is ready to put them in their place. With the aid of his new public recruiting program, Prince Prosel must assemble a force to cut off the queen and put a stop to her desperate attempt. If he fails, she could do far worse to him and his nation than they have ever been able to do to her…

name: Find All: Bunker
summary: Explore the underground bunker and the surface of the earth in anticipation of a nuclear explosion, finding various items and painting the black and white picture with colored inks.

name: Final Lap 3
summary: Final Lap 3 is the next sequel of the Final Lap racing game series. It is similar to the previous game, once again offering four tracks, though they're all new: the Silverstone Circuit, the Paul Ricard Circuit, the Barcelona-Catelunya Circuit, and the Enzo Ferrari Circuit. Like the previous game, it was an arcade exclusive and runs on Namco System 2 hardware. Up to eight players can play simultaneously when four two-player cabinets are linked together.

name: Fire Emblem Fates: V.O.W Edition
summary: A mod for Fire Emblem Fates. This mod alters the base story of Fates while also adding a wealth of new characters from other media each with their own classes to change up the game.

name: Fireplace Simulator
summary: Simulate your cozy fire, add logs and feed the fire to customize it to your preferred experience.

name: Fish Hunters: The Most Ridiculous Fishing Simulator
summary: Hunt fish solo or in co-op. Haul them in and take them down with crazy guns. Try out different baits and rods, explore unique locations, and complete your fish collection in the atlas. Or just kick back by the campfire with friends in this wild webfishing adventure

name: Fishing Zone
summary: "Fishing Zone" is an exciting and interesting fishing game. Players can trade freely in the Steam community market, and the shells can be recycled. Experience the exciting gameplay, enjoy the ultimate fishing fun, and the refreshing experience of gold coins exploding the screen!

name: Five Nights At Freddy's Pixel Edition
summary: Welcome to the FNAF Pixel Edition horror page! Get ready for a terrifying experience in the world of Five Nights at Freddy's.

name: Fisher Haven
summary: Fisher Haven is an immersive fishing adventure where you compete in the island's annual competition. Upgrade your gear, discover unique baits, and form alliances with fellow fishers to maximize your chances of victory. Explore diverse zones, catch over 100 fish types, and hunt down 7 rare species in this relaxing yet competitive fishing experience. Will you become the island’s ultimate fishing champion?

name: Figments of the Night
summary: You wake up on a deserted island with no memory of who you are or what you're doing there. You'll have to explore its surroundings, meet its other visitors, and find clues to uncover the truth behind this mysterious place... Or you can simply relax in this paradise in the middle of the ocean and accept ignorance. Whatever you do, do it before you have to go to sleep...

name: Fishing Master Kitty
summary: You will play as a little cat whose dream is to eat every fish in the world! Pick up your fishing rod and grow from a rookie angler into a legendary Fishing Master!

name: Final Fantasy VI: General Leo Edition
Finneon Accidentally Causes the End of the World
Five Nights at RPG Boy's
summary: A fangame of Five Nights at F***boys with its own basic story!

name: Fire and Ashes
summary: It's 1977. Henry Gray awakens in a psychiatric hospital, haunted by the ghosts of his past. Fire and Ashes await: An immersive survival horror where nothing is certain, insanity and reality mix, and voice recognition means every monster will hear you scream - within the asylum and beyond…

name: Final Fantasy III
summary: The mobile port of Final Fantasy III 3D Remake features touch controls, simplified UI and lighter graphical effects optimized for smartphones. It retains the core story and 3D visuals while streamlining the experience for on-the-go play.

name: Final Fantasy III
summary: The Steam port of Final Fantasy III 3D Remake features high-resolution graphics, improved lighting and full controller and keyboard support. It also includes Steam achievements and widescreen compatibility. Among all releases of the remake, this version offers the most technically polished and feature-rich experience.

name: Fighting Monsters In West Province
summary: Fighting Monsters In West Province is a side scrolling action game that embarks on a thrilling journey in a fantasy world.Defeat monsters with skill and courage,unravel conspiracies with wisdom and experience.You are not fighting alone,your friends in the Local Area Network will fight alongside you.

name: Fightland
summary: Mysterious cosmic forces have created the Fightland, and they’ve plucked warriors from across space and time to do battle there. Join with up to 100 other players in this massive team battle arena game where individual skill, squad tactics, and overall teamwork will determine the victor!

name: Figure it Out!
summary: A puzzle game with an eye in it. And it's free. The game, not the eye.

name: Figure Skating Legends
summary: Step into the dazzling world of ice and artistry with Figure Skating Legends, the ultimate figure skating experience! Whether you're a seasoned skating enthusiast or a curious newcomer, this game invites you to glide, spin, and jump your way to glory.

name: Final Hour
summary: In a world on its deathbed, explore and connect with your neighbors for one last day.

name: Final Rounds
summary: That's the final round, I swear this time, one last time for today... Final Rounds is a simple, yet highly addictive arcade game. Avoid the obstacles, enjoy the levels and beat your highscores!

name: Final Rounds: DLC
summary: This is a DLC for Final Rounds, which unlocks all game content at the start

name: Find All Things
summary: Welcome to the world of puzzles in the new exciting game Find All Things! Play a variety of mini-games in different themed locations, from Japan to a car repair shop. Look for hidden objects, find pairs, solve puzzles, enjoy match-3 games or train your memory, all in one game.

name: Find Charlie
summary: Find 40 little Charlies in an interactive cartoon world. Some can be spotted by careful obersavation. For others, you need to interact with the world and solve a few puzzles.

name: Firework Defence
summary: Use a variety of fireworks to fend off misfortune and protect your family!

name: First Steps in Child Developmental Support
summary: Yuuka, a nursing student, is doing a summer practicum at a Child Development Support Center. Explore the facility in a role-playing format and experience child support activities. Learn about medical care, therapeutic interventions, and home healthcare over three days.

name: Fish Idle 2: Underwater Mystery - Welcome Pack
summary: This DLC contains 500 crystals and a great upgraded fishing rod that will help you open up new horizons. You will be able to upgrade your skills more effectively, and 500 crystals helped make a new round in the development of your boat

name: Fit-Right-In
summary: Shape-shift your way through crazy wall cutouts in this fast-paced game show! Will you take the top spot in the most prestigious game show in the world and be among the greats?

name: Fix-mas
summary: 『Fix-mas』 is a top-view action game centered on Just Avoidance. Make a screw over the enemy's head with magic bullets and accurate evasion, rush it in and throw it in! Make a screw over the enemy's head with a magic bullet, rush it in and throw it in!

name: Five Nights Before Freddy's
summary: You are hired to work the night shift, 12AM to 6AM, for five days before the grand reopening, to observe the animatronics since they can roam around at night, but you begin to see there's more to their roaming, they're acting mysterious...

name: Five Nights at Freddys: Final Hours
summary: Welcome to your new summer job at Freddy Fazbear's Pizza, where kids and parents alike come for entertainment and food as far as the eye can see! The main attraction is Freddy Fazbear, of course; and his two friends. They are animatronic robots, programmed to please the crowds! The robots' behavior has become somewhat unpredictable at night however, and it was much cheaper to hire you as a security guard than to find a repairman.

name: Fissh
summary: Set sail on a grand adventure to acquire your fortune on the high seas. Will you earn enough croins to retire or sink your crab-catching boat and be back where you started?

name: Fireboy and Watergirl 4: In The Crystal Temple
summary:
Join Fireboy and Watergirl in this new adventure in: The Crystal Temple!
In this new temple, there are crystal portals that teleport objects around.

name: Final Fantasy VIII Remastered
summary: The mobile edition of Final Fantasy VIII Remastered brings enhanced 3D character models and touch-optimized controls. While the content and visuals remain faithful to the console version, the mobile release does not include achievements or controller support at launch and lacks cloud saves. It offers a streamlined experience suited for portable play, with full story content and quality-of-life options like battle boosts and encounter toggles.

name: Final Fantasy IX
summary: The PC version of Final Fantasy IX features high-resolution character models, improved FMVs and modern enhancements such as auto-save, fast-forward and battle boosters. It supports both controller and keyboard/mouse input. The Steam release also includes achievements and allows for community-created mods, including the popular Moguri Mod, which restores original-style backgrounds and audio.

name: Fish Stick Protocol
summary: Gather up to 8 players and dive into chaotic procedural dimensions to collect artifacts for the Owner's peculiar galleries.

name: Final Sentence
summary: Final Sentence is a Battle Royale typing game. Together with other players, you find yourself in a hangar, with a typewriter in front of you and a revolver loaded with a single bullet at your temple. Every mistake can be fatal. Only one will remain.

name: Fire Emblem: Illuminated
summary: Fire Emblem: Illuminated is a FE8 romhack that has been in development for over 6 years. The game spans 44 chapters and nearly everything about the game is custom, including story, maps, characters, weapons, music, and much, much more. Follow Jay as he travels around the war-ravaged continent of Ralspar searching for both his place and purpose in the world… While also running from his fate!

name: Five Nights at Frickbear's 3
summary:
Five Nights at Frickbear's 3 is a FNaF fangame with a big focus on player choice and replayability, featuring a uniquely goofy art style, a metric buttload of unique animatronic enemies, 3D free-roam minigames, and multiple story routes!

Can YOU survive Five Nights at Frickbear's? ...3?

name: Final Fall
summary:
Final Fall is a psychological horror game about schizophrenia, trauma, and the monsters we carry inside. You play as Ophelia, a woman with no memory after a failed suicide attempt—lost in a crumbling asylum filled with hallucinations, riddles, and voices that won’t stop whispering.

Explore a world shaped by Ophelia’s fractured mind. As her sanity slips, the hospital twists around her—walls bend, whispers grow louder, and reality becomes impossible to trust. Solve brutal puzzles, survive disturbing hallucinations, and confront terrifying creatures born from her guilt.

Suicide isn’t just a backstory, it’s a mechanic. Misusing items or failing in key moments may push Ophelia to end her life. Do it three times… and your save file is permanently deleted.

name: Find Clowns
summary: The game is about finding 20 clowns who have wandered into a castle! There are a total of 100 characters in this game! Experience not only the search for clowns, but also what kind of characters live in the game world.

name: Finger Slayer
summary: Play the best reaction time game with latest Saw Mode to check your accuracy and focus to reach highs core and unlock the mystery! Get the new adventure of finger slayer iPhone game.

name: Fit and Fry
summary: Cooking here is a delicious puzzle. Each level is a new dish to prepare, and your challenge is to fit all the ingredients perfectly into the pan. But be careful: space is limited, and only the best chefs will be able to complete each recipe without wasting anything.

name: Five Nights with CJ
summary:
A friend's house records Production

You, Alec a young, accomplished, handsome and charismatic individual are contractually obligated to finish The Fencesitters's debut album, "Picture Day" before CJ's arrival in 5 nights, but things go horrifically wrong when night falls...

Can you survive FIVE NIGHTS, AND finish the hotly anticipated album by The Fencesitters, "Picture Day"

A Five Nights At Freddy's Fangame to promote The Fencesitters newest single "Flight Song" on digital streaming platforms everywhere

name: Find Brooklyn Guy!
summary: Find Brooklyn Guy in each of his hiding spots! Pesky Brooky has been skipping work and hiding in dangerous locations, and it's up to you to spot him around the city & defeat the nefarious gang of magical wizards in this 9 level point-and-click adventure game.

name: Firescape
summary: Firescape is a short game where you play as a firefighter. Need to put out a fire? Use your fire extinguisher! Need to get to the fire if it's too high? Fly your fire extinguisher! But be careful, something hides in the fog. He is watching. He always watches. He knows, you are somewhere here. Try to stay inside or he will see you.

name: Fish out of Water's Fish n' Ship
Figure Shop Simulator
summary: Run your own figure shop! Produce figures with 3D printers, stock your shelves, set prices, and offer the best shopping experience to your customers. Manage your storage, expand and design your store. Try to complete collection sets, follow market trends, and grow your business!

name: Fischer's Fishing Journey
summary: Put Fischer on your desktop as your ultimate study and work buddy. He'll fish quietly in the corner, taking care of it all—you just drop in occasionally to collect your rewards, unlock new fish, upgrade your rod, while enjoying that calming, healing atmosphere.

name: Fingerzilla
summary: Fingerzilla is a fast-paced, explosive game of utter destruction. Using your own finger(zilla), rain fiery chaos down upon buildings, cars, and people. The interface is simple, but the joy of squashing your boss is priceless!

name: Filthium Zero
summary: Filthium Zero is a single-player survivor-like action roguelite. Purge the Filthium-infested zones of Earth, take on hordes of mutants reanimated by the corruption, engage in vertical and ground combat, and watch the ragdolls fly.

name: Finger Slayer Seasons
summary:
Finger Slayer Seasons is one of the most thrilling and fun reaction time game for Android. Test your reaction time by saving Fingoo from the continuously moving Sharp Saw. Finger Slayer Seasons 2 is a brand new fun edition to the Finger Slayer series. Play this fun exciting new mode in Seasons 2 today, see how your reaction time is!

The objective is to drag your finger on the screen, save FINGOO from the dangerous moving SAW which moves in different speeds while completing the puzzle image placed in the background. Be sure to collect as many coins as possible for more fun and points. Remember you have to collect all the pieces of the puzzle to complete the jigsaw.

name: Five Owls
summary: Five Owls is a visual novel telling the story of Veronica and her crazy adventure set in the 21st century in the beautiful city of Pińczów in Poland. The girl is a type of gaming loner who doesn't look for trouble- it finds her!

name: Fishing Shop Simulator
summary: A post apocalypse world where you catch fish to sell and collect in your shop! As you rebuild your shop - a town begins rebuilding around you and more types of customers begin showing up. Explore the ruins of the 'Old world' and find new fishing spots to get bigger and better catches!

name: Final Zone
summary: Memory of the God of War… In the future of the 2000's, war is no longer fought with missiles weapons or nuclear bombs. With the high technology of military satellite, enable to monitor any large scaled forces....

name: Fist of Fury
summary:
Fist of Fury is a martial arts guru game about the balance between zen meditation and fierce fight. Be fast. Be fearless. Be flexible. Empty your mind and be shapeless – like water. Forget about yourself and follow the opponents’ movements. Train harder, punch faster, unlock new epic heroes and try their exclusive power-ups.

FEATURES
- 21 heroes with unique abilities
- 6 locations to fight in
- sharing options

name: Finding Alex
summary: Zoe just came back home after a year of boarding school. However, his best friend is missing... Please help Zoe figure out what is happening through this puzzle game.

name: Fish to Dish: Idle Sushi
summary: Welcome to Fish to Dish: Idle Sushi! This is a relaxing and enjoyable idle fishing game that can sit at the bottom or any corner of your screen, allowing you to enjoy a leisurely sea fishing time in your busy life.

name: Fire Emblem: Sacred Stones Reforged
summary: Sacred Stones Reforged is an extensive graphical and gameplay overhaul of Fire Emblem - The Sacred Stones that aims to add onto the original experience while still maintaining a similar feel to the original work.

name: Find All 7: Japan
summary: Immerse yourself in an exciting adventure in Find All 7: Japan! You will have to explore the unique scenery of an ancient temple and a colorful summer festival. Look for hidden items and color this mysterious painted world.

name: Fishing
summary: Fishing with a dragon boss at the end. Length: Normal. Difficulty: Medium. Unlocks by: Beat AR Shot for the first time.

name: Find All 8: The Road to the Maya
summary: Immerse yourself in an exciting adventure in Find All 8: The road to the Maya. You will have to explore colorful city streets, unique jungle views and ancient temples of a lost civilization. Look for hidden objects and color this mysterious painted world.

name: Find Cats 4
summary: “A cute game for cat lovers of all ages! There are several maps and the opportunity to look for furry ones that are hiding intelligently!”

name: Final District
summary: Landing on planet Kepler-11e, You and up to 3 other players are tasked with preventing the planet from complete destruction as a nuclear meltdown is in progress. Upgrade weapons, Eliminate any aliens in your way and enjoy the beautiful sights in this realistic, first-person, sci-fi experience.

name: Fishing Simulator 2025
summary: Your Journey to the Perfect Catch Begins Here.

name: Fire Emblem: In the Name of Bern
summary: Bern’s war of liberation has ended in disaster. A year of bitter fighting following Lord Hector’s successful defense at Castle Araphen has seen its generals scattered, and its king fallen. Much of Bern now finds itself occupied by the victorious Lycian armies, led by Lord Roy of Pherae. Narcian, one of Bern’s three Wyvern Generals, lives life on the run after failing to negotiate a non-aggression pact with Etruria. His fortunes begin to turn after a fateful encounter with Bern’s Princess Guinivere, and together with Elibe’s villainous and virtuous alike, he embarks on a journey to restore his honor, and that of his country…

name: Fire Emblem Fates: Revelation - Heirs of Fate
summary: Heirs of Fates is similar to The Future Past series from Awakening, where in another dimension, after the war ended, mysterious invaders started attacking the Deeprealms. The children's parents fought to protect them, although their fate is unknown. Shiro, Kiragi, Forrest, Siegbert, and two Kanas inherit and wield their parents' weapons. Shigure narrates the story, which consists of six chapters.

name: Fire Emblem Fates: Before Awakening
summary:
Before Awakening is a free DLC map for Fire Emblem Fates. It features a crossover battle where the player teams up with Chrom, Lissa, and Frederick—main characters from Fire Emblem Awakening. The map becomes available early in the game and offers unique dialogue depending on whether you're playing Birthright, Conquest, or Revelation.

Completing the map rewards the player with a Breath of Life 1 skill scroll, which can be used to grant a healing aura ability to any unit.

name: Find All 7: Japan - Extra Level
summary: This DLC adds another lengthy scene with 200 hidden objects to find.

name: Find All 9: Fantasy
summary: Immerse yourself in an exciting adventure in Find All 9: Fantasy. You will explore the fairytale village, the colorful streets of the city of mages and the unique scenery of the soaring dragon islands. Look for hidden objects and color this mysterious painted world.

name: Fire Emblem: Bound Destiny
summary: A story-driven tactical role-playing game that asks what it truly means to be human.

name: Fields of Fortune
summary:
In Fields of Fortune, you start out on a small island with just a few tools and the idea of building something from scratch. You plant crops, place buildings, and slowly turn your patch of land into a working little farm.

As you progress, you unlock new things: crafting tools, refining materials, and exploring other islands for rare resources. You can travel to the city to sell your goods or take on small tasks for extra rewards.

Animals are part of your farm too – you feed and water them, build pens, and collect what they produce. Whether you like to play at your own pace or plan things out for maximum efficiency is completely up to you.

name: Find All: Bunker - Extra Level
summary: This DLC adds another lengthy scene with 270 hidden objects to find.

name: Fight For Love
summary: We combined card games, dating sim and roguelikes to create the most unique game about love and sex. Date your lover in turn based card combat, have sex in rhythm game boss battles and Fight with love!

name: Fireside Feelings
summary: A game about sharing emotions and listening to the ones of other people. Embody a cute character, create your cosiest safe place and gather around the campfire to be a part of a collective story. We all need a good talk under the stars

name: Finger Party
summary: Role-play as a regular finger in this short incremental game about plopping and collecting colorful blobs.

name: Find It! Brain Training Challenge
summary: Spot the Difference! A quick and easy brain game where just one thing is out of place.

name: Fishing Up
summary: Catch 48 unique fish and complete collections in a relaxing fishing game. Explore different locations, use various baits and rods, and enjoy a peaceful angling experience.

name: Fishing Pond Simulator
summary: Lucky Scratcher is a scratch-off game with light Rogue elements. You are invited by the mysterious organization "Lucky Club," where anything is possible—provided you can prove yourself favored by the Goddess of Luck. (This game contains no gambling elements.)

name: Figurine Shop Simulator
summary: Run your own figurine shop! Order, paint, and display collectible figures, set your own prices, manage sales, and expand your store. Tournaments, mystery boxes, rare drops, and community events are just the beginning!

name: Fire Burning City
summary: Turn-Based + Survivor-Like?Play as a agent in a burning cyberpunk city! Strategize grid-by-grid, unleash skills to clear waves of enemies, and survive escalating challenges. Uncover secrets behind the chaos with simple, tactical moves. Can you outsmart the flames?

name: Fire in the Dark
summary: Fire in the Dark is a dark psychological horror with a unique atmosphere. Explore two interconnected worlds: the girl’s real-life room and the game on her computer, uncovering her hidden traumas.

name: Fill Up the Hole
summary: Fill Up The Hole is a short incremental game where you help peons create as much garbage as possible and toss it into a hole. Watch your village grow and evolve as you unlock visual upgrades and new features.

name: Fingerdance
summary: The game that simply confuses your fingers.

name: Fishtopia
summary: FISHTOPIA is a pixel art style casual game blending idle gameplay with card collection. Discover 12 card types with special effects, featuring 300+ unique creatures and 100+ decorative items. Mix and match vibrant themes to craft your cyberpunk aquatic world.

name: Final Fantasy Tactics: The Ivalice Chronicles
summary: This dramatic tale of ambition, betrayal, and honor comes to life again with an updated and enriched script with fully voiced dialogue, alongside improved graphics that bring a new level of immersion and playability to the battlefield. Additionally, the enhanced version brings quality-of-life updates like new difficulties, a revamped UI, auto save, and more that make the game more accessible to newcomers.

name: Find My Frogs
summary: Find My Frogs is a cozy hidden object game full of frogs, mushrooms and moss. Help Uncle Froger take a commemorative photo, or just lounge in the pond and relax.

name: Fire Up: Football Manager
summary:
Take charge of your club, strengthen your squad, and win over a legion of fans!

In Fire UP - Football Manager, you step into the crucial role of manager of a once-great local football club now on the brink of bankruptcy. After years of poor results, the club faces financial struggles and the loss of its loyal fanbase.

name: Five Heads
summary: Five prisoners each have a visible-to-others card on their forehead. Across three rounds, they logically deduce and rank their cards from lowest to highest. On the final round, each guesses their exact card, using every prior guess as a clue. A single mistake can doom them—can you solve it?

name: Finding Cool Sticks
summary: Explore to find cool sticks and pretend they are swords and guns and other weapons and you can name them and you can discover secrets in the forest using your sticks and also fight against skeleton monsters.

name: Fishing Alone
summary: Fishing Alone is a game where you play as an automata service robot, endlessly fishing in a tranquil, post-apocalyptic world, uncovering fragments of the lost human past.

name: Finger Soccer
summary: Finger Soccer is a button soccer game where you flick to score incredible goals from midfield! Choose from over 30 teams, compete in tournaments, penalty shootouts, and many more. Play solo or with friends, and become a finger football champion!

name: Fire Hop
summary: A platform shooter game with following fireballs, various enemies, parkour & more!

name: Fishing Pro Simulator
summary: In Fishing Pro Simulator, cast your line, sit back, and enjoy the peaceful sounds of nature. Relax, explore, and master the art of fishing. Time your pull just right to reel in the biggest catch of the month!

name: Find Cats 5
summary: This is a game where players search for the souls of many lost cats in a 3D world. The protagonist is an angel cat responsible for retrieving the souls of lost cats. Players need to play as the angel cat and explore and discover in different 3D worlds!

name: Finger Fury Showdown
summary: Prepare your fingers for the addictive Finger Fury Showdown, a skill-based 2D fighter with kung fu action. Every punch is significant! This is a martial arts tale, not just a fighting game!

name: Fishing the Sky
summary: "Launch the hook to the sky! Capture the unknown!"Use a specially designed anti-gravity fishing rod to fish for strange flying creatures in the mutated clouds, establish a new era of Earth's ecological atlas, and explore the oddities of civilization in the joy of picking up trash.

name: Finalloop
summary: 《FINALLOOP》 is a roguelike game that combines real-time combat with deckbuilding mechanics. Engage in fast-paced battles where every decision matters, face ever-changing enemies and challenges, and build unique decks to craft your ultimate tactical playstyle!

name: Find the Differences 3D
summary: A game of finding differences in 3D environments. In 30+ levels with 6 different themes you can find: Hidden object, colour, size, rotation and location differences. Also Find the same objects in different environments. Control with the mouse and navigate with the free camera. Have fun!

name: Finnigan Fox
summary: Join Finnigan Fox on a journey into a magical land. Take up your sword and crossbow to defeat enemies! Master the seasons with your magic to solve puzzles. Collect treasure to upgrade your equipment and abilities. Find all the special tree seeds to help your friends rescue the forest!

name: Find 5 differences!
summary:
Find five differences between two pics! Hundreds of levels for you to solve.

Simple, fun and addictive gameplay.

Play for free now!

name: Fief Lord
summary: A pixel-art 2D side-scrolling strategy game inspired by the Kingdom series. Expand your fiefdom, recruit soldiers to defend against nightly threats, and ultimately defeat the enemy deep within the forest to bring lasting peace to your lands.

name: Fields of Malice
summary: Fields of Malice is a turn-based strategy rogue-like deckbuilder with elements from auto battlers! Buy your cards from a shop and upgrade them by getting multiple of the same level. Use these cards to summon units and affect the board and fight off the Malice!

name: Fish³
summary: FISH³ is high-octane, surreal speed-fishing adventure where your boat is powered by fish! Engage in time-attack stages, dual-rod fishing, and underwater spear-fishing in a dreamlike world teeming with bizarre aquatic creatures.

name: Fireside Friends
summary: Fireside Friends is a cozy multiplayer sandbox where players explore a vast world, catch fish, play instruments, and uncover secrets with friends or on their own. Complete a rich compendium filled with animals, vehicles, fish, and locations to discover. It's a kid's game for adults!

name: Fiendish Quest
summary: To save her petrified mother, the heroine embarks on a journey to find the legendary orbs that can grant any wish.

name: Fightstone Amnesty
summary: Use your reflexes to defeat powerful enemies in this RPG with combat inspired by Punch Out. Journey to save everyone from those terrible monsters… before you become one yourself.

name: Fighting Fantasy Classics: Eye of the Dragon
summary: In a tavern in Fang, a stranger offers YOU the chance to find the legendary Golden Dragon—hidden in a deadly labyrinth beneath Darkwood Forest. Face brutal traps, savage beasts, and dark magic in a quest that begins with a life-risking potion.

name: Fight-Quest
summary: The first-person melee roguelite. Fight-Quest is a brutally satisfying deckbuilder where you fight thousands of fantasy foes, discover game-changing enchantments, and extract with your hard-earned gold.

name: Fish 'n Ships
summary: Take to the seas on your little boat and catch some fish in this 2D cozy fishing experience! Explore the drizzly coastline, upgrade your boat, and bring home the big one! How many fish can you catch?

name: Fixer Park-er
summary:
You've been thinking about your childhood park a lot recently: it was closed some years ago after the original contributor paying for it's maintenance died and it has since been left to fall into disrepair, now overgrown and abandoned. You've been trying to find a way to help out the old neighborhood for a while now and this might be a 2 for 1 opportunity.

Time to get to work and restore the park to it's former glory.

Take your time exploring the park, using tools to break open new pathways and finding items to fix up broken structures and machines. All on the back of the charity of others gained by selling lemonade to the locals!

name: Figureless
summary: Where it ends.

name: Fire in the Frost
summary: Take on the role of fire bearer and escort the only remnants of warmth deep into the wilderness to restore life to the frozen wasteland. With the power of the flames you can power up your snow mobile to dash and weave through the thickets and discover the secrets within the woods.

name: Finally a Florist
summary: Finally a Florist is a cozy, slice-of-life game where you gather flowers to arrange beautiful bouquets. Explore peaceful landscapes, befriend animals, and fill heartfelt requests from the local villagers as you finally become a florist.

name: Fire Emblem: Awakening - Apotheosis
summary: Apotheosis is a downloadable content xenologue chapter in Fire Emblem Awakening. Apotheosis is the twenty-fifth and final xenologue providing enemies with the highest stats in the game.

name: Fish and Chill
summary: A cozy idle fishing game where your fisherman catches fish automatically while you relax. Sell your catch, upgrade your boat, and enjoy the calming sea in a transparent, borderless overlay that floats on any desktop.

name: Fillit the Abstract Strategy
summary: You win when you place all the chips of your color

name: FishOnMC
summary: A dedicated fishing server for Minecraft.

name: Five Nights at Roner's 3
summary: Five days to decide how a town-wide scandal plays out. Five nights to fend off the perilous ghosts and decide your own fate. Roner and his friends are back again - and this time, they're going all out.

name: Final Fantasy VII
summary: Imagine a world where Square's greatest RPG saga remained loyal to Nintendo. Final Fantasy VII was originally planned for Nintendo's 64-bit console, the N64, but that version never saw the light of day.

name: Finding Annie
summary: A Open-World based Horror game in a deserted world where a small girl named Annie is missing, you need to find her and be careful not to trigger teleportation that moves her elsewhere, and have to search for her again in location you had left. it is a FPS game that has scary figures and monsters.

name: Fish Season
summary: A small casual fishing game where every round is bite-sized, and the competition is fierce for every fish. On the dock, you can use the fish you've collected to buy upgrades and repair your damaged vessel. And in desperate times, you can even fire your fish at your rivals. Good luck !

name: Fiend Exile
summary: Will you get exiled?

name: Final Fantasy XIV: The Promise of Tomorrow
summary: The Patch 7.3 series update includes: New Main Scenario Quests, a new Dungeon, a new 24-man Raid, a new Trial, a new Deep Dungeon, New Allied Society Quests, and PvP Updates

name: Fixer Undercover
summary: Welcome to DIY Espionage - a VR puzzle adventure where everyday tools and found objects become your problem-solving kit. Go undercover as a repair worker inside a prison, investigate a mysterious rehabilitation program through various challenges, and make your escape with the truth.

name: Final Notice
summary: A single-player deckbuilder/collectible card game where you sacrifice your soul to play cards. Build decks, manipulate status effects, and defeat gods bound by ancient contracts.

name: Fishtank: Reality TV Simulator
summary: It's time to run the show! Give yourself the opportunity to direct the internet reality experience, Fishtank.live, and enjoy the chaos that comes with it!

name: Finnish Forest
summary: Finnish Forest is a calm and relaxing game where you collect berries, mushrooms, and more. Enjoy the Finnish nature and do whatever you want.

name: Final Stand
summary: This is a top-down shooting game. You will fight alone or form a team to break through the apocalypse of monsters. By combining random weapons, talents and relics, you can create a unique fighting style and experience the thrill of counterattack from struggling to survive to mowing down enemies!

name: Fido
summary: Fido needs regular nourishment to keep up strength. Strength is used to wag the tail and the tail is used to stop the moles from digging holes. Simply bash the moles on the head with the tail when sitting down.

name: Fighting Fantasy Classics: The Port of Peril
Fish Face
summary: Search for a new face in a unnervingly peaceful fishing experience.

name: Five Nights in the Pizzeria: New Brand
summary: Fan-Game of Five Nights at Freddy's by Scott Cawthon.

name: Fireside Fables
summary:
Fireside Fables is a narrative driven 3D platformer, which follows a group of children telling stories around a campfire. These stories then come to life, and you play through them as your favourite plushie!

You will be transported across worlds! From a pirate island, to a lush forest, even to outer space - Anywhere that the children's imaginations can take you!

name: First Class Solitaire HD
summary: Travel in style with First Class Solitaire HD. Sort all the cards into the foundation piles and keep an eye out for bonus cards to multiply your points.

name: Fish Time
summary: Fishing Time | FishTime — Your Ultimate Desktop Procrastination Companion Controls ✔ Hold Right-click — Reposition window freely

name: First Contact Protocol
summary: An adventure-puzzle game with branching choices, cinematic cutscenes, and a crew fighting to survive aboard a damaged starship.

name: Final Furlong 2
summary:
Final Furlong 2 is a horseracing arcade game which was released by Namco in 1998; it runs on their System 23 hardware, and as the name suggests, it is the sequel to Final Furlong, which was released in the previous year.
Players sit in a "saddle" and must rock the cabinet's horses back and forth, to urge their horses forward, pressing the "Whip" button to speed them up and pulling on "reins" to keep the horse from colliding with the fences or other horses.

name: Fiction Paradox
summary: Year 2045. Everything is moving too fast, and it’s becoming increasingly difficult to imagine the future. In a modern city built in record time thanks to technological progress, millions of people from different nations live isolated from the great global conflicts. Feeling trapped in a world that never made sense, you decide to embark on a journey to find the purpose of your existence.

name: Fishing Tycoon Simulator
summary: Build your fishing empire from scratch. Start with a humble boat, expand your fleet, optimize logistics, manage a team, and dominate the seafood industry in this deep business simulator. Every decision matters - expand, strategize, and outsmart the competition to become the ultimate fishing tycoon.

name: Finn and Jake's Epic Quest
summary: Team up as Finn and Jake in a 3D adventure of epic proportions! The Land of Ooo has been transformed into a giant video game, and BMO has been kidnapped. Brawl your way through the Witch's garden, Ice Kingdom, Fire Kingdom, and even the Land of the Dead itself to rescue BMO and uncover the evil mastermind!

name: Finding Dragons
summary: Find cute dragons hidden in a fully hand-drawn interactive scene.

name: Fire Me, I Insist
summary: Workplace efficiency is at an all time low at Bog-Standard Solutions. You've been hired to sniff out inefficiencies and get rid of the rabble. Trouble is, everyone's up to something. Collect evidence, listen to gossip and tattle on your colleagues.

name: Firefly Haven
summary: Firefly Haven is an incremental, short cozy game about catching bugs, collecting trophies, traveling to new locations and achieving greatness!

name: Fit And Fry: Organized Chef
summary: Cook with logic, fry with flair!

name: Find Meow in Wild West
summary: A hidden object game where you explore a hand-drawn Wild West to find 100 charming cats, each one carefully hidden and full of personality.

name: Find the Text!
summary: Spot the odd one out among a sea of characters! A brain-training puzzle game that sharpens both your eyes and your mind

name: Fishing Friends 3D
summary: Bait your hooks and go fishing with friends. Customise your fishing rods for optimal performance to catch giant and legendary fish. Chat in-game with fellow anglers and win competitions and tournaments together. Tight lines!

name: Firefly
summary: This is a relaxing and casual simulation game. Use tools such as countdown and focus alarm to improve your focus efficiency. Talk and interact with your partners to improve their favorability. The game scenes include classrooms, future cities, train compartments and ordinary houses.

name: Find Sort Match
summary: Develop your mental skills and have fun.

name: Fish Tales and Cozy Trails
summary: Embark on a tranquil journey in this cozy fishing game, you're free to explore a vibrant world brimming with secrets. Discover hidden coves, find unique rods, and venture into the charming world as you seek out new fishing grounds.

name: Fighting Rogue
summary: As a sect champion, fight for forbidden scrolls in the Martial Arts Tournament. Master signature techniques, synergize martial manuals, and wield divine weapons to craft your unique style. Overcome relentless rivals in evolving battles—achieve legendary glory in one decisive clash!

name: Find
summary:
This is a puzzle game in which the player rolls the cube-shaped hero to find the hidden goal.
When the cube hits the player's line of sight, the goal or gimmick materializes and the stage changes. Control your line of sight and position by rolling the cube, and immerse yourself in the thrill of inspiration and discovery as you find the hidden goal.

name: Fitness Adventure Pro
summary: Explore, train, and win: six fitness modes, four islands, one great result!

name: Final Fantasy Tactics: The Ivalice Chronicles - Deluxe Edition
Fish Tales
summary: A clone of the Intellivision game Shark! Shark!. You play as a clownfish that starts off eating smaller fish to gradually grow in size, allowing you to eat bigger fish. The music in the game is a version of a song from the Rayman games.

name: Five Nights at Sonic's World
summary:
Welcome to FNAS World, the small RPG where you take control of Sonic and his friends
as they has to venture forth and stop Golden Sonic and other sinister enemies.

name: Five Nights at Stickman
summary: Survive five terrifying nights at Stickman's Bistro! Monitor cameras, conserve power, and outwit restless stick-figures in this classic-style point-and-click horror game. Includes 5 nights, a 6th night, Custom Night, and 3 unique endings!

name: Fishplay
summary: Create and decorate your dream aquarium with real-life fish and hundreds of items in this relaxing game.

name: Five Nights at the Chum Bucket
summary: Five Nights at the Chum Bucket is the official sequel to Five Nights at the Krusty Krab. It was released on May 9th, 2015.

name: Find El Chupacabra
summary: Variant of Hide and Seek included in Lexibook's Disney Planes Portable Game Console.

name: Finding Chase
summary: Variant of Hide and Seek included in Lexibook's Disney Paw Patrol Portable Game Console.

name: Fizz Flow: Factory Management
summary: Fizz Flow is a strategy and management game that takes place in a setting without competition regulations. In old America, where the beverage industry is on the rise, build your own factory, make your own unique recipes, weaken your opponents and maintain your hard earned success at the market!

name: Fighters' Impact A
summary: Fighters' Impact A is a 1997 update of the Fighters' Impact game. This version tweaks the gameplay mechanics, removing the unique combo system in favor of pre-determined combos.

name: Firefighting Rescue Simulator
summary: Answer every emergency call and show what a true firefighter can do.

name: Final Frontier Story
summary:
Build your very own warm and friendly intergalactic city in the cold vacuum of space!
Expect close encounters of the third, fourth, and maybe even fifth kind!

Aim to become the most desirable city in the galaxy by developing land so you can build shops and bases for your residents to live in comfort.
Build Convenience Stores and Parks to make daily life easier, or Takoyaki Stalls and Cinemas to bring in tourists and keep people.

name: Fish Farm 3
summary:
Fish Farm 3 is one of the entries in the popular Fish Farm series — buy, breed, cross-breed, sell, and enjoy plenty of freshwater and saltwater fish, including seahorses, whales, dolphins, sharks, starfish, and jellyfish.

Reach higher levels to access more fish, decoration, and aquarium inventory. Breeding and selling your fish wisely earns coins to further advance and refine your aquariums.

Don't forget to feed your fish and to change the water, either by hand or by automation.

Do you want to try out different lights or enjoy the fluorescent inhabitants by switching off the light? Just do it!

name: Final Fantasy VI: Brave New World Final Frontier
Five Nights at Pikachu's
summary:
Old-School themed FNAF Fan game featuring Generation 5 Pokemons!
In an alternative universe someone takes the job in the old Teselia's Pokeball Factory...
What happened on this factory?
What happened to the people that worked in there?
There is only one way to find out...

name: Find Meow in Dwarf Mines
summary: Find Meow in Dwarf Mines is a cozy hidden object game where you explore hand-drawn Dwarf Mines to find 100 charming cats, each one carefully hidden and full of personality. Funds raised from selling this game will be spent on saving lifes of our little friends.

name: Find All Things: Christmas
summary: Christmas is coming! That means it’s time to dive into the holiday spirit with the new game Find All Things: Christmas. This time, you’ll explore a variety of themed locations filled with Christmas magic and an even wider selection of mini-games.

name: Fissure
summary: Solve a missing person case while you explore the damaged relationships between characters. The story reveals hidden truths through dialogue choices and exploration. Expose lies, conflicting memories and shifting loyalties where the greatest mystery is the people you thought you knew.

name: Final Signature
summary: Final Signature is a psychological horror game set in an abandoned hotel. Players must find hidden clues and compete with other participants for the grand prize. As tension rises in the dark corridors, they will face new dangers with every step.

name: Fill Fill
summary: A minimalist and relaxing puzzle game

name: Five Nights at Leon's
summary: Five Nights at Leon’s is a fan-made survival horror game inspired by Five Nights at Freddy’s. It was created by Omar (known online as OA3Games) at the age of 13 and officially released on Game Jolt on March 20, 2017.

name: Five Nights at Leon's: Remastered
summary: Five Nights at Leon's: REMASTERED is made up from the ground, meaning nothing you saw on the past will return on this game. You can experience a completely new experience from the original game.

name: Find My Frogs: Branches
summary: Find My Frogs: Branches is a cozy hidden object game where you search for frogs and toads in a hand-drawn village nestled high in the branches of an ancient tree. Explore charming corners, discover tiny secrets, and help Uncle Froger find his missing hat.

name: Fishing Rush
summary: Fishing Rush – Dive into the ultimate fishing adventure!

name: Fitly
summary: This is a casual jigsaw puzzle game. All you need to do is use the mouse to drag the pieces to the correct positions, and when you complete the puzzle and form a complete picture, you can unlock the picture gallery.

name: First-Person Data Explorer
summary: In First-Person Data Explorer, datasets become immersive 3D environments where numbers shape color, size, movement, and more. Load, generate, or edit your data during gameplay, and turn raw values into something you can see, experience - and explore.

name: Fiora
summary: Fiora is a roguelike game in which you will see randomly generated maps, you need to fight shadows, and along the way collect firewood to maintain the flame of Fiora, without which you will not be able to use magic.

name: Find the Cats: Japan Journey
summary: Spot the sneaky cats hidden across beautiful Japan! Relax, explore, and test your sharp eyes. Can you find them all?

name: Fishing Time
summary: Fishing Time Is a chill fishing game where you collect rare fish. Every 2 hours, you can catch a fish, which is added to your Steam inventory. There are +140 different fish and 6 different rarity levels! Relax, cast your line, and complete your collection!

name: Final Fantasy Legend II DX
summary: A full colorization of Final Fantasy Legend II for Game Boy Color version with several bugs in the original game fixed.

name: Fire & Light
summary: Fire & Light is a indie open-world survivor game where exploration is just as important as combat, and where heroes can evolve their class mid-game.

name: Fish Collector: Aquarium Story
summary: Run your own aquarium and evolve fish into mermaids! Fish Collector is a relaxing aquarium tycoon game that blends fish farming, idle resource production, match-3, and merge gameplay to build your fantasy ocean world.

name: Finding Ivy
summary: Finding Ivy is a cute casual 2D platformer where 1-4 players make their way through a kid-drawn world to win back their runaway cat. Run, jump, climb, and discover items and friends that help you along the way!

name: Find Me
summary: Find Me is a psychological horror focused on sound, atmosphere, and emotion. You search for meaning in the whispering trees and a story hidden in the dark. I'm looking for her. I'm looking for answers. And she's calling. This is a short mini-game designed to be an intense 30-60 minute experience.

name: First Survivors
summary: First Survivors is a heart-pounding, action-fueled first-person roguelike survivorslike that throws you into the chaos of a zombie apocalypse

name: Fishing Relax
summary: ️ A tropical fantasy fishing RPG.  Reel in rare fish and story-rich treasures from different universes.  Help a dragon whelp to transform into a fully grown dragon.  And compare your collection with your friends!

name: Five Stars
summary: You're on the run. The city is on lockdown. They won't stop until you're dead. Five Stars is a fast-paced PvE shooter set in a procedurally generated, fully destructible city. There's no end — just waves of escalating force. The more you kill, the harder they hit.

name: Fishing Planet: Chamaeleon Cruiser Pack
summary:
Set off on a 60-day voyage through the rich waters of Noomaa Kuda Atholhu, Maldives!
Jump aboard the luxurious Chamaeleon Yacht with two heavy-duty trolling setups, a generous supply of lures and baits, and a spacious Tackle Wagon accommodating over 300 items.

name: Fishing Planet: Atoll Scout Pack
summary:
Take on a 30-day exploration of Noomaa Kuda Atholhu, Maldives, with the Atoll Scout Pack.
You'll be fully equipped with an ultra-powerful bottom spin setup, an extra-long spinning set, and all kinds of baits and lures specially designed to chase exotic ocean species.

name: Fishing Planet: Golden Angler Pack
summary: Join the Golden Angler Club and INSTANTLY go to the Big League with all the possible perks and privileges the gaming experience can offer!

name: Fishing Planet: Green Fortune Event Pack
summary: We have prepared an incredible Green Fortune Event Pack specially for all St. Patrick's Day fans! This pack includes some great spinning and casting tackle and even the Gold Horseshoe Stringer, which you will need to catch the cunning Snakeheads!

name: Fishing Planet: Dnipro Delta Pack
summary: Gear up for a 30-day adventure on the legendary Dnipro River with the Dnipro Delta Pack! This mighty river flows through the heart of Ukraine, home to Fishing Planet's developers.

name: Fishing Planet: Daredevil Boat Pack
summary: Enjoy a complete on-the-water angling experience with the Daredevil Boat Pack to make your fishing adventures more thrilling than ever before.

name: Fishing Planet: Carp Pro Pack
summary: Behold the Carp Pro Pack — an ultimate must-have tackle set that every carp angler could only dream about!

name: Fishing Planet: Bottom Pack
summary: Bottom Pack is a complete all-you-need bottom tackle set with FOUR awesome rod'n'reel combos, a complete selection of all the terminal tackle, feeder baits, chum, attractants, and other bottom fishing equipment!

name: Fishing Planet: Supernatural Explorer Pack
summary: Be fully armed with three skillfully crafted powerful tackle sets to battle supernatural creatures. Don't waste time - explore the Chronicles of the Haunted Fleet and save the world from the forces of darkness!

name: Fishing Planet: Sailor Collection Pack
summary: Joining a yacht crew, a skilled angler-sailor requires premium quality fishing gear, functional clothing, and ample storage. The Sailor Collection Pack has you covered!

name: Fishing Planet: Advanced Pack
summary: The Advanced FP Pack features FOUR powerful Advanced Edition rod and reel combos, along with awesome Advanced Edition fishing apparel - an all round basic set of superb equipment to cover all your progressive fishing needs!

name: Fishing Planet: Sport Bottom Pack
summary: This complete set of sports edition bottom tackle includes an awesome combo of the Heavy Chaser Sport bottom fishing rod and the Ambusher Sport spinning reel, a full selection of all the leaders, sinkers, hooks and baits you might need, not to mention a Keepnet.

name: Fishing Planet: Amazon Carnival Pack
summary: Amazon Carnival Pack - a set that has the best gear for fishing in this part of the tropics: new jigging spoons, duo swimbaits, as well as a powerful casting rod and a durable reel. In addition, the swift twin-engined Bass Boat Sagitta!

name: Fishing Planet: Bream Feeder Frenzy Pack
summary: Are you ready for your feeder tournament on Fishing Planet? This limited edition tackle pack includes all tournament-themed collectible tackle items with the true champion's performance potential!

name: Fishing Planet: Kayaks Adventure Pack
summary: Kayaks Adventure Pack is a full set of three awesome angling companions - each with its own unique characteristics! Kayaks Adventure Pack also includes cool stuff like Credits, BaitCoins, 7 days of Premium Account and Advanced Licenses.

name: Fishing Planet: Ultimate Sport Bundle
summary: All rods, reels, storage slots, tackle setup slots, terminal tackle and equipment from 9 of Fishing Planet's most efficient pro tackle Sport Packs. Special outfit from the Sport Outfit Pack.

name: Fishing Planet: Sport Topwater Night Pack
summary: Sport Topwater Night Pack is the ultimately compact, perfectly matched and ideally balanced set of the most vital topwater and night fishing tackle you might need to demonstrate your angling techniques and get a true outburst of raw emotions!

name: Fishing Planet: Tropic Hunter Pack
summary: The star of this set is the light and durable metal motor boat Lyra with a powerful engine and an innovative echo sounder Uniq, which can work without interference even at high speed!

name: Fishing Planet Boat Series Pack
summary: Just for the Fishing Planet Boat Series Tournament we are launching a limited set of practical and stylish fiery tackle - a truly powerful casting rod, sturdy reels fit to drag actual monsters out of the deep, and a premier offering of other tackle necessary for your victory.

name: Fishing Planet: Krampus Catcher Pack
summary: The right combination of rods and reels will help you to return the things stolen by the elderly villains back to Santa! The kit contains an excellent assortment of festive season feeders, delicious baits for sweet-toothed fish, a keepnet and, naturally, a celebratory firework!

name: Fishing Planet: Feeder Dream Pack
summary: Feeder Dream Pack is every feeder angler's must-have tackle set for an incredibly immersive feeder fishing experience! You get THREE powerful rod'n'reel combos, a full selection of all the terminal tackle, feeder baits, chum, attractants and other equipment!

name: Fishing Planet: BassBoat Explorer Pack
summary:
Tune into exploration mode right NOW with the new Bassboat Explorer Pack! This amazing all-you-need power pack includes:
* 40 000 CREDITS
* 20 BAITCOINS
* 30 DAYS OF PREMIUM ACCOUNT
* 25 Marker Buoys
* 25 Storage Slots
* 1 Tackle Setups

name: Fishing Planet Anniversary Pack

summary: The best goodie in this gift box is a collectible Christmas kayak, decorated to look like a real Santa's Sleigh! You also get a full set of different holiday fireworks, a weekly pond pass to White Moose Lake and an Advanced Fishing License for the province of Alberta!

summary: This bundle contains everything you need for a bottom fishing tournament: heavy-duty fishing rods with matching powerful reels and a set of necessary tackles and suitable baits. The victory is almost yours! Get the World Cats Cup Pack and go on a trip around the world!

summary: In order to make sure that you can deal with the Congo river dwellers, we've prepared all the necessary gear in Congo Discovery Pack!

summary: Sport Float Pack is an awesome set of all the sportfishing goodies and tackle you might need if you plan to kick some ass in a float fishing competition! Perfectly matched and balanced for catching underwater monsters like Catfish, Pike or Trout!

summary:
Get ready for hunting saltwater monsters in a thrilling adventure on Blue Crab Island with the all-new Saltwater Match Pack!
So get the amazing Saltwater Match Pack to enjoy your saltwater angling explorations right now!

summary: This set contains everything you need for both match and bottom fishing: heavy-duty rods with equally powerful reels, the necessary set of tackle, and suitable live fish baits. Get the Live Bait Fiesta Pack and enjoy the tournament!

summary: With Christmas Giant's Pack you're getting not just any fishing tackle, but all the titanic potential for landing those Trophies and Uniques in your epic battle for the title of Christmas Giant Champion!

summary: Sport Feeder Pack is a powerful set of all the sports edition tackle every angler needs for the ultimate feeder fishing experience! You get the awesome combo of the feeder rod and reel, a complete selection of all terminal tackle, feeder baits, chum, attractants and a Keepnet.
