summary: Sport Carp Pack is a set of awesome Sports Edition fishing goodies that will have you armed to catch Carp like a pro! You get stuff for a truly immersive carp-fishing experience on a sports level, which is indeed a fun challenge!

name: Fishing Planet: Sport Casting Bass Pack
summary: Sport Casting Bass Pack is just what you need to come out as a winner in any tournament or competition that involves catching some mighty Bass! We put a lot of thought into assembling this Sport Casting Bass Pack, so that you wouldn't have to!

name: Final Fantasy Legend III DX
summary: A full colorization of Final Fantasy Legend III for Game Boy Color.

name: Fire Emblem: Fortune's Weave
summary: The newest entry in the Fire Emblem series is set to enter the arena.

name: First Steps in Learning About Pregnancy
summary: Play as a pregnant woman experiencing daily life from early pregnancy to childbirth prep. Learn about local medical and support systems through interactive choices. Features 1-hour playtime and save/load. Great for those interested in healthcare, education, or social welfare

name: Find the Demon
summary: Among them, one is a demon.

name: FickleFlame
summary: We invite you to experience our immersive, story-driven Platformer about a candle trying to save it's candle world.

name: Fisher Man
summary: FISHER MAN is a relaxing fishing simulation game. Explore a peaceful world, catch unique fish, and complete quests to unlock new content. Build your collection and enjoy the calm rhythm of fishing at your own pace.

name: Find Petey
summary: Find Petey is a hidden object game in which a total of 180 little bats are hidden across 4 unique levels. Embark on the search and find Petey on the farm, at the camp, on the sunny beach, and in the city. But beware: the search gets more challenging with each level!

name: Finnish Inheritance
summary: A nightly visit to your grandparents’ house turns into a chilling investigation – is there a ghost, or something far worse?

name: Fisht Fight
summary: In Fisht Fight, you PUNCH FISH in a global Fishing and Fighting competition for the highest, sickest air combos! With easy-to-learn, difficult-to-master VR combat and many unique fish to fight, there's a whole ocean of depth to explore!

name: Fire Emblem: A Star Wars Story
Final War
summary: Strategy Tower Defense, RTS Battles on the World Map

name: Fight With Valkyries
summary: As a Spartan champion, fight alongside Valkyries against hell's invasion. Crush demonic legions, then dominate the defiant devil girls . Steel meets sorcery in this brutal clash of gods and monsters."

name: Finger Trees
summary: Travel to different worlds to save every version of your family from the sickness created by Finger Trees.

name: Final Formation
summary: Equipped with the Fusion × Transformation “PELL” System! Free Map Side-Scrolling Shooter

name: Final Outcry
summary: Final Outcry is a first-person horror game that centers on classified government found footage of an urban exploration trip gone wrong. As you venture further into an abandoned prison, do you have what it takes to face the horrors lurking within and reach the end of the V/H/S tape?

name: Fire Emblem Shadows
summary:
The gameplay of Fire Emblem Shadows combines real-time strategy and social deduction.

One of the three allies participating in each battle is secretly a treacherous disciple of shadow. Players choose to take on the role of either a disciple of light, aiming to find their way through the labyrinth, or a disciple of shadow.

After the initial battle, players vote to determine who they believe is the treacherous disciple of shadow. The outcome of the vote affects whether the next battle is more favorable or more challenging. Whether the disciples of light can correctly discover the traitor—or the disciple of shadow can successfully deceive the others—holds the key to how the next battle unfolds.

name: Findgold
summary: Although it's just a simple game of catching gold, it requires cultivating your patience early on.

name: Fights in Tight Spaces: K9 Division
summary: A new canine face joins Section XI, just in time to go into action against some of the worst the criminal underworld has to offer. This expansion adds a versatile and highly agile canine companion, as well as new enemies, enhancements, and events.

name: Fishman
summary: Fishman is a relaxing fishing game that supports multiple people online. Colorful lantern fish, silly turtles, graceful mermaids and dancing devils call you in the deep ocean. After adding friends in the game, friends can send each other gifts of gold coins to enhance their feelings.

name: Final Passage
summary: Final Passage is a first-person psychological horror game set in a storm-wrecked coastal village. Navigate flooded ruins, manipulate physics-based debris, and survive attacks from the drowned dead as you make your way towards the last lighthouse.

name: Fire Road
summary: Fire Road is a dynamic Tower Defense strategy game with a bird's eye view. Your task is to prevent enemy vehicles from breaking through the key road.

name: Five Hearts Under One Roof 2
summary: Boarding house owner Yuman is back! Alongside Mal-sook, Gran, and Min-jung, a wealthy heiress, a girl burdened by childhood scars, and a sweet nurse move in. In this house of old memories and new emotions, who will you fall in love with?

name: Finding Your Way
summary: Rediscover a familiar world by splashing it with color and find your way through the darkness in this first-person exploration game. Traverse 30+ surreal locations, solve intriguing puzzles, and face your demons. Uncover fragments of your story through a meditative journey between light and shadow.

name: First Moon of Mercury
summary: Solve and construct sci-fi puzzle boxes into the First Moon of Mercury, a space station designed to study and deflect dangerous solar flares. Will you trust the right crew members to ensure the safety of humanity or will the saboteurs succeed?

name: Fire Embrace 2
summary: Fire Embrace II is a single player, 1990s style game. The pixel art and retro BGM makes you nostalgic. Finally your goal is to reach a map where has the demon castle. Explore lots of maps and progress the story, and then defeat the demon king.

name: FIFA Heroes
summary: FIFA Heroes is coming in 2026 — a brand-new football experience where legends, icons, and rising stars collide in 5v5 action.

name: Find My Love
summary: Find lovely couples in this memory game with romantic vibes.

name: Fire
summary: Use teamwork, tactics, and technology to battle apocalyptic wildfires on a near-future Earth. FIRE is a tactical action, crisis co-op where cutting-edge firefighting technology meets Indigenous mythology in an infinitely replayable fight to save our burning world.

name: Finding Chuchu
summary: Ari’s side-scrolling shooting adventure to find the cat ChuChu! Use over 20 spells with simple controls for strategic gameplay. Create and share maps with the Map Maker, or conquer maps made by other players!

name: Fisher-Diver
summary: Fisher-Diver is a minimalist hunting game, with abstract imagery and a small story that explores the psychology of both careers and hunting itself.

name: Five S'hIft Masters
summary: A fast paced adventuring game featuring challenging combat and satisfying combos.Master knockback attacks to juggle and outmaneuver your enemies in dynamic battles.

name: Find the Difference: Spot it
summary: Sharpen your eyes. Spot every difference. Prove your skills!

name: Fit and Fry: Mise En Place
summary: Fit and Fry: Mise en Place is a casual puzzle game set in a restaurant, where every challenge takes place inside a frying pan. The goal is to perfectly organize the ingredients on the board, fulfilling customer orders and progressing through 40 levels that mix strategy and fun.

name: Fire at Campsite
summary: Protect the campsite in this Single-Tower-Defense game where you play as a campfire against the local wildlife! With many abilities and characters at your disposal, try new builds, synergies, and combos to make those animals run away with fear!

name: Filtration
summary: Jump, bounce, blast, and fly through 12 pocket dimensions in order to harvest the precious power sources within. With robotic foes and tricky puzzles in your way, it's gonna take a lot more than Ion Cells to get through this!

name: Firefighting Simulator: Ignite - Rosenbauer HEROS Titan DLC
summary: The Rosenbauer HEROS Titan DLC includes the high-performance firefighting helmet HEROS Titan, designed and manufactured by Rosenbauer.

name: Firefighting Simulator: Ignite - Fire Station Companion Pack
summary:
The Fire Station Companion Pack includes a firehouse dog as well as a special vintage helmet. Although Dalmatians are no longer needed by firefighters, they are “pawsibly” still the best companions for modern firefighting. Preserve the tradition and welcome Simi, the firehouse dog who always eagerly awaits your return to the station. And when the alarm sounds, gear up in style with the special 1950s retro helmet, made of aluminum from a bygone era for a distinct look.

The Fire Station Companion Pack includes

Fire Station dog Simi
1950s vintage helmet

name: Firefighting Simulator: Ignite - Summer Camp DLC
summary:
Oh, sweet summer! It's a perfect time for exploration and adventure at Woodchuck summer camp, near our beloved Oakridge City. Since 1921, the camp has been welcoming children and teenagers from the area, and is among some of their fondest memories. Unfortunately, there are reports of a fire at Camp Woodchuck, and the Oakridge City FD is on high alert. Come join the crew in the Summer Camp DLC and save a city landmark and beloved institution of the greater Oakridge area.

The Summer Camp DLC includes:

A new environment
2x new missions

name: Firefighting Simulator: Ignite - Season Pass Year 1
summary:
Build your firefighting experience with the Year 1 Season Pass for Firefighting Simulator: Ignite! The additional content is planned to launch in 2025 and 2026.

The Year 1 Season Pass includes:
Firefighting Simulator: Ignite - Rosenbauer HEROS Titan DLC
Firefighting Simulator: Ignite - Summer Camp DLC
Firefighting Simulator: Ignite - Story Mission DLC
Firefighting Simulator: Ignite - Cosmetic Pack
Firefighting Simulator: Ignite - Skin Pack
Firefighting Simulator: Ignite - Vehicle Pack
Firefighting Simulator: Ignite - Expansion Pack
Firefighting Simulator: Ignite - Mission Pack

name: File Tricks
summary: "File Tricks" is a visual novel with puzzle solve. It is not only a test of logical thinking and observation, but also a reasoning feast full of suspense and reversal. You need to investigate the crime scene, collect evidence, confront the people involved and finally solve the case.

name: Fields of Mine
summary: Fields of Mine is a roguelike puzzle where classic Minesweeper turns into an unpredictable adventure. Each level changes the rules, challenging your logic, focus, and adaptability.

name: Fishing Mega-Game
summary: Fishing Mega-Game takes the joy of a fishing mini-game and crafts it into a larger creature collecting experience. Roam the land for new fishing spots and deploy your favorite fish in search for new playable fish!

name: Fire Emblem 7 Legacy
summary: Fire Emblem 7 Legacy is a rom hack made by TheSmithPlays based on Fire Emblem: The Blazing Blade (originally Fire Emblem in the West). The Legacy games attempt to bring each game to it’s fullest potential while retaining the identity of the original.

name: Fishing Tales: Neko's Journey
summary: A relaxing idle fishing game focused on companionship, featuring 26 fishing spots and over 200 fish species. Easy to enjoy without much effort. You can place the game anywhere on your screen while studying or working, without it intruding on your tasks.

name: Fidget Widget
summary: Fidget Widget is a collection of mini games that chill on your desktop, ready to play anytime you’ve got a few minutes to spare.

name: Fishing Corner
summary: A cozy idle fishing game that lives at the bottom of your screen. Catch hundreds of fish, discover charming locations, and unravel their secrets while you work or relax. Your joyful fishing escape is just a click away.

name: Fish3: First Catch
summary: FISH³: FIRST CATCH is a high-octane, surreal speed-fishing adventure where your boat is powered by fish! Engage in time-attack stages, dual-rod fishing, and underwater spear-fishing in a dreamlike world teeming with bizarre aquatic creatures.

name: Five Nights with Tung Tung Sahur
summary: Escape the house. Escape Evil Tung Tung Sahur.

name: Fishbait
summary: Fishbait is a chaotic card game where you play as fish that needs to avoid getting caught by the fisherman. It has online multiplayer and can be played with up to 4 people in a round. With its Russian roulette–style mechanics, only the last fish alive wins.

name: FishingCard
summary: A pixel-art roguelike fusing fishing and deck-building. Build a powerful pond and earn gold through a 'buy, catch, sell' cycle. You must balance card strategy and economics to pay rising rent and survive this unique adventure.

name: Find It, Detective!
summary: Find the hidden mysteries in cute illustrations!

name: Field of Enemies
summary: "Field of Enemies" is a casual top-down action roguelike! Survive endless waves of monsters, upgrade super abilities and fight for a place on the leaderboard. Crazy co-op for up to 4 players, unique "voice" sound effects and dynamic gameplay. Your path to a record starts here!

name: Figures of Shadows
summary: A text-based horror game focused on atmosphere and user choices, it's highly story-based and builds atmosphere by allowing a player to make choices that determine whether they make it out alive or not.

name: Fire Entrance
summary: You're a team of rescue robots in a world on fire!! Your tools: A high-pressure water hose and a trusty fire axe. Your mission: Don't be the reason your team fails!

name: Fishing for Numbers
summary: Fishing for Numbers is a vibrant first-person educational adventure where you step into the shoes of an aspiring Mathemagician on a quest to join the prestigious Arcane Anglers Guild. Master increasingly harder equations and catch magical fish to prove your worth and earn your place among the elite!

name: Find Your Way Home: Last Flight
summary: Build your colony in the zombie apocalypse, gather resources, and defend against raids. Send your team to loot houses for supplies, advance through research, struggle to survive, and try to build your plane to return home.

name: Find All: Halloween
summary: “Trick or treat? ” Test your bravery by exploring a spooky mansion inhabited by ghosts, finding different items, and coloring a black and white picture with colorful inks.

name: Fitforce2
summary: Blast calories in a sci-fi arcade of over 1,000 stages! Play action, puzzle, and reflex-based mini-games powered by your real-life moves. Master 12 workout exercises, track your progress, and turn fitness into an arcade experience— just with your smartphone camera.

name: Five Mysterious Murders
summary: Five teenagers went to a small Louisiana town to make a movie about a famous serial killer. What could go wrong?

name: Fireball
summary: "FIREBALL" is a physics-based platformer where you can experience the satisfaction of mastering strategies and improving your skills.

name: Find Your Friends
summary: Master the art of deception to outwit friends & foes in this social deduction party game for 2-8 players that blends stealth, strategy, and deceit. Play online or locally through a variety of mini-games while using cunning and misdirection to locate your friends while staying hidden.

name: Fishing Planet: Saint Patrick's Pack
summary: Saint Patrick's Pack is our exclusive edition of tackle for heavy float fishing that was specially created to celebrate St.Patrick's Day! With Saint Patrick's Pack the luck of the Irish will always come your way!

name: Fishing Planet: Sport Ultralight Panfish Pack
summary: Sport Ultralight Panfish Pack is a unique set of premium ultralight sportfishing tackle that was meticulously pieced together to maximize your chances of winning in any ultralight fishing competition!

name: Fishing Planet: Sport Outfit Pack
summary: Sports Outfit Pack is a set of stylish sporty outfits and accessories to accentuate your brand new Sports Edition fishing tackle!

The Tricky Treats Pack includes:
* 13 BAITCOINS use to purchase certain fishing tackle, available only for BaitCoins. Spend your BaitCoins wisely!
* 666 CREDITS use your Credits to purchase new tackle, pay for fishing trips, repairs and any other in-game expenses. Spend your money wisely!

BAITS AND LURES

summary: Now, all the best new rigs and terminal tackle you could ever want comes in one ultimately versatile set! Rigs Combo Pack is a delightful combination of all the best hooks, sinkers, spinners, jigs, rigs and other lures that you need for a deeply satisfying fishing experience!

name: Fishing Planet: Revolutionary Pack
summary: This 4th of July make sure to celebrate America's triumph of freedom by enjoying a day of fishing with Revolutionary Pack - an awesome tackle set featuring limited 4th of July Edition fishing tackle and equipment that are bound to raise your patriotic spirits on Independence Day!

name: Fishing Planet: Sport Spinning Trout Pack
summary: Sport Spinning Trout Pack is a true champion's choice when it comes to any tournament or competition that involves catching some mighty Trout! We put a lot of thought into assembling this Sport Spinning Trout Pack, so that you wouldn't have to!

name: Fishing Planet: Winter Pike Pack
summary: Winter Pike Pack contains a superb selection of premium grade rods, reels, lures and other tackle that'll make you feel certain of victory. Winter Pike Pack is an all-in-one tackle set that along with your champion skills is sure to get trophy Pike coming your way!

name: Fishing Planet: Christmas Magic Pack
summary: Christmas Magic Pack is a set of limited holiday-edition tackle: the exclusive SnowQueen and BadSanta casting and spinning reels, the Christmas-inspired MerryTree and the delicious CandyCane spinning rods, the Santa's helper IndigoRudolf and the SnowFlake casting rods!

name: Five More Minutes
summary: Build your deck and strategize to defeat foes as you traverse videogame worlds. Choose between 3 unique starting genres, and combine them to create unstoppable combos! Five more minutes is a love letter to growing up with the emotional support of our best friend: videogames.

name: Field of Screams
summary: Field of Screams is a first-person horror game where you respond to an assault at a haunted corn maze. Navigate the maze, hunt down suspects, and think before you shoot—hesitation could kill you, but firing too fast could cost innocent lives.

name: Fights in Tight Spaces: Frights in Tight Spaces
summary: A mysterious and lethal cult obsessed with summoning otherworldly beings and worshipping forgotten gods. They've taken up residence in a haunted manor house and kidnapped the Ambassador, there to sacrifice him and give living form to an unspeakable evil. There's no telling what horrors await.

name: Fishing at the Lake Full of Cats
summary: Fishing at the Lake Full of Cats is a puzzle solving, cat collecting, fishing game where you uncover the secrets of Silly Lake in a quest to fish up every last one of its pointy eared denizens.

name: Final Fantasy XIV: Into the Mist
summary: The Patch 7.4x series includes a number of new activities and updates for players to undertake, including new Main Scenario Quests, dungeon, trial, Arcadion raid series tier, Variant & Criterion Dungeon alongside additions to the Duty Support system, and updates to PvP, Gold Saucer, Occult Crescent, a new star for Cosmic Exploration and more.

name: Figure It Out: The Tantrum Simulator
summary: Beat the clock, tame her wrath, save the day.

name: Find It! World Heritage Adventure
summary: An exciting adventure around the world! Find the hidden World Heritage sites!

name: Fishing Planet: Metalhead Motorboat Pack
summary: Complete with the super durable flat-bottomed aluminum motorboat, the Metalhead Motorboat Pack also includes a wonderful combo of Special Edition rod'n'reel, minnows, jerkbaits, a few crankbaits and other fishing equipment that you'll need for a splendid day out on the river!

name: Fishing Planet: Club Enthusiast Pack
summary:
This bundle is only for passionate fishing enthusiasts who love the thrill. Do you want to create your own Club and compete with other anglers? Then you’ll need the Club Enthusiast Pack!

Club Enthusiast Pack includes:
* 50 000 credits
* 100 Baitcoins
* 3 000 Clubtokens

EQUIPMENT
* Garry Scott Club-Series TribalSkin Cap
* Club-Series SunSpirit Glasses

name: Fishing Planet: Hellfish Fighter Pack
summary: A set of tackle with magic runes prepared by the druids will help to catch the most cunning underwater demons.The secret of successful Halloween fishing lies in the special tackle! Show all ghosts and demons the true master of ancient magical knowledge and power!

name: Fishing Planet: Holiday Pack
summary: Holiday Pack features a collection of the Christmas edition baits and lures, along with the amazing Santa's Tackle Box backpack - right out of Santa's personal collection and available ONLY in this Holiday Pack!

name: Finding Cats
summary: Finding Cats is a purr-fect hidden object game! The world of Snow White has been taken over by cats. Sharpen your eyes to find all the cleverly hidden felines in beautifully reimagined classic scenes and discover endless furry surprises!

name: Fishy Business
summary: Become the captain of a fishing trawler in this atmospheric adventure game! Explore, fish, trade, talk (even to yourself), and enjoy classical music from vinyl records you can find throughout the world.

name: FILF
summary: Interact with a multitude of girls. Seduce them with your charm, save them from peril as you slowly create your harem around town.

name: Fish Rescue! Pull the Pin
summary:
Save the fish, solve the puzzle
Think fast, pull smart
One move, one rescue

name: First
summary: In First, you explore liminal spaces, solve puzzles and execute logical actions that open the path ahead. Discover where you are - while something watches your every move.

name: Five Nights at Flow's
summary: Welcome to your new summer job at the beloved (or hated) Flow Podcast!

name: Finding Father
summary: A hidden sound game: You find your father's MP3 player which leads you on a sound finding adventure.

name: FiresOut!
summary: FiresOut! is a chaotic couch co-op firefighting game for up to four players. You and your friends dive right into the burning neighborhood to extinguish fire, rescue trapped victims and overcome unpredictable environmental hazards all while dodging fiery projectiles from the fire monsters.

name: Fight Me
summary: Fight Me is a fast-paced PvP arena battler combined with a strategic fight-club management system.Collect unique fighters, upgrade their weapons, pets, perks and talents, and build the ultimate team.Compete in real-time PvP, conquer tournaments, complete PvE missions, defeat bosses and climb the global leaderboard to prove you're the top fight club manager.Each fighter is uniquely generated from modular parts — no two heroes are the same, creating endless progression and strategy depth. Seasonal events, rare fighters and competitive rewards make every battle meaningful.

name: Finger Punch
summary: Kaito never asked for glory. Training with his friends at the Phoenix Gym was all he needed, an oasis of strength and loyalty in the heart of Dawn City, a place consumed by chaos and greed.

name: Finest Fable
summary: Finest Fable is a comedic RPG where you're a drunk ex-Royal Guard hunting the Legendary Hero of Light after he steals your drink. Meet bizarre characters, fight ridiculous foes, and solve puzzles in a quest for petty revenge. The fate of the world may rest in his hands… but you don’t care, do you?

name: FIXKIN: A Long Way Home (at the End of the World)
summary: Set off on a journey home through a suddenly tech-free world. Use Leno’s rhythm-based FIXKIN skills to repair keepsakes for a colorful cast of characters, uncovering their stories along the way. A cozy narrative road trip about connection, healing, and the things worth mending.

name: Fill All
summary: Is an exciting puzzle game in which the player paints the corridors of the maze with their movements

name: Find Differences
summary: This is a casual game, improve your observation skills. Players must find four differences between the two similar pictures

name: Final Fantasy IV
summary:
FINAL FANTASY IV was the first title to introduce the Active Time Battle (ATB) system, which has become synonymous with the series. It also saw the introduction of the Augment system, which enabled the transfer of abilities from other characters and gave players an edge in battles.

The remaster of Final Fantasy IV (2007) features a new Hard mode, autosaves, rebalancing, a new UI, and higher resolution visuals

name: Fight For America
summary: Gear up, soldier - it’s time to reclaim freedom!

name: Fight For America: Fire Guns DLC
summary: Ignite the battlefield and watch your enemies burn!

name: Fight For America: Golden Gun DLC
summary: Go for gold with the ultimate all-around weapon!

name: Fight For America: Ice Guns DLC
summary: Freeze the battlefield and shatter your enemies!

name: Fight For America: Iron Patriot DLC
summary: Suit up and dominate the battlefield!

name: Fight For America: Zap Gun DLC
summary: Shock the battlefield with electrifying power!

name: Fire in the Dark
summary: Online duel isometric arena-shooter where the best witch wins! Use the power of fire and ice, navigate the shadows and hidings to defeat your opponent in a duel in the darkness. Use the light, hide in a bush, and show your friend who's the best witch in town!

name: Fingie Bandits
summary: Cowboys vs Bandits. In this social deduction game, 4-8 players must rely on deceit, duels and deduction in order to survive the brutal New Frontier. Err can I get a Yeehaww?

name: Find Your Words
summary: Find your community at summer camp, one friendship at a time. Take a beat, enjoy a breath of fresh air - all while playing at the beach, strolling in the woods, and dancing with friends. This short cozy game was created by two dads, celebrating their kids’ journeys to find their voices.

name: Firebird: Tale of the Stolen Light
summary: A fast-paced 2D action-adventure platformer set in a dark fairy tale world. Master creative traversal, uncover secrets, and reshape reality through light and shadow as you battle mythic guardians in handcrafted, atmospheric levels.

name: FireFly
summary: A momentum-driven 2D platforming adventure where mastering movement unlocks exploration. Leap, slide, and swing through vibrant open maps as a grounded firefly searching for family and hidden secrets.

name: Fire in the Hole
summary: Play as one of four animal company leaders looking to dominate the competition through an intense game of golf in this top-down twin-stick shooter for local play (2-4 players)!

name: Fission
summary: Play as a shape hero. Enter combat worlds found along the main world. You will need to get stronger in this unusual RPG to defeat the enemies, bosses and eventually the Round Lord.

name: Five Nights at Freddy's: Showtime
summary:
After years of silence, Freddy's finally reopens to the public and they need a new night guard.

Welcome to Freddy Fazbear's Showtime Pizzeria! A place for kids and grownups alike, where fantasy and fun come to life. When you're not getting food poisoned from our half-prepared pizza or losing an entire paycheck from the arcade games, you're probably watching our state-of-the-art animatronic band perform on stage. Although watching them during the day is a treat, you won't be watching them during the day...

During the night, the animatronics become a bit erratic (you could even say quirky) and we need someone to watch over them. Our shoestring budget can't afford them breaking anything (or themselves even), so your job is to reset them anytime you see them active. Just be sure they don't get into your office. Our last night guard didn't exactly quit after all...

name: Five Nights In Saransk
summary: You wake up in the middle of the night in your cozy one-room apartment and notice something wandering around your five-story panel building. Your only task is to prevent these strange creatures from getting inside.

name: Firefighter Gaiden
summary: Firefighter Gaiden is a thrilling game set in a University that is being consumed by flames, where the fire gives life to the furniture. As a brave firefighter, your mission is to defeat the flaming objects with your powerful hose and sharp axe to save the university.

name: Fire Combat
summary:
The Earth is under threat from a massive heatwave. The city of Spark is overwhelmed by outbreaks of fire, but a team of heroes will rise to fight the flames and rescue the victims. Immerse yourself in this action-packed and strategic adventure: extinguish the fires, save the items, survive, and become a legendary firefighter in Fire Combat!

A platform action game where you control firefighters who shoot water jets to extinguish flames scattered across the levels. You must jump on platforms, avoid traps and pitfalls, and rescue victims along with their precious items, taking them to a safe zone. But be very careful—if you don't complete the rescue in time, the flames will consume everything.

name: Final Fantasy VII
summary: Final Fantasy VII 2D for Super Famicom was never officially released, but it existed as a concept during the early development phase of the original game. Development began in 1994, with the intention of being a traditional 2D RPG, in the style of Final Fantasy VI, for Nintendo's 16-bit console.

name: Five Biggest Accomplishments
summary: Five Biggest Accomplishments is a short Visual Novel where you play as someone who has held the same job for 30 years: push a button every 8 hours or the world will end. Suddenly, you get an email asking you to list your five biggest accomplishments for the week, or risk being fired.

name: Five Nights at Friedrich's
summary:
Willkommen to Friedrich's Pizza! A mystical, magical, fantastical restaurant where anything is possible. Our headlining act is, of course, the great Friedrich and his band of lifelike, near-sentient animatronic friends! We are thrilled to have you on board on this life-changing...
You know what? Cut the crap. These things are going to straight up f@cking kill you. Not even exaggerating. I have no idea what their problem is. They almost seem to be having fun with it. But they wanna rip off your arms and gouge out your eyeballs. Are you gonna let them?
Cook pizzas! Read manuals! Fire deadly lasers! Do whatever it takes to keep Friedrich, Bernard, Clara, and any other creeps out of your strange, purple office!
Can you survive Five Nights at Friedrich's?

name: Fixora
summary: The system encountered a chaotic and unwanted code bug, BUG_D, and even more critically, it was spreading. To prevent this disaster, the system generated "ZERO." Its mission is to penetrate the core node of the "BUG" and completely fix [BUG_D].

name: Fit Cats
summary:
Cats love boxes! Launch cats of different sizes into the box. If two cats of the same size touch each other, they merge into one larger cat.

In the game, you can also use the mouse to drive any cat out of the box. Also, from time to time you can catch mice that give this opportunity.

Try to unlock all the cats.

name: Fish
summary:
You are a Fish.. with a GUN!
YOU must destroy EVERYTHING in your path.
Will you be able to survive being only... an armed Fish? or just be flapping around like a normal Fish..?

name: FireMatch Empire
summary: Awaken the first Stickfolk. Explore an endless world. Build your cities. Develop new technologies. Unlock new eras. Shape a peaceful civilization. No war, only creation.

name: Final Form
summary: Final Form is a 4X God-Game Puzzle-TBS. Terraform the land by day, battle enemies at night with a chess-like movement system. Encounter the world's inhabitants and uncover the secrets of the ancient civilization. Transcend the celestial sphere and reach your Final Form.

name: Finn's Ascent
summary: Finn's Ascent is a relaxing platform game where you help Finn climb as high as possible while collecting all the donuts along the way.

name: Find All: Christmas 2025
summary: Ho ho ho! The Christmas season is here again! That means it's time to test your attentiveness by exploring the Christmas suburb and finding different objects to color in the black and white picture with colorful paints.

name: Find All: Christmas 2025 - Extra Level
summary: Explore the shops in the shopping center in the run-up to Christmas, find 270 different items and paint the black and white picture with colored paints.

name: Five New-Fangled Nights
summary: You've found yourself a brand new job; workin' as night watchman for a kiddy restaurant downtown. Should be a piece of cake! The pay's...average, but hey, at least the work's easy! Right?

name: Fill Me In!
summary: You play as the letter I, and your job is to fill in the space designated for you, in order to complete the word.

name: Fish Tank Simulator
summary: Manage your own digital aquarium in various relaxing environments. Raise fish with unique behaviors, decorate tanks, and unlock rare species. Whether you enjoy min-maxing your income, unwinding with a cozy game, or you're a fish lover looking for a digital tank, you'll find it in Fish Tank Simulator

name: Fish Eyes
summary: Fish Eyes is a fps souls-like horror game based within a water park. Accept offers for upgrades, defeat demonic bosses, and uncover the past of the undead owner. Remember every offer comes at a price.

name: Fishy Dish
summary: Create and sell sushi in this roguelike inventory-management sushi-builder game. Collect fish, sauces, and tools, arrange them on a grid to trigger synergies, survive each round’s sales target, and build the ultimate sushi lineup.

name: Fish Swarm: Within Inches
summary: This is a unique roguelike action game where you command a dynamic fish swarm. Evolve different weaponized fish breeds, and combine abilities to transform your school from vulnerable prey into an unstoppable force that dominates the abyss. Survive relentless waves of aquatic creatures.

name: Five
summary: FIVE is a card game in which luck is the most important factor. It is not an easy game; you need patience to reach the end. It consists of choosing cards that can cause you to lose fingers on your hand. To reach the end, you must survive all 5 rounds. It won't be easy, so GOOD LUCK!

name: Fickle Card Legend
summary: A side-scrolling, non-turn-based card battle game. Level up, collect gear, and challenge stages and bosses with a unique card-clash combat system.

name: Fierce Kingdoms
summary: A medieval RTS where you're the king. Command peasants to expand your base and grow your economy. Research powerful technologies. Then, mass an army to crush your enemies! Conquer other kingdoms in Campaign mode to unlock new perks.

name: Final Word Royale
summary: Think fast, spell faster — your life depends on it. Join the deadly 40 player word battle royale, Solve word puzzles or face brutal consequences. Only one will remain.

name: Filthy Apartments
summary: Jen really wanted the exclusive en suite apartment that sexy Paula had for rent. She'd do almost anything for it. Well scratch that, she really would do anything to live there! But would the more sophisticated and mature Paula be interested in the deal young Jen has to offer?

name: Five Shifts at Zlata's
summary: Five Shifts at Zlata's is an atmospheric horror night-shift simulator where you play as a security mechanic in a family restaurant hiding dark secrets. Monitor cameras, manage power, restart the generator, and keep the animatronics-mascots away. Survive five shifts… if you can.

name: Fishy Business
summary: Rent is due and its time to get to business... fishy business. Build your aqua-empire from the ground up, starting from your dormitory bathroom. With the help of your loyal customers (and some fishy guy) you just might be able to afford somewhere nicer.

name: Fig and Totems
summary: Outsmart your friends in this fast-paced party game! Hide your Fig's totem in under 30s, then find theirs in under 2min (fairly, or by stealing them). Who will be the best hunter?

name: Find Difference
summary:
Two pictures
One challenge
Can you find it?

name: Fight Like a Chicken
summary: A Punch-Out!!-inspired boxing game where you play as Benny Bantam, a rooster fighting through the criminal underworld to find his missing father. Master frame-perfect deflects and devastating counters in this hand-drawn 2D fighter with heart.

name: Fister.Fun
summary: The browser-based multiplayer game where you fist your friends.

name: Firestarters
summary: As a convicted criminal in the brutal future of this lightning-paced arcade movement FPS, a government-sanctioned bloodsport is your only hope of redemption. Strategize, skate, shoot, and slay against a gauntlet of genocidal androids for the chance to win your freedom.

name: Final Splash
summary:
Final Splash is a chaotic multiplayer party game where the goal is simple: be the first to die!

The ocean has become so polluted that sharks refuse to live in it any longer.
So they figured if it’s the end, might as well make it spectacular!

Gather up to 4 friends and take part in a completely insane race to the death.
Charge into mines, blow yourself up, and do whatever it takes to be the first shark to bite the dust!

Final Splash: because saving the ocean is overrated better sink in style.

name: Find Hidden Objects - Spot It!
summary:
Welcome to 'Find Hidden Objects - Spot It!' — Find Hidden Objects & Relax!

Embark on a relaxing and enjoyable journey through hundreds of levels. Have fun while improving your skills to spot hidden objects in stunning, high-definition pictures.

name: Finding Her
summary: In "Finding Her," step into the shoes of Amaan, a devoted father on a desperate quest to rescue his missing daughter. Unravel the chilling secrets hidden within a haunted forest, facing heart-pounding challenges and eerie encounters. With a gripping story and atmospheric visuals, this psychological horror game will keep you on the edge of your seat as you navigate the darkness and uncover the truth. Will you be able to find her before it's too late?
